pa med do/ /gang du yang khong khro ba med do/ /gang du yang zhe sdang ba med do/ /de mi snang / ma rmongs/ phyin ci ma log pas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ rnam par mi rtog
pa| zhi ba/ legs par gnas pa/ zla med pa/ mi g.yo ba/ rab tu mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / sems can gyi don bya ba la yongs su mi
skyo ba/ dus gsum yang sgyid lug pa med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i khams ni rdul lam/ du ba 'am/ sprin gyis kun nas nyon mongs par
mi 'gyur/ sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'di lta
bu spyad pa yang sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la spyod pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chen po'i
dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rgyan rdo rje chen po'i rtog gi spyod pa rdo rje chen po las 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pas bsod nams la sogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzung
bar bya/ bklag par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar to/ /bde bar gshegs pa /ngo mtshar to/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag gang dag gi rna lam
du grags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na gang dag nyan pa dang / 'chad ba dang / klog pa dang / yid la bgyid pa dag lta
smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag ni theg pa chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de dag ni theg
pa chen po bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul
la skal ba mchis pa lags so/ /bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen po bla na med pa 'phral du 'bras bu mang ba bshad du
gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs te/ rdo rje chen po 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad rdo rje chen po'i sgra sgrogs te/ gsung gcig tu rdo rje chen po 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i 'byung gnas rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brjod
cing shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ rdo rje chen po
pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam zhes bsnyun
gsol te/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'tsho 'am/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad slod nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis
rlob pa'i rdo rje gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba thA oM badzra ka ra khaM swAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo
rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i gsang sngags gsungs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs so/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de ya mtshan du che'o snyam du snying 'dun par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la blta zhing 'khod do/ /'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de ya mtshan che snyam du rtse gcig tu gyur par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la zhus pa/ gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas/ /rnam par
'dren rnams mi gsung las/ /bde gshegs sras la rdo rje yis/ /dbang bskur du ni nges par gda'/ /gsang sngags spyod pa ye shes che/ /
theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog /der ni thams cad mkhyen nyid dang / /don kun grub pa'i spyod pa thob/ /gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi/ /theg pa chen po thams
cad mkhyen/ /sngon gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ /nags tshal mchog 'dir rtag tu bshad/ /sA la'i rgyal mtshan nyams dga' che/ /spyod pa yang dag bstan pa'i
gnas/ /sngon gyi spyod las byung gyur pa/ /gsang sngags shes las byung bar bshad/ /gang dag 'das pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang / /
mgon po gang dag da lta byung / /rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad 'dir gshegs shing / /gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi/ /theg pa chen
po dbang bskur 'di/ /bde gshegs sras la rab tu stsol/ /sangs rgyas drang srong chen po pa/ /kun gyi dbang ni bdag lags so/ /'jig rten phan par 'tshal bas na/ /
rdzogs sangs rgyas la gsol ba 'tshal/ /bstan pa kun la bsrung ba dang / /dam chos rtag gnas bgyi slad du/ /bdag nyid che ba'i spyi gtsug tu/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas
kyi dbang bskur stsol/ /gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi/ /theg chen rtogs par khong du chud/ /sngon gyi smon lam nges byung ba/ /sangs rgyas sras po grags chen lags/ /
thog ma'i spyod ldan nges pa 'di/ /sangs rgyas 'dra 'am ci zhig te/ /bde gshegs sras po chags med pa/ /byang chub mthar thug dbang thob lags/ /gsang sngags mgon
pos rnam kun tu/ /'khor 'di byin gyis brlabs lags na/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas/ /ci slad mi gsung gyur cing bzhugs/ /thams cad ngo mtshar 'dzin
'gyur te/ /bde bar rtog la brtson par gnas/ /dpa' bo che rnams the tshom dang / /de bzhin yid gnyis bsal du gsol/ /da ni dus la bab lags na/ /phyi bshol ma mdzad
bshad du gsol/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gsungs pa/ /'dren pa rnams kyis gang sangs rgyas/ /chos nyid 'di ni gcig tu mchog /rtag tu mnyam
gzhag rnams kyis ni/ /rab tu bsgrims te de rtogs bya/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la sogs pas shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags
tshal stug po kun tu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa gru bzhi lham pa/ sgo bzhi gtod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyi ras bskor ba/ sgo
khang dang / rta babs dang / stegs bus brgyan pa/ steng du rin po che'i bla re bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu dpyangs pa/ rin po che sna lnga'i srad bu bres par byin gyis
brlabs te dbus su rdo rje pad+ma'i khri dang / phyogs cha brgyad du rdo rje chen po'i phreng bas bskor ba dang / rdo rje phyi ras kun tu bskor ba dang / rdo rje'i phyi rgyab tu ni rdo rje'i phreng
ba dang / rdo rje'i srad bus bres pa dang / rdo rje bcing bas bcings pa dang / rdo rje'i phur bu dag gdab pa dang / thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin can du byin gyis brlabs nas
steng gi gtsug tor nas thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ngo / /'od zer de dag byung nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor la snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyi gtsug tu zhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag zhugs
ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dga' zhing mgu nas rab tu dga' ste thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i snying po smras pa/

na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shwa mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA a pra ti ha ta ba la/ mahA badzra A dz+nyA ka ra Na/ na mo stu te swAhA/ de nas thogs pa med pa'i stobs rdo rje'i snying po smras ma thag
tu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / stong pa nyid
dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / stong pa nyid chen po'i mtha' las byas pa sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / des ma la sogs pa pha rol
tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par bskyed pa'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lag tu byin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
gis kun tu bzang po'i lag tu rdo rje byin ma thag tu/ de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ma ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu/ kye ma/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni lag na rdo rje'o/ /lag na rdo rje'o/ /zhes brjod do// //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang
bskur ba/ bam po gsum pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dam tshig 'di byin gyis brlabs nas/ yang gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/
na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA gu h+ya badzra d+ha ra swAhA/ de nas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams
cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ gsang ba'i bdag po'o/ gsang ba'i bdag po zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags
nas| 'di lta ste/ snying po 'di'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dag mngon sum du zhugs so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bstan pa kun tu
bsrung ba dang / 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'i snying po rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA
badzra d+ha ra bi ra bi ra bi ki ra bi ki ra swAhA/ rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje chen po rgya che ba las byung ba'i lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems dang
bo bskyed pa rnams dang / las dang po pa rnams dang / sems can rnams kyi rgyab dang / mdun dang / ma nyal ba'am/ gnyid kyis log pa'am/ chos ston pa'am/
byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am/ sems can gyi don byed pa'am/ sprul pa rab tu byed pa'i bar du thams cad kyi drung na gzugs thams cad yang dag par
ston pa'i cho ga shes pa lag na rdo rje cod pan du kun tu snang ngo / /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis phyogs rdo rjes bcings pa zhes bya ba rdo rje'i snying po mchog gsungs
pa| na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA dig badzra Ta Ta Ta Ta TaM swAhA/ phyogs rdo rjes bcings pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sems can
ma rungs pa thams cad rdo rje'i bcing bas bcings par snang ngo / /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa'i rdo rje'i phur bu zhes bya
ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA Tha Tha Tha Tha ThaM swA hA/ sa rton gyi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ kye ma/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di rdo rje'i sa rton to zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa
'og gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ya Ta ya TaM swAhA/ sa 'og gi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma
thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sa'i 'og gi phrag thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje
'di ni sa 'og gi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'gro ba gcod

pa zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu be b+h+yaH sarba thA ts+tshin+da sarba bI r+yAn+tu ra ga de ma pra barma lab+d+ha bi dza ye swA hA/ rig sngags 'chang gi
'gro ba gcod pa'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang gi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag gis gnod sbyin tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra yak+Sha ni gr-i ha da ta swA hA/ gnod
sbyin gyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis klu'i rdo rje bsgrags pa'i
tog rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ha ra ha ra nA ga badzra swA hA/ de nas klu'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma
thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni klu'i rdo rje zhes sgra
gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ma tha ma tha badzra gan+d+harba hr-i da ya swAhA/ rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
thams cad dang / dri za'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni dri za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu
'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i snying po gsungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH
sarba thA badzra pi ta ta d+ha ra ka ra haM ha swA hA/ de nas rdo rje chen po nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad
dang | nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje chen po 'di ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i rdo rje'o
zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mi 'am ci'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH
sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra kin+na ra dan+da bi je ya shap+ta swA hA/ de nas mi'am ci'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / mi
'am ci'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni mi'am ci'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /

yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ma ho ra ga badzra dz+wA lA ya swAhA/ de nas rdo rje
lto 'phye chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lto 'phye chen po'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po srin

po'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra rak+Sha sa krU ra da ha pa tsa TuM TuM TuM TuM swAhA/ de nas rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma
thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni srin
po'i rdo rje'i zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i
snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra hr-i da he ta swAhA/ de nas rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig
rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni mkha'
'gro ma'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po 'byung bo'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta
thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ha le hu le badzra ma hA b+hu te shwa ra swAhA/ rdo rje chen po 'byung po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
thams cad dang / 'byung po'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'byung po'i rdo rje chen po'o zhes sgra gcig
nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po'i sha za'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba
thA mahA badzra pi shA tsi shwa ra bi shwa hr-i da ya gaM mi tsi mi tsi ma Ta ma Ta badzra swA hA/ rdo rje chen po sha za'i snying po 'di dag gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams
cad dang / sha za'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sha za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes
grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po sha za mo'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra du ti pi shA tsi ki ri
mi ri mi le swA hA/ rdo rje chen po sha za mo'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sha za mo'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sha za mo'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje
srin mo'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA badzra ka rA li rAk+Sha si hA ri mi ri swAhA/ rdo rje srin mo'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig
rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / srin mo'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni srin mo'i rdo rje'o
zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po gnon po'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maH
sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ostA ra ka badzra hi si swAhA/ gnon po'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gnon
po'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gnon po'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags
so| |yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis grib gnon rab tu 'jigs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ki li ki
li badzra bi d+ha hi ni swAhA/ grib gnon rab tu 'jigs pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / grib gnon gyi gnas thams
cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni grib gnon gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag gis brjod byed kyi gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA graM graM s+pha ra Na badzra swAhA/ brjed byed kyi
gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / brjod byed kyi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni brjed byed kyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yang gdon thams cad

bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA bi ra badzra sarba gra ha ni kr-in+ta na dzA Ti ba laM po da ra raT raT swA hA/ gdon thams cad bzlog
pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di dag gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / gdon thams cad kyi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis lha la sogs

pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA badzraM badzraM saM saM swAhA/ lha la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu
'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi gnas rnams su/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni
lha la sogs pa'i snying po rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis nad kyi gdan thams

cad tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA b+hai Sha dz+nya badzra a mr-i ta b+ha ba swA hA/ rtsi sman chen po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di
dag gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / rtsi sman chen po'i gnas rnams su/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rtsi sman gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi nad gdon bsal ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs
pa| na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tra Ta tra Ta badzra swAhA/ nad bsal ba'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes
grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rga ba'i gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA a mr-i tod
b+ha ba badzra la la la la swA hA/ rga ba 'gog pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rga ba 'gog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo

rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ka di badzra dza ya ha ha swA hA/ 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu
'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni 'chi ba las rgyal ba'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas
gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rgud pa'i gdon bzlog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH
sarba thA ra ba ma badzra sarba shri yaM a b+hu da ya na da da ma hA kA ru Ni ka d+ha ka d+ha ka swA hA/ rgud pa thams cad 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab
'byams thams cad du/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rgud pa thams cad 'gog pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes
grags so/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po stobs thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/
na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA oM badzra tsakra brti hUM swA hA/ de nas 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs ma thag tu
'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad dang / lha
dang | klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs
pa'i gnas thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /yang de
bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA dzrI shrI hUM swA hA/ de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po la sogs pa rdo rje chen po'i snying po rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na
rdo rje la byin no/ /byin nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin stug po'i dra ba chen pos thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / shing sA la sna
tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas chos gsum gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du bsgyur nas mi snang
bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas kyang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
dkyil 'khor 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por lag tu rdo rjes dbang bskur bas khyod dbang bskur to/ /ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las
byas pa'i rdo rje khyod la byin no/ /'khor los bsgyur pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rjes khyod byin gyis brlabs so/ /rdo rje'i snying po thams cad khyod la bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis khyod la bstan pa thams cad kyi don bya ba dang / bsrung bar gnang ngo / /khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ da rang gi
rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nges par ston cig /rigs kyi bu/ lag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po shod cig /de skad ces bka'
stsal pa dang / lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /chos kyi rjes ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'chal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
mchog tu ngo mtshar thob pa dang / bdag rnam par rgyal ba'i chos dam pa thob pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de'i tshe rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i
snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas lag na rdo rje rdo rje brtsegs pa chen po rnam par bsgrags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la
snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / zhing thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /stong gsum gyi
stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /
'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul lo/ /ldeg/ rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg go /shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'o/ /nub phyogs mtho na shar
phyogs dma'o/ /lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma'o/ /byang phyogs mthon lho phyogs dma'o/ /dbus mtho na mtha' dma'o/ /mtha' mthon dbus dma'o/ /snang ba chen
po yang 'jig rten du byung bar gyur to/ /gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa na 'khod pa de dag kyang 'od des snang bar byas nas sems can gang
dag der skyes pa de dag phan tshun blta zhing gcig gis gcig mthong nas sems can gzhan dag gcig 'dir skyes pa blta/ sems can gzhan dag gcig 'dir
skyes pa blta'o snyam mo/ /de dag gis bltas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po'i gzungs kyi chos ston to/ /de
dag gis chos de thos nas dad pa rnyed de shi 'phos nas lha'i nang du skyes te shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba der lag na rdo
rje dbang bskur ba chen pos dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir dong ngo / /
tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang skad cig de dang / yud tsam de dang / thang cig de la chad par gyur to/ /de'i tshe dud
'gro'i skye gnas kyi ming yang mi grag par gyur to/ /yi dwags kyi gnas thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi ra bas kun tu bskor ba dang / lha'i zas dang / skom
dang | yo byad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / lha'i lus dang ldan par gyur to/ /shing sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags stug po 'di thams cad kyang
snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur to/ /lha'i bu nyi ma dang / zla ba rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba 'di gnyis kyang lha ma me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nger ma yin te/ de
bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang / sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'od ma gtogs par 'od gzhan thams cad mog mog por gyur to/ /byang chub sems
dpa' lag na rdo rjes ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu de'i tshe spu'i bu ga thams cad nas khro bo'i rgyal po dag byung nas hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po ni
bsgrags/ lag na rdo rje ni thogs/ gdong gi dpral ba'i khro gnyer ni bsnyer/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni dbyangs gcig gis go bar byed cing /
kye| ma rungs pa yi srin po dang / /pha yi mtshun dang sha za dang / /ma mo'i gdon dang 'byung po dang / /brjed byed grub pa sprul 'dzin bcas/ /gnon po bgegs dang log
'dren sogs/ /gdon gyi tshogs rnams thams cad ni/ /ser sna yongs su btang byos la/ /dul ba'i sems kyis mnyam gzhag ste/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun
la| |mkhas pa dag ni skyabs su deng / /rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan de/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar 'dzin pa/ /nags tshal dam pa nyams dga' bar/ /yid 'ong khang pa brtsegs na bzhugs/
deng la mgon po de las ni/ /dam tshig yongs su stsal byos la/ /nga rgyal nga yi med byos te/ /sa rnams kun tu rgyu bar byos/ /gzhan du khyed cag de ring nyid/ /rdo rje 'bar ba rab
'khrugs pa/ /'bar ba 'jigs chen 'di dag gis/ /mgo ni shin tu 'gems par 'gyur/ /de ltar khro bo'i rgyal po dag /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /btsal med
tshig gis go byas nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyi gan dengs shig /ces tshig tu brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /de'i tshe 'byung bo'i tshogs thams cad byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo
rje'i bstan pa 'di 'tshol zhing / sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ngo / /chos la skyabs su dong ngo / /dge 'dun la skyabs su dong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po lag na rdo rje la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes de'i tshe rang gi snying po smras pa/
na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na badzra pA Ni hUM phaT/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po smras ma thag tu de nas
'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha
ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi gnas rnams su/ kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lag na rdo rje drag po'o/ /lag na rdo rje drag po'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so/ /de thos nas byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul chen po la smon lam shin tu btab par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje drag po'i
snying po 'di smras nas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang bas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas te dkyil
'khor chen po smras so/ /de la slob dpon gsang sngags kyi/ /de nyid don mkhas tshul khrims ldan/ /sgyu rtsal rnams la mkhas pa dang / /snying rje'i rang bzhin bzod dang
ldan| |sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun sems/ /nges pa dang ni dus shes pa/ /g.yer ba sro shi ma yin pa/ /mdangs che zab mo'i chos la mos/ /bzlas brjod la brtson rtag
tu ni| |bsam gtan byed pa la dga' zhing / /lag na rdo rje'i ming thos pa'i/ /sngags pa de yis rtag par ni/ /mchil ma 'byung zhing spu zing byed/ /rmi yang lag na rdo rje la/ /
yid gnyis the tshom med pa dang / /dus shes de bzhin tshod shes shing / /byas gzo de bzhin bden smra ba/ /slob dpon de lta bus ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/
sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs te gong du smos pa'i snying po de dag re re zhing yang 'bum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu lag na rdo rje
drag po'i snying pos yungs kar dang / mngar gsum bsres pa dag lan khrir sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su 'dug ste/
bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bzlas brjod bya'o/ /drag po'i snying po chen pos slob ma dag par bya ba dang / bsrung ba'i cho ga bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu sa brtag par
bya ste/ rdo dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med pa/ skye ba po grog sbur la sogs pa'i skyon dang bral ba'i sa ni thams cad du yang shis pa'o/ /der
gza' gtum po la ma bab pa/ tshes grangs ngan pa ma yin pa/ mi mthun par 'jug pa dang phrad pa spangs pa dang / nyi ma dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam dang / rgyu skar dang /
gza' bzang por mngon pa la las brtsams na shis par 'gyur ro/ /dmar dang ser dang dkar dang nag /'dren ma pa ni lnga pa yin/ /gang yang rung ba'i sa der ni/ /
mkhas pas khru gang tsam brkos nas/ /sngags pa yis ni brkos pa de/ /sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya/ /lhag na rnam pa kun tu mchog /kha da chad ni 'bring du brjod/ /
gang bar ma gyur sa de spang / /mkhas pas der ni brtsam mi bya/ /dkar po dag ni zhi bar bstan/ /dmar po dbang gi don du 'dod/ /ser po rgyas par shes par bya/ /nag
po drag shul spyod par shes/ /der ni mchod yon gtor ma dang / /mar me spos dang bdug pa dag /bsgrims te byin nas bsrung bya ste/ /mnyam par gzhag nas sa la
brjod/ /de yi nub mos der ni/ /ku sha bting ba'i steng du nyal/ /gal te sa ni rung gyur na/ /der ni bsgrims te bri bar bya/ /sngon gyi sangs rgyas mi mchog gis/ /de ni
bgegs med yin zhes brjod/ /gzhan du na ni der mi bri/ /bgegs dang bcas pas phung bar 'gyur/ de nas sngags pa langs nas ni/ /de yi nyin mo mkhas pa yis/ /sa
ni shin tu yongs sbyangs phyir/ /sbyin sreg bya ba 'di bya ste/ /sbrang rtsi dang ni 'o ma dang / /mar ba sres sbyin sreg mchog tu 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis sbyin blugs ni/ /nyi
shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas sngags pas sa brkos la/ /sa de nyid kyis slar dgang ngo / /yang na dkyil 'khor las kyi tshe/ /sngags pas spos kyis sa dgang ngo / /legs
par brdung zhing mnyam 'jam bya/ /phyogs cha dag dang sgo yi rnams/ /kun kyang rnam pa thams cad du/ /rin chen sna lngas rab mdzes bya/ /bye brag tu ni sa dbus su/ /rin chen sna
lnga gzhag par bya/ /de nas yon tan ldan pa yi/ /slob ma dag ni gdams te gzung / /bzlas brjod sbyin sreg rnam kun gyis/ /bsgrims te de dag bsrung bar bya/ /mchog sbyin
rdo rje blo ldan gyi/ /gsang sngags 'di ni zlos pa ni/ /skyon dang yon tan rnam dpyad pas/ /de dag thog mar brtag par bya/ /yon tan 'di dag ldan pa ni/ /shin tu brtags
nas gzung bar bya/ /rig dang gzo ni phun sum tshogs/ /gsal zhing dul la brtson pa dang / /shes rab ldan brtan byas gzo dang / /dkon mchog gsum la gzhol ba dang / /
gzugs mdzes yan lag yongs rdzogs dang / /gang dag theg chen dga' ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa' kun la yang / /yang dag rtag tu gus
gnas dang / /pha la gus dang ma la gus/ /bla ma mchod la rab brtson dang / /gang dag pha rol don spyod la/ /snying nas rtag tu 'jug pa dang / /gang dag drang zhing des pa
dang | |g.yo sgyu med cing chos brtson dang / /lus dang ngag dang yid dag pa/ /de dag nye bar rtag gzung bya/ /gang dag snying nas 'jig rten 'di/ /'jig rten pha rol
yid ches dang / /bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang / /dmangs rigs gang dag chos brtson zhing / /sngags kyi theg pa rtogs 'dod pa/ /de dag bsgrims te gzung
bar bya/ /nyan thos theg pa can rnams min/ /zhar ba lag zha zam dang / /rgur po 'on pa mi thung dang / /gang ngag sna leb gyur pa dang / /de bzhin mi g.yon gnong bag can//
'jungs dang byas pa mi gzo dang / /mkhas snyems sems dang g.yo can dang / /sngags kyi theg pa skyid chen gyi/ /theg pa la ni ma mos pa/ /de dag nam yang gzung mi bya//
de dag bstan 'dir skal ba med/ /bstan bcos mi shes mi gzung ste/ /thor bu thor bu 'dzin pa dang / /de bzhin bla ma mi gus pa/ /smad pa de dag ring du spang / /gang dag
yan lag ma tshang dang / /rkang zha dag dang theng po dang / /yan lag lhag par gyur pa rnams/ /mkhas pas bsgrims te yongs su spang / /ji skad smos pa'i slob ma rnams/ /
de tshe cho ga bzhin brtags te/ /gcig pu yod na'ang de gzung ngo / /yang na slob ma bzhi zhig gzung / /de nas smyung ba byed bcug la/ /spos dang me tog rnams kyis mchod/ /
dkyil 'khor nang gi sa la ni/ /ku sha gding ba bting ba la/ /des pas slob ma lhan cig tu/ /de ni rab tu nyal bar bya/ /slob dpon yud tsam yud tsam zhing / /de tshe slob ma
rnams la ni/ /theg chen zab mo rgya chen gyi/ /chos kyang rab tu bshad par bya/ /gsang sngags brjod las byung ba yi/ /yon tan kun tu brjod na phan/ /byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi ni/ /rdzu 'phrul la sogs yongs su brjod/ /pha rol rgyu la snying rje ba/ /de dag yud tsam yud tsam brjod/ /nam gyi bzhi cha lus pa'i tshe/ /gal te rmi lam bzang
rmi na/ /dkon mchog gsum la gzhol rnams kyis/ /nam langs pa dang legs rab tu/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar 'dug nas ni/ /khyed kyis de dag brjod par gyis/ /pad+ma'i
steng du 'dug na mchog /gzung dang mthong ba'ang de bzhin te/ /rgya mtsho mthong bar rmis pa dang / /rkyal dang 'thung pa'ang de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas mthong na snying dga' ste/ /
byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams dang / /'jig rten rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /nyan thos dag dang gang mkhas pa/ /de dag mthong na snying
dga' 'o/ /me yi phung po grags pa dang / /ba glang khyu mchog glang chen dregs/ /rta ni dkar por gang 'gyur ba/ /de dag mthong dang zhon pa dang / /ba lang khyu yang shis
pa yin/ /bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang / /rgyal po dge bar grags pa dang / /sdug pa'i gnyen dang grub pa dang / /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /de dag mthong na shis par 'gyur//
rmi lam smra zhing gtam zer dang / /rang gi mgo bo gcod pa dang / /sha chen za bar byed pa dang / /khrag gis 'khru bar byed pa dang / /de bzhin mi gtsang nub pa dang / /zho dang
'bras chan za ba dang / /chang yang 'thung bar byed pa dang / /skra 'breg pa ni mchog yin no/ /so yang ltung bar gyur pa dang / /ri dang shing ni n+ya gro d+ha/ /de la 'dzegs pa
shis par 'gyur/ /legs so bu zhe'am blo ldan zhes/ /sgra ni de skad thos pa dang / /yid du 'ong ba'i bud med dang / /nyin mo nyal po byed pa dang / /tshangs pa drag po
nyi ma dang / /khyab 'jug dang ni zla ba dang / /lus ngan po dang nor sbyin dang / /brgya byin dang ni chu lha dang / /de dag mthong ngam smra ba dang / /'bel gtam byed na nges par
'grub/ /gzhan yang de lta'i rmi lam dag /dngos grub 'dod pa rnams kyis gzung / /rmi lam de las bzlog pa dag /'jigs med rnams kyis gzung mi bya/ /sa la rgyug dang
'chong ba dang / /gar byed pa dang glu len dang / /dgod dang bong bu rnga mo la/ /zhon pa shin tu ngan pa yin/ /'bru mar gyis ni lus bskus dang / /gcer bu dag dang smra ba dang / /
zhar ba theng po sgur po dang / /mi sdug rnams dang phrad pa dang / /phag rnams dang ni khyi rnams dang / /bong bu rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /ma he rnga mo ce spyang dag /rmi lam mthong na rtag
tu smad/ /rtse gsum rtse gsum gdengs thogs dang / /mig dmar shin tu 'jigs pa dang / /gcer bu dag dang sna leb dang / /sdigs mo byed pa'i 'jigs byed dang / /mdog
gnag mi bzad chen po dang / /gos sngon gzugs byang mi sdug pa/ /su yis rmi lam rmis pa ni/ /de la dngos grub yod mi 'gyur/ /zungs shig rgyobs shig choms shig
ce'am/ /zo zhig ces pa'i mi bzad sgra/ /drag po 'jigs byed khro thos dang / /phung dang ma rnyed thos pa dang / /bya rgod bzhad dang bya dkar dang / /'ug pa bya rog byi la dang / /byi ba
sdig pa sre mo sbrul/ /gang yang gzhan dag skye bo gdug /de dag rmi lam mthong gyur tam/ /reg par gyur na'ang mi dge 'o/ /de nas phyi de nyin par slob dpon gyis rdo rje'i snying
pos ba'i rnam lnga la sngags kyis btab te/ slob ma bos la rdo rje drag po'i snying pos bsang gtor byas te/ /shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma kong bu'am/
snyim pa'i nang du snod du bya ba sbyin zhing / khyed de ring zas kyi tshod shes par gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ /nyi ma nub na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'jigs med kyi sreg blugs
dang | yam sreg shing nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o/ /de nas a shwat+tha'i shing ngam/ /yang na u du bA ra las/ /sor brgyad tsam gyi so shing bya/ /thog ma gcig ni
me tog brgyan/ /rdo rje drag po'i sngags btab la/ /de dag la ni bca' phyir sbyin/ /shar gyi phyogs su mdun bstan nam/ /yang na byang phyogs bstan te gzhag /gsang
sngags mgon po dran byas la/ /gar bltas de bzhin shes par bya/ /de nas phyi nyin slob ma rnams/ /smyung ba byed du bcug nas su/ /rdo rje mi pham me zhes bya/ /srid pa
gsum po rmongs byed pa/ /rtag dran bya phyir de dag la/ /dri ma med pa'i gzungs byin bya/ /snying du sdug pa'i dam tshig brjod/ /nyams pa la yang lhag par brjod/ /sdig
pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ /mchog tu bkra shis byed par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pa/ /thams cad kyis ni ma yin te/ /sdig pa thams cad byang byed pa/ /de
ni kun tu rtag dran bya/ /slob dpon gyis ni thams cad du/ /rtag tu mnyam par gzhag sems kyis/ /sna lnga'i tshon las byas pa yi/ /thig skud rab tu bzang blangs la/ /
bsgrims te sa 'di thams cad la/ /thig ni legs par gdab par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil du 'dug nas su/ /sngags pas de bzhin gshegs rnams la/ /de bzhin rdo rje 'chang
ba dang / /'khor los bsgyur ba dran byas la/ /bdag nyid der bsgoms byas nas su/ /de'i sngags yid kyis dran byas la/ /de nas shar phyogs kha bstan te/ /shar phyogs
nyid du thig gdab bo/ /de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis/ /nub phyogs kha bltas 'dug nas su/ /nub phyogs nyid du thig gdab bo/ /de nas bsgyur te mkhas pa yis/ /byang
phyogs su ni kha bltas la/ /byang phyogs su ni thig gdab bo/ /de nas yang ni bsgyur byas la/ /lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te/ /rnam par dbye ba shes pa yis/ /lho phyogs
nyid du thig gdab bo/ /de ltar nang logs dkyil 'khor ni/ /cha brgyad yod pa rab tu bya/ /de nas de lta'i tshul gyis ni/ /phyogs bzhir yongs su bskor byas la/ /kun
tu gru bzhi lham par ni/ /rab tu bsgrims te thig gdab pa/ /dbus kyi gnas nas byung nas su/ /me yi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la/ /sngags pas sngags kyi cho ga
bzhin/ /shar phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/ /de nas cho ga shes pa yis/ /gus pas dbang ldan phyogs song la/ /nub phyogs su ni kha
bltas te/ /byang phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/ /dbang ldan phyogs nas song nas su/ /rlung gi phyogs kyi phyogs 'dug la/ /der ni lho phyogs kha bltas la/ /nub
phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/ /gnas de nas ni de byung la/ /bden bral phyogs su dong nas su/ /me yi phyogs kyi bar du ni/ /thig skud legs par gdab par bya/ /kun
tu gru bzhi lham par ni/ /de ltar gnas de byas nas su/ /de nas phyi rol de bzhin du/ /cho ga bzhin du cha brgyad bya/ /tshad ni bcu drug khru yin te/ /slob dpon nyid kyi
khru yis so/ /de nas byung la blo ldan gyis/ /cha gzhan dag ni bya bar bya/ /phyi rol sa dang bcas par ni/ /khru grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /der yang snga ma ji bzhin du/ /cha
brgyad nyid du gcad par bya/ /brgyad pa nas ni gzung nas su/ /sngags pa yis ni thams cad du/ /'khor sa'i thig ni gdab par bya/ /gnas gsum dag tu nges par
yang | |cha brgyad gang dag 'tsham pa yi/ /thog ma'i sgo ni gdod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor rim pa bar ma la/ /snga ma nyis 'gyur sgor shes nas/ /rim pa gsum par
sum 'gyur dang / /sgo gang dag kyang mkhas pas bya/ /rta babs dag gi tshad rnams ni/ /dbus kyi cha dang mnyam par bya/ /lha yi gtso bo rnams la yang / /sgo gang dag ni bya
bar bya/ /rim pa gsum du rnam dbye bas/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor legs phye la/ /sngags mgon gnas la 'dug nas su/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /tshon rtsi
'dir ni bye brag tu/ /rin chen sna lnga yin par 'dod/ /sA lu btags pa'i phye yang rung / /ji ltar 'byor pas byar yang rung / /gos dkar bgos shing gtsang byas la/ /dul
zhing ze'u kha bcings nas su/ /bsgrims te byang shar phyogs mtshams nas/ /tshon rtsi dag ni dgye bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis sam/ /yang na lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas
sam| |snod kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis sam/ /rig byed 'don pa'i lag pas so/ /thog mar dkar po dgye bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu dmar po dgye/ /de yi 'og tu ser po ste/ /de yi
'og tu ljang ku dgye/ /thams cad dag ni nang rol tu/ /sngags pas tshon rtsi nag po dgye/ /cha brgyad dag tu gang bstan pa/ /dbus kyi cha yi cha rnams ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnams kyi ste/ /de dag rdo rje bcing tshul 'dod/ /gdan ni pad+mar bstan pa ste/ /mchog tu dkar zhing mdzes pa yin/ /de yi steng du rdo rje gzhag /de bzhin rdo rje gtsug tor
te| |me lce 'bar ba'i snying po bya/ /mdor na sa bon ldan par bya/ /de la shar phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog gzhag par
bya'o| |lho phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa me tog shin tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po'o/ /nub phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med do/ /byang phyogs
su ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'o/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can no/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su ni de
bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs so/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob bo/ /nub byang gi mtshams su ni de bzhin gshegs
pa 'khor ba 'jig go /mdor na dbus kyi pad+ma ni/ /'dab ma brgyad par brjod pa ste/ /'dab ma dkar po shar phyogs su/ /nub phyogs su ni dmar po nyid/ /byang phyogs
su ni ser po ste/ /lho phyogs su ni nag po nyid/ /'dab ma lhag ma rnams kun tu/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dren mar gsungs/ /de yi snying po'i dbus su ni/ /bum pa zla 'od
'dra ba bri/ /de yi steng du rlung chen ste/ /'bar zhing tog dang ldan par bri/ /zla gam 'dra zhing drag po ste/ /'od ni dbyar sprin mdog 'dra la/ /rlung gi steng du me bri ste/ /dbyibs ni
gru gsum gnas pa yin/ /rtags ni 'bras bu zur gsum pa/ /'jig pa'i dus kyi me dang mtshungs/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma bri/ /'od ni dus mtha'i me dang 'dra/ /de yi snying
po'i dbus su ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba bri bar bya/ /de la bcom ldan 'das de ni gzugs sam/ phyag rgya 'am/ yi ge ci rigs su gzhag par bya'o/ /phyag rgya gzhag na
rdo rje ste/ /bsgrims nas sa bon ldan par bya/ /de yi phyi rol cha rnams ni/ /brgyad po dag tu snga ma bzhin/ /sngags pas cho ga ji bzhin du/ /lha rnams rnam par dgod par bya/ /
de la shar phyogs su ni 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na bzhugs pa dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje ut+pa la'i phyag rgya dang bcas
par bri'o/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag
rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /lho phyogs su ni rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas shing rdo rje 'chang thams cad dang lhan cig tu rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas
par bri'o/ /lho nub kyi mtshams su ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba 'khor dang bcas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i
phyag rgya dang bcas par bri'o/ /nub phyogs su ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i
phyag rgya dang bcas pa dgod pa bri'o/ /nub byang gi mtshams su ni pad+ma rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor dang bcas pa ril ba spyi blugs kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa
bri'o| |byang phyogs su ni pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas
pa dgod par bya'o/ /byang shar gyi mtshams su ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po 'khor dang bcas pa rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya dang
bcas pa dgod par bya'o/ /phyogs bzhi ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi 'khor dang bcas par rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po nang du chud par bri'o/ /de la rnam thos kyi bu'i phyag
rgya ni dbyug tho yin no/ /'phags skyes po'i phyag rgya ni be con no/ /mig mi bzang gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o/ /lus ngan gyi phyag rgya ni zhags pa'o/ /phyi rol 'khor yug chen
po'i dkyil 'khor ni gru bzhi lham pa/ sgo bzhi gtod pa/ sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / mu ran shin tu rnam par phye ba khor yug chen pos yongs su bskor ba'o/ /de'i
nang rol du ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de la shar phyogs su ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de'i byang
phyogs su ni tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /tshangs pa'i byang phyogs su ni dbyangs can 'khor dang bcas pa pi wang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa
bri'o| |de dang nye bar sa'i lha mo 'khor dang bcas pa bum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de'i byang phyogs su ni dpal chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'am/ yid bzhin
gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'khor dang bcas pa mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /brgya
byin gyi lho phyogs su ni nyi ma 'khor dang bcas pa shing rta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /me'i phyogs su ni drang srong me'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i
phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /lho phyogs su ni gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa gshin rje'i be con gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de'i shar phyogs su ni 'chi bdag gi dril
bu bri'o/ /mtshan mo nag mo'i ni tog go /nag po'i ni zhags pa'o/ /drag po'i chung ma'i ni mdung rtse gsum pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i chung ma'i ni pad+ma'o/ /khyab 'jug gi
chung ma'i ni 'khor lo'o/ /gzhon nu ma'i ni mdung thung ngo / /phag gi chung ma'i ni tho pa'o/ /tsA muN+Di'i ni mi thod do/ /dbang po'i chung ma'i
ni rdo rje'o/ /lus ngan gyi chung ma'i ni dbyug tho'o/ /gshin rje'i nub phyogs su ni yi dwags rnams 'khor dang bcas pa kha'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /sha za rnams
ni dra ba rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /gnon po rnams ni lcags kyi rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /grib gnon rnams ni gdugs rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya
dang bcas pa bri'o/ /brjed byed rnams ni lag pa brang la bcar ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni lag pa bkan pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /
srin mo rnams ni mche ba rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya 'am/ lce rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /sha za mo rnams ni rdo rje bab col gyi lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /
bden bral gyi phyogs su ni bden bral 'khor dang bcas pa ral gri'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgo'i lho phyogs su ni chu lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de nas sgo dang nye bar dbang phyug chen po mdung rtse
gsum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de dang nye bar dka' thub zlog pa rtse gsum gdengs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /sgo'i byang phyogs kyi ngos su tshogs kyi
bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa dgra sta'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de'i byang phyogs su thags bzangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa
dbyug to rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa ba dan gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /byang phyogs su ni rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa gnod
sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa dbyug to rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de dag gi shar phyogs su khyab 'jug la 'khor dang bcas pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang
bcas pa bri'o/ /de'i 'og tu nam mkha' lding 'khor dang bcas pa 'dab ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de'i shar phyogs su ni sna tshogs phreng ba can la sogs pa dri za'i
rgyal po rnams dang / ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rang rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya ste/ de la dri za dag gi phyag rgya rnams ni
rnga phre'u dang / pheg rnams so/ /mi 'am ci'i phyag rgya dag ni sku'i pi wang la sogs pa brdung bsgreng ba rnams so/ /de nas lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / 'bab chu chen po rnams rang
gi zer chu'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de nas skye dgu'i bdag po rig byed 'don pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /de dag gi shar phyogs
su zla ba 'khor dang bcas pa pad+ma dkar po dang / bum pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /nub sgor ni ki li ki la rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri ste drag po rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /
byang sgor ni sgo srung gnyis bri bar bya ste/ de la gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu ni dbyug to'i phyag rgya bri'o/ /klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya bri'o/ /
shar sgor ni khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis bri bar bya ste/ de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /be con sngon po can ni be con gyi phyag rgya dang
bcas pa bri'o/ /lho sgor ni thub par dka' tho ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /mngon phyogs su ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /'og logs su ni rgya mtsho dang /rgya mtsho'i
'gram na sring mo bzhi rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o/ /de la tum bu ru'i phyag rgya ni dbyug to'o/ /rgyal ma'i phyag rgya ni mdung thung rtse gsum pa'o/ /rnam par rgyal
ma'i phyag rgya ni pad+ma'o/ /mi pham ma'i phyag rgya ni 'khor lo'o/ /gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje'o/ /sring mo bzhi'i lho phyogs su ni smin drug gi bu 'khor dang bcas
pa mdung thung gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /byang phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rnams ral gri dang / ras la sogs pa'i phyag rgya dang bcas pa bri'o/ /'khor
thams cad kyi gnas ni thig ler bri'o/ /de dang de dag lhag mar brjod pa thams cad ni thig ler byas te/ thams cad kyang rdo rje drag pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o/ /dkyil
'khor gyi las ci bya ba de thams cad ni rdo rje drag po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs te bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/ /dkyil 'khor rnams dgod pa'i cho ga'o// //
cho ga shes pas de lta bur/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mchog bris te/ /byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas su/ /rab tu bsgrims te mchod pa bya/ /de nas bum pa zhabs mi gnag /
kha yi cha ga shel kha can/ /mgrin pa ring zhing lto che ba/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga blang bar bya/ /sa bon rin chen sman gyis bkang / /spos kyi chus kyang rab tu bkang / /kha rgyan yal gas
khebs byas shing / /de bzhin 'bras bus kha bkang la/ /mgul chings kyis kyang bcings byas pa/ /kha dog ci rigs rnam par dgod/ /sgo bzhi po ni thams cad du/ /bum
pa snga ma ji bzhin du/ /brgyad nyid du ni gsungs pa ste/ /dgu pa de ni bsang gtor bya/ /rdo rje drag pos rnam kun tu/ /bsgrims te de ni sngags kyis gdab/ /bcu pa dbus su
shes par bya/ /de ni 'khor los bsgyur la dbul/ /rta babs rnams ni mdzes pa ste/ /rin chen rnam pa bzhi las bya/ /yang na yid 'ong shing
las bya/ /tsan+dan yang na gzhan yang rung / /dum bu ma yin ma grugs pa/ /gas pa med cing 'dzer ba med/ /ba ru na dang sha ma dang / /sal krI kang ka ta yang rung / /rin chen
dril bu rab dbyangs shing / /dar dang ras la sogs pas brgyan/ /khru ni brgyad dam bdun nam drug /me tog phreng dang ldan par 'dod/ /steng du rin chen bla re bre/ /
mu tig rgyan phreng rnam par dbyangs/ /dar dang ras kyang dbyangs par bya/ /dkyil 'khor las ni che bar bya/ /kha dog sna tshogs ba dan rnams/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu dbyangs
par bya/ /srad bu la ni brgyu bar bya/ /dril bu sgra 'byung ldan par bya/ /kha dog sna tshogs gdugs kyi rnams/ /ci rigs par ni bri bar bya/ /rin chen bzhi las byas pa 'am
de med zangs las byas pa'ang rung / /mchod pa'i yon gyi snod bzhi zhig /blo dang ldan pas gzhag par bya/ /sna tshogs spos su gsungs pa ni/ /gur gum dang ni
tsan+dan dang / /spri ka la sogs ci yang rung / /srog chags yan lag kun mi rung / /sna tshogs bdug pa dbul bya ste/ /a ga ru dang sgron shing dang / /ga bur shi ri ba sa
ka |ce pog dang ni ru rta dang / /sA la'i shing gi thang chu 'am/ /yang na thang shing thang chu dbul/ /rdo rje 'byung ba'i rig pa 'am/ /rdo rje drag po bzlas brjod bya/ /ut+pal dang pad+ma
mchog /tsam pa ka dang klu shing dang / /ke sa ra dang ma li ka /mya ngan 'tshang dang skya snar dang / /ta ka ra dang bu na ga /dong ka'i me tog mdzes pa yin/ /ka ra bI ra ku mu da/ /
sna ma d+ha nu ka ri yi/ /me tog ci rigs dbul bar bya/ /de bzhin lha bshos sna tshogs te/ /'o thug zho dang 'bras chan dang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi rab tu bzang / /bag chos dang ni
la du dang / /sbrang rtsi gzhag pa'i cung beng dang / /a sho brti be na ka /spyan gzigs khaN+Dar grags pa dang / /shi re b+he d+ha ka mo ta/ /gar+b+hod ka ra ka dang ni/ /be reg dang ni dwe tshe
dang / /sha ku la dang par pa ta/ /'bru yi la thug 'breng bu dang / /shun tha ba li ka dag dang / /g+ha ri ka dang swa sti ka /mon sran gre 'u zhu te'u dang / /rtsa ba dang ni drungs pa dang /
'bras bu sna tshogs dbul bar bya/ /sran tshod kha dog ldan pa dang / /sge'u gsher nges par dbul bar bya/ /sran tshod ril bu che chung dang / /b+he ga na dang saM b+ha d+hi/ /bu ram
bsres pa'i khu sman dang / /rab tu bsgrims te byas pa dang / /bu ram sna tshogs bcos pa dag /kun tu rnam pa thams cad dbul/ /rnam pa sna tshogs zho dag dang / /zho
bsrubs bu ram btab nges dbul/ /'o ma legs par btsags pa dang / /de bzhin btung ba rnams kyang dbul/ /kha ra'i dbu ba kha ra dang / /mar
dang bu ram 'bru mar dang / /sprang rtsi dang ni lan tshwa dang / /dge bar grags pa dbul bar bya/ /btung ba bsgos pa byas pa dang / /tam bu la dang mal cha dang / /snod spyad
bzang zhing mdzes pa dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs rtsi sman rnams/ /rab tu bsgrims te cho ga bzhin/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob la dbul/ /de nas so so re re la'ang //
na bza' ras zung re re dbul/ /me long mig sman yid 'ong dang / /dung dang de bzhin gi wang rnams/ /byang chub tshogs ni bkang ba'i phyir/ /mgon po kun la
dbul bar bya/ /skyob pa rnams la thams cad du/ /de ltar legs par mchod byas nas/ /de nas sngags pas sbyin sreg bya/ /snying po cho ga bzhin du bya/ /sreg
blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig ni/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg bya/ /thams cad 'grub byed yid 'ong pa/ /zho dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi'o/ /yi ge klog pa bzhi dag kyang / /phyogs bzhi
dag tu gzhag par bya/ /de la shar phyogs gzhag pa ni/ /'phags pa shes rab pha rol phyin/ /byang phyogs su ni mdo gzhag pa/ /gser 'od dam par dam pas
bzhed/ /nub phyogs su ni gzhag bya ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba yin/ /sdong po bkod pa'i tshul chen ni/ /lho phyogs logs su shes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor
lha rnams ci lta bar/ /de dag la yang gus par mchod/ /dam pa'i chos ni bklag pa 'di/ /bsrung ba rnams kyi dam pa yin/ /de nas lha rnams thams cad kyang / /de yi
tshe na dgyes par 'gyur/ /gang dag 'jig rten mi srun pa/ /de dag phyogs phyogs 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de lta bas na rnam kun tu/ /de tshe dam chos bklag par bya/ /slob ma
thams cad bos nas su/ /de dag la ni skyabs gsum sbyin/ /sdig pa mi bya brjod par bya/ /sdom pa dag kyang 'dzin du gzhug /mkhas pas cho ga 'di bzhin du/ /byang
chub sems kyang bskyed du gzhug /rdo rje drag po'i sngags chu yis/ /de nas kun la bsang gtor bya/ /dam tshig yongs su brjod byas la/ /mkhas pas nang du zhugs
nas su/ /gos rnams yongs su brjes byas te/ /sngags kyis yongs su gdab par bya/ /de tshe snying rje ldan pa yis/ /slob ma de dag gdong bkab la/ /'khor los bsgyur
ba'i dam tshig gi /phyag rgya sngags pas 'ching bcug ste/ /lag tu me tog sbyin byas la/ /de tshe snying gar yi ge bsam/ /skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni/ /me tog de dag dor du
gzhug /blo dang ldan pas slob ma yi/ /rna g.yas rdo rje dril bu bzhag /rdo rje rnga zhes bya ba yi/ /lha mo chen po g.yon par ro/ /me tog rnams ni gang
bab pa/ /lha de de yi yin par 'dod/ /de ltar slob ma bcug byas nas/ /de tshe dam tshig bstan par bya/ /mkhas pas zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'di ltar sbyin sreg rab tu
bya| |de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /dbang dang de bzhin drag shul
spyod| |sbyin sreg las ni mdor bsdus pa/ /sems dpa' chen pos brjod par mdzod/ /cho ga thams cad rgyas pa dang / /de bzhin tha dad las kyang gsungs/ /sems
dpa' chen po'i gnas gang du/ /me yi thab kyi khung bu bgyi/ /yam sreg shing cis ji lta bur/ /las ni ci zhig brtsam par bgyi/ /khyab bdag thab khung bka' stsol
la| |bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sems dpa' chen po legs so legs/ /khyod kyis dri ba gang byas pa/ /de dag thams cad brjod par bya/ /g.yeng ba med pa'i yid kyis
nyon| |dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus su ni/ /sbyin sreg me thab khung bu bya/ /de tshad gtan la dbab pa ni/ /khru gang tsam du brjod pa ste/ /mtho gang tsam zhig brkos nas
su| |dbus su rdo rje gzhag par bya/ /kha khyer yang ni dar byas te/ /mkhas pas mdzes pa'i gzugs su bya/ /rtsa brtse mor dkris pa yi/ /ku sha dag ni der dgram mo/ /de ltar
kun tu legs par yang / /sngags pas shin tu dgram par bya/ /ha cang mi nye mi ring bar/ /sbyin sreg me yi thab bya ste/ /tshul bzhin du ni byas nas su/ /der ni sbyin sreg
brtsam par bya/ /ku sha sbams steng bdag 'dug ste/ /de bzhin gshegs rnams dran byas nas/ /de nas me ni 'bar byas la/ /de la bsang gtor bya ba brtsam/ /de yi 'og
tu me der ni/ /me tog gcig gcig gzhag par bya/ /de nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /rang gi phyag rgyas dgug par 'gyur/ /de la me yi phyag rgya ni/ /lag pa g.yas pa drang
brkyang ste/ /mthe bo mthe chung drung du gzugs/ /sngags 'dis dgug par bya ba 'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ag+na ye hA bya kA bya bA ha na ya swA hA/
blo dang ldan pas rig sngags kyis/ /de nas dgang blugs sbyin sreg bya/ /de la dgang blugs phul nas ni/ /slob ma g.yon du gzhag par bya/ /de dag re re'i phyir yang ni/ /
dgang blugs nyi shu lnga lnga bsreg /rnam pa sna tshogs las kyi rnams/ /'di lta bu dag rab bya ste/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /dbang dang drag shul
spyod pa 'o/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'o mar bcas/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi'o/ /rgyas la zho dang 'bras chan dang / /gang dag gzhan nas gsungs pa'o/ /drag shul spyod pa
tsher mar gsungs/ /dbang byar snga ma ji bzhin du/ /las 'dod 'jigs pa med rnams kyis/ /ci rigs par ni sbyin sreg bya/ /ji ltar rigs pa so so las/ /de
dag la ni yon dgug go /yang na yid la gang 'dod pa/ /de ni ci bder sbyin par gyis/ /de yi tshe na slob dpon la/ /slob ma rnams kyis yon dbul lo/ /ma byin na ni
dam tshig nyams/ /dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /dper na nyi ma zla ba gnyis/ /'jig rten mig tu mkhas pas 'dod/ /de bzhin skye bo 'di la yang / /slob
dpon de ni mig 'drar 'dod/ /dper na me yi khams des ni/ /bud shing thams cad sreg par byed/ /de bzhin slob dpon shes par bya/ /mi shes bud shing sreg
par byed/ /dper na chu yi khams de ni/ /'jig rten gdung ba thams cad gcod/ /de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang / /gdung ba kun gcod shes par bya/ /dper na
rlung gi khams de ni/ /'jig rten thams cad rtag tu bsgrub/ /de bzhin slob dpon slob ma la/ /dge ba rnam par sgrub par byed/ /dper na lus can thams cad la/ /sa ni
rten du grags pa yin/ /de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang / /chos kyi rten du 'dod pa yin/ /dper na bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad/ /chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud/ /de
bzhin slob dpon shes par bya/ /dper na dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /gsang ba thams cad mthun par 'dzin/ /de bzhin du ni slob dpon yang / /'dir ni sngags kyi
gsang ba 'dzin/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags pa rnams/ /de ni rtag tu rjod par byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ /bsngags pa chen po'ang rjod par byed//
dper na sangs rgyas mig 'dra ste/ /yang dag lam ni ston mdzad pa/ /de bzhin sngags pa 'jigs med kyang / /theg chen gnas 'di ston pa yin/ /bdag ltar sngags
pa de bzhin te/ /slob dpon ji bzhin rgyal de bzhin/ /slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung / /skyon rnams nam yang gzung mi bya/ /yon tan 'dzin na grub par 'gyur/ /nyes
pa rnams ni dngos grub nyams/ /slob dpon la ni smad byas na/ /'jig rten dag na tshe thung zhing / /de bzhin ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur/ /nya pa la sogs rigs su skye//
'di ni nyes kun 'byung gnas te/ /mkhas pas bla ma skur mi gdab/ /chos 'dod rnams kyis slob dpon la/ /rtag par rgyun tu mnyes par
bya| |gang na rgyal ba'i sras gnas pa/ /sa de mchod rten 'dra ba yin/ /der ni rgyal sras thams cad dang / /bdag kyang snying las chung ba yin/ /sbyin sreg las kyi
dam pa 'di/ /dpa' bo khyod la brjod pa ni/ /sems can rnams la phan bzhed pa'i/ /mgon po rnams kyis sngon chad bshad/ /sbyin sreg bya ba'i las rnams
la| |gang gis 'di ltar rnam shes pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas gsungs pa bzhin/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/ me'i
tshig le'ur byas pa'i rnam par phye ba'o// //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ bam po bzhi pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas snga mas bsngags pa yi/ /dbang bskur dkyil 'khor brjod
par bya/ /khru gsum tshad gcig gzhag nas su/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /de yi tshad ni khru bzhi ste/ /dkyil 'khor logs su mngon phyogs bya/ /der
yang sngags pas cha bsnyams shing / /kun tu gru bzhi lham par bya/ /sngags pas sngags kyi tshul gnas te/ /me yi phyogs su 'dug byas la/ /de tshe byang du mngon phyogs
te| |cho ga bzhin du thig skud bre/ /snga ma'i gnas ni spangs nas su/ /dbang ldan phyogs su 'dug byas te/ /rlung phyogs spyod yul bar du ni/ /byang phyogs ngos kyi thig
gdab bo/ /rlung gi phyogs su 'dug nas ni/ /lho phyogs ngos su mngon bltas te/ /bden bral phyogs kyi bar du ni/ /nub phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/ /de bzhin rlung gi
phyogs spangs te/ /bden bral phyogs su 'dug byas nas/ /de nas shar phyogs mngon bltas te/ /sngags pas gsang sngags rjes dran zhing / /me yi phyogs kyi bar du ni/ /
lho phyogs ngos kyi thig gdab bo/ /cho ga 'di bzhin thams cad kyang / /gru bzhi lham par rab tu bya/ /mkhas pas thog ma nyid du ni/ /nang rim cha brgyad byas nas su/ /'khor
lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ /mkhas pas rim pa gnyis su bya/ /dbus kyi pad+ma mdor brjod na/ /'dab brgyad ze bar bcas pa ste/ /'dab ma'i bar bar thams cad du//
rdo rje dag ni bri bar bya/ /de dag la yang snying po bri/ /rang gi snying pos bskul nas ni/ /phyogs skyong brgyad po de dag kyang / /ji bzhin gnas su rnam par dgod/ /de la nang
rol grwa rnams su/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnam par dgod/ /bgegs kun zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /sgor ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gzhag /dkyil
'khor lha la ji lta bar/ /der yang mchod pa rab tu bya/ /ras dang bla re dril bu dang / /gdugs dang me tog rnams kyang dbul/ /mu tig phreng sogs me tog phreng / /ci
nus ci 'byor dbul bar bya/ /de la dbus su ni phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan bri'o/ /rin po che sna bzhi'i bum pa rin po che dang / sman
thams cad kyis bkang ba/ rin po che me tog dang / me tog kun tu rgyas pa dang / 'od dpag med dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / sgrib pa thams cad
rnam par sel ba dang / byams pa dang / sa'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa dag gis spyi bor dbang bskur ro/ /sngags pa pad+ma dam pa der/ /rab tu bzhag nas bdag
nyid kyis/ /me tog spos kyis mchod byas la/ /mar me mchod yon dbul bar bya/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /sil snyan sgra rnams phyung ba dang / /
rol mo'i sgra sil snyan mang gis/ /yang dag mngon du dga' byas la/ /skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du/ /bsgrims te de ni dbang bskur ro/ /ji ltar gling bzhi'i
dbang phyug gam/ /'khor los bsgyur rgyal dbang bskur ba/ /de bzhin sngags pas ngo mtshar dang / /bkra shis kun gyis dbang bskur ro/ /me tog rnams dang bdug pa dang / /
spos mchog rnams kyis yang mchod la/ /lag pa g.yas su rdo rje dang / /g.yon du 'khor lo bzhag nas su/ /slob ma de la 'di skad du/ /rdo rje slob dpon khyod 'gyur te/ /
de nas rdo rje ldan pa khyod/ /rdo rje chos ni rab brjod pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis khyod lag tu/ /ting 'dzin 'byung ba'i rdo rje byin/ /deng nas 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ /lag na
rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/ /sdang ba rnams ni tshar bcad dang / /bstan pa la ni gnod byed pa/ /de dag gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'dren pa rnams kyis rdo rje byin/ /ji ltar 'khor
los bsgyur ba'i rgyal/ /bdag por bya phyir dbang bskur ba/ /de bzhin chos rgyal dbang bskur phyir/ /rdo rje blo ldan dbang bskur brjod/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis/ /de la
bsrung bar bya ba ni/ /slob ma rdo rje chos brjod la/ /lag pas bslang ba byas nas su/ /dkyil 'khor chen po der khrid la/ /dam tshig dag ni rnam bsgrags te/ /byang chub sems
ni btang mi bya/ /khyod kyis byams dang snying rje dang / /lag na 'khor lo gzhar mi gtang / /blo dang ldan pas thabs rnams dang / /rdo rje bzhag pa khyod kyis ni/ /nam yang yongs su
gtang mi bya/ /blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang / /sangs rgyas dam tshig 'di yin te/ /ji ltar rang gis lus bsrungs pa/ /de ltar khyod kyis
'di srungs shig /de byas sangs rgyas byas gzo ba/ /sangs rgyas sras zhes brjod pa yin/ /gzhan du na ni dam tshig nyams/ /rdo rje can du khyod mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'chang ba
thams cad kyi/ /rigs ni byang chub sems yin te/ /rtags ni snying rje yin zhes brjod/ /thabs ni dbang du bstan pa ste/ /rdo rje bzhag pa go cha bgos/ /rdo rje mtshon cha
thogs pa yin/ /khyod la lha rnams phyag kyang 'tshal/ /khyod la bsrung ba kun tu byed/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang / /rnam pa kun tu bsrung ba mdzad/ /
lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/ dbang bskur ba'i rim par phye ba rdzogs so// //de nas 'jam rab dpal ldan pa/ /ya mtshan gyis ni mig rgyas
pas| |rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad smras/ /dpa' bo gzi brjid chen po legs/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor gang bshad pa/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa mchog /gang gis
dngos grub thob 'gyur ba/ /gsang chen bcas pa yang gsungs shig /lha rnams thams cad so so dang / /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi/ /phyag rgya dang ni sngags
bcas pa'i/ /sbyor ba rnams kyis rab sbyor dang / /bsam gtan brtan bca' man ngag dang / /ri ga pa'i chos ni gang yin dang / /brtul zhugs dang ni spyod dang rtags/ /
yul dang dus kyi rnam kun dang / /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / /de bzhin drag shul spyod pa dang / /'byung po dag ni dgug pa dang / /nor yang rab tu dgug pa dang / /gsang
sngags spyi yi mtshan nyid dang / /bye brag rnams kyang bshad par mdzod/ /'jig rten 'dir ni 'dor ba su/ /gzhan du 'gro ba su zhig gsungs/ /'di dang gzhan 'bras
'jig rten na/ /rnyed dka' rgyal ba rnams gsungs dang / /las ni gzhan gyis byas 'gyur la/ /'bras bu gzhan spyod 'gyur ba dang / /dkyil 'khor 'di dang sngags rnams
kyi| |'bras bu bdag la bshad par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ /mi yi lus kyang rnyed par dka'/ /gsang sngags 'byung ba rnyed par dka'/ /dad pa phun
sum tshogs par dka'/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis de ring khyod/ /phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che/ /bstan pa 'di yi bya ba la/ /gsang chen 'dzin par dgongs pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor
'di yi bar dag gi /cho ga rgyas par bshad par mdzod/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod kyis gang dris pa'i tshig de legs par smras pa ste/ de'i phyir/
'jam dpal/ rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig /'jam dpal/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi gsang chen ni lha gang yin pa de kho bo yin no/ /kho bo gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor yin no/ /lha'i gnas gang
yin pa de kho bo'i gnas so/ /kho bo'i gnas gang yin pa de dkyil 'khor ro/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas pa ni gsang sngags te/ dkyil 'khor med par gsang sngags
med do/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / dkyil 'khor ni/ gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa'o/ /de la gzugs yod pa ni ri mor bri ba'o/ /gzugs med pa
ni bri ba ma yin pa'o/ /gzhan yang bri bar bya ba ni bri ru rung ba'o/ /mi bri ba ni brir mi rung ba'o/ /gzhon nu/ /de la bri ba ma yin pa ni las thams cad bya'o/ /bri ba ni bya
ba dang / las kyi rgyu tsam du zad de/ de ni pha rol dad pa bskyed pa yin la/ gcig gis ni lha'i gnas su byin gyis brlabs par bya ba ste/ don gnyis bsgrub pa
dang | bya ba dang / rnal 'byor tha dad pa ma yin pa'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /slob dpon las dang / bya ba dang / dus dang / byed pa dang / nus
pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / bsam gtan du bya ba dang / man ngag dang / rnal 'byor thams cad dang ldan pa dag la dbang thob pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /gzhon
nu| de la man ngag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon dang / slob ma'o/ /slob dpon ni slob dpon gyi yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ /de ni de'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug
cing tshig bzhin du byed la mi slu ba'o/ /tshad ma de ni man ngag go /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzhan yang / tshad ma gang zhe na/ gang mdo sde dang / gsang sngags kyi
don mi slu ba dang por shes nas de'i ro myong ba dang / don de shin tu chud pas de las mi nyams ba dang / brtan par 'gyur ba de ni chos nyid do zhes tha snyad 'dogs pa de ni
man ngag bshad pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang gsungs pa de de bzhin te/ gzhan du mi 'gyur bas lha
dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad ma ste de ni mi slu ba'o/ /de mngon par rtogs pa dang / mngon sum du bya ba dang / 'bras bu 'thob pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid do/ /
gzhan yang / chos nyid de thob par byed pa'i rnal 'byor la sbyor ba nyid gang nyid gang yin pa de ni rig pa'o/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / yon tan 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i sngags
pa ni rgyal ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du bzhed do/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni gsang chen 'di/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis sngo na bshad
de| |gzhan du bri ba 'ba' zhig ni/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu bral ba yin/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / lha ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 'bras bu'i ngo bo dang / rnam par
smin pa'i ngo bo'o/ /de la 'bras bu'i ngo bo ni chos nyid rtogs pa'o/ /chos nyid de mngon sum du tho ba pa gang yin pa ni 'bras bu'o/ /'bras bu gang yin pa de rnam par
smin pa'o/ /rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ngo bo'o/ /ngo bo gang yin pa de tha snyad du lhung ba'o/ /tha snyad du lhung ba gang yin pa dang / tha snyad kyi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni
btags pa'o/ /de ni bya ba'o/ /bya ba gang yin pa de las so/ /chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni 'bras bu med/ mngon par rtogs pa med/ mngon sum du bya ba med/
rnam par byang ba med kyang las dang / rnam par smin pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'bras bu
dang / thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / rnam par byang ba ston to/ /gzung ngo / /brjod do/ /'dogs so/ /rab tu 'jog go /rnam par 'grel to/ /'chad do/ /tshul
bstan pa sna tshogs kyis tha snyad 'dogs so/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / las dang / rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten 'di zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol zhes bya ba dang / skye ba zhes bya ba dang / rga ba zhes bya ba dang / 'chi ba zhes bya dang / nad
ces bya ba dang / rgud pa zhes bya ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dus byas zhes bya ba dang / 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba dang / 'gro ba zhes bya ba dang / 'ong ba
zhes bya ba dang / rig pa zhes bya ba dang / ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / shes rab can zhes bya ba dang / rtogs pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dod chags pa zhes bya ba dang / zhe sdang zhes
bya ba dang / gti mug ces bya ba dang / 'ching ba zhes bya ba dang / thar pa zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / sred pa zhes bya ba dang / de kho
na zhes bya ba dang / yang dag pa zhes bya ba dang / mi slu ba zhes bya ba dang / mig ces bya ba dang / rna ba zhes bya ba dang / sna zhes bya ba dang / lce zhes bya dang / lus
zhes bya dang / yid ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhes bya ba dang / sgra zhes bya ba dang / dri zhes bya ba dang / ro zhes bya ba dang / reg ces bya ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /
chos zhes bya ba dang / dge 'dun zhes bya ba dang / nyan thos zhes bya ba dang / rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / lan
gcig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / lan gcig
phyir 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa zhes bya ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang / bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba
dang / 'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / lha zhes bya ba dang / klu zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin zhes bya ba dang / dri za zhes bya ba dang / lha ma yin zhes bya ba dang / nam
mkha' lding zhes bya ba dang / mi 'am ci zhes bya ba dang / lto 'phye chen po zhes bya ba dang / mi zhes bya ba dang / mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba dang / skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / bud
med ces bya ba dang / ma ning zhes bya bar 'dogs so/ /'jam dpal/ de ltar na las dang / rnam par smin pa med pa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams sa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi bsam pa tha dad pa'i dbang gis 'dogs pa mdzad do/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos de la ji ltar
gdags pa 'am/ rnam par rig par mdzad/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ las dang / rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa nyid la gdags pa 'am/ rnam par rig
par mdzad de/ 'jam dpal/ las dang / rnam par smin pa med pa stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid de la yang gcig ces bya ba 'am/ gnyis zhes bya bar 'dogs te/
de ltar grangs bstan pa rnams dang / ming gi brdar byas pa rnams kyis 'dogs pa mdzad pa la ltos/ 'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / nam mkha'i khams las dang /
rnam par smin pa med pa ma yin na/ nam mkha' la yang sngon po zhes bya ba dang / ser po zhes bya ba dang / dmar po zhes bya ba dang / dog ces bya ba dang / yangs zhes bya
ba dang / dag ces bya ba dang / ma dag ces bya bar 'dogs so/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du las dang / rnam par smin pa med pa'i sa la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dogs pa mdzad de/ 'dogs pa de yang las dang / rnam par smin pa med pas byas pa yin na/ byis pa so
so'i skye bo phyin ci log tu gyur pa rnams kyis khong du ma chud par zad de/ de dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba la gzhug pa'i sgo dkyil
'khor 'di rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /gsum ni 'dus par gyur pa las/ /sngags 'byung bar ni 'dir bstan to/ /phyag rgya'ang de bzhin 'byung ba ste/ /gzugs
can ma yin bstan du med/ /rtag tu 'jig rten gsum rnams su/ /thogs pa med cing chod pa med/ /dper na gtsub stan brten nas su/ /gtsub shing gtsubs pa
byas gyur na/ /mi yis rtsol ba byas rgyu las/ /stobs dang ldan pa'i me 'byung ngo / /de bzhin gsum ni 'dus pa las/ /gsang sngags dang ni phyag rgya lnga/ /chen po
dag ni 'byung 'gyur te/ /byung nas yid la gang bsams pa'i/ /las rnams byed par gyur pa yin/ /'jam dpal/ dper na/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis
bsams ma thag tu lha'i zas dang / skom dang / rgyan dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / bud med dang / khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang la sogs
pa thams cad 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / lha 'dus pa las thams cad 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/
dper na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che skyon thams cad dang bral ba de med par ma gyur na de'i tshe gang bsams pa de thams cad 'byung ngo / /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du
sngags kyi tshul yang khong du chud par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ gang gi tshe rang gi gzugs yongs su spangs te/ lha'i nga rgyal la the tshom med pa thob pa de'i tshe gsang sngags
kyi chos nyid des chos nyid ston te/ de'i tshe des tshig gis de'i rnam pa ston pa na bya ba nus par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ brten pa'i chos nyid ji ltar las byed nus par
'gyur ba la ltos/ 'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya la brten nas rgya'i 'bur 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rdzas med na yang rgya'i 'bur mi 'byung la/ yod kyang bya ba
dang / las dang bral na rgya'i 'bur mi 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal/ gnyis ka yang phan tshun du ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro/ /mis rtsol ba byas pa de las ci 'dir rdzas
byung ba'am/ 'on te las kyi bya ba de byung ngam gang yin te/ snga phyi 'gal ba'i phyir brten nas gsang sngags sam/ phyag rgya 'byung ba tsam la ma gtogs par 'byung ba med
do| |'jam dpal/ sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa' gzhan las rgyal ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed du blta'o/ /'di la rgyal bar byed
pa su yin zhe na/ phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang ldan pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis rgyal bar byed do/ /'jam dpal/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la rnam pa mang
por brtags pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di ni gsang sngags so/ /'di ni phyag rgya'o/ /'di ni lha'o zhes rnam par gzhag
pa mdzad do/ /chos kyi dbyings de ni gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ gzung ba ma yin pa/ dkrug pa ma yin pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas rten cing 'brel par
'byung bar rnam par gzhag pas rnam par gzhag go /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir bya ba thams cad byed do/ /'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / ji ltar gzhan gyis las
byas pa la ji ltar gzhan spyod ces gang smra ba de ni/ 'jam dpal/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lha'i bu dbang phyug rang gi sems la dbang thob pa de 'dod pa bzhin du longs
spyod sna tshogs la yongs su spyod par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i khang khyim dang / gzhal med khang la sogs pa dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / bud
med dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba la sogs pa mngon par sprul nas bdag kyang yongs su spyod cing gzhan dag la yang sbyin par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
de nyid kyis sngags de bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro/ /'jam dpal/ de bzhin du gzhan gyis byas pa la gzhan yongs su spyod do/ /'jam dpal/ gcig byed pa la mang
