shin tu gzir/ /gzir ba'i lha rnams de dag kun/ /stan las sems ni nyams par gyur/ /ci ltar ci bgyi bka' stsol ces/ /lung la gus pas lta
zhing 'khod/ /kun la byams pa byas nas su/ /snying la bsam pa gcig bslangs na/ /de yi mod la de dag rnams/ /dga' zhing mgu nas sbyin par byed/ /
sngags pa mnyam par gzhag nas su/ /de nas phyag rgya'i rgyal po btang / /rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /rdo rje'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin
pa thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje'i gnas ni rked nas gcod/ /rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su/ /dbang po chen po'i gnas su brtan/ /mtshog mar thal mo sbyar
byas la/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya/ /rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs byas la/ /gar byed pa yi lag pa yis/ /bgegs
kyi gzugs rnams bsdigs par bya/ /de bzhin g.yas dang g.yon gyis kyang / /gnas nas song gi bar du bya/ /ci ste bgegs chen rab sdang ba/ /
bsdigs kyang 'gro bar mi byed na/ /rdo rje gom pa myur bor la/ /gyen du lag pa kun tu bskyod/ /lag gnyis sa la brdabs nas su/ /'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM
brjod la/ /gsang sngags blo ldan rkang bskum ste/ /rnam pa kun tu lus bskor ro/ /de nas ldang ba'i tshul gyis su/ /rdo rje'i lag pa g.yas brkyang la/ /rdo rje lcags
kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul du ni/ /lag gnyis gcig tu sbyar byas la/ /'brug sgra dal 'dra'i
hUM rnams dang / /phaT rnams kyis ni rab bskul te/ /rdo rje gzir ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gzir bar bya/ /bde gshegs go 'phang
ma gtogs par/ /rdo rje can dang 'khor lo can/ /sangs rgyas sras po gang zhig gis/ /de yis lus la mi sems na/ /lha dang dri za gsang ba dang / /gzhan
yang gang dag klu rnams dang / /shing bal 'dab ma rlung gtor bzhin/ /hUM brjod 'jigs 'gyur smos ci dgos/ /lha min srin po ma rungs dang / /yi dwags
grul bum mngag gzhug dang / /bdud dang bdud kyi pho nya rnams/ /'di ltar 'gyur ba ci zhig smos/ /byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag cing / /snying rje la yang
mnyam bzhag nas/ /byang chub sems dran sngags pa yis/ /phyag rgya bsdu ba brtsam par bya/ /nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi phyir/ /
bgegs rnams la ni gnod mi bya/ /shin tu sdang bar rig nas ni/ /gal te bgegs la gnod bya na/ /shin tu sdang ba drag rnams la/ /'jam des nyid ni mi
bya'o| |gal te 'jam des nyid byas na/ /de yi mod la gnod par byed/ /thog mar 'jam por sbyar bar bya/ /lan gnyis tshe ni dbye bar brtson/ /gsum
tshe mchod yon thogs nas su/ /me tog snyim par gnas byas la/ /de nas bgegs la mchod par bya/ /'byung po kun phan gtor byin nas/ /'di skad
kyi ni tshig brjod da/ /bdag gis de ring khyod mchod kyi/ /song zhig bgegs chen 'gro bar gyis/ /phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig /khyod kyi stobs dang
rtsal mthong ste/ /khyod ni bgegs kyang byed par nus/ /khyod ni lha yis sprul pa ste/ /khyod ni bgegs byed mi nus min/ /sngon chad mchod pa ma thob pa/ /de
ring bdag gis mchod byas na/ /khyod kyis da ni mchod khyer la/ /bgegs kyi dbang po song zhes brjod/ /gal te 'dug kyang bgegs min na/ /de yi spyod
pa bzang po yin/ /sngags pas mchod byas 'on kyang ni/ /ci ste bgegs ni yang byed na/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dpang gyur pas/ /mi mchog rnams la mkhyen
pa gsol/ /bgegs la chad pas gcad slad du/ /sbyor ba bgyis kyang nongs ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras/ /byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi ni/ /bka' dang bdag 'gal mi bgyid brjod/ /lha dang lha min gsang rnams dang / /phyogs bcu kun gyi dri za dang / /gza' dang mi'am ci gang dag/
mgon po mgon po che rnams la/ /bgegs kyis gtses pa bsgrag par bya/ /gal te cung zhig bskyab ce na/ /myur du yongs su skyobs shig ces/ /bsgrags pa
gang dag mnyan byas nas/ /bgegs byed zhi bar gyur na ni/ /de nas phyogs rnams thams cad kyi/ /lha rnams la ni mchod pa bya/ /gal te de ltar mi 'dug na/ /
me tog thal mo mchod yon gyis/ /sangs rgyas la sogs rab bskul la/ /de la chad pas gcad par bya/ /drag po shin tu sdang sems pa/ /bka' lung las ni
'gal byed cing / /srog kyang shin tu 'phrog byed la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi g.yel bar/ /de la phan par shes nas su/ /bskal pa bye ba du mar ni/ /
sems dmyal rnams su skye ba yi/ /sdug bsngal mang po 'dir 'gyur te/ /de ltar sman pas sems can gyi/ /nad rnams med par
byed pa bzhin/ /gzir bas bdag la nyes pa med/ /mkhas pa rnam par sbyangs pa yi/ /de ltar sems ni mnyam bzhag cing / /snying rje'i yid dang ldan pa yis/
byang chub sems ni brtan byas te/ /de la chad pas bcad pa brtsam/ /ji ltar sman pa mkhas pa yis/ /nyes te yal bar mi 'dor bzhin/ /thabs dang shes rab
mkhas pa yang / /mi byed mkhas na'ang nyes dang bcas/ /ji ltar sman pa mi mkhas pa/ /thabs dang shes rab bral ba yis/ /nad pa yal bar 'dor byed cing //
gso ba'i cho ga mi byed pa/ /de bzhin shes dang bral ba yis/ /gal te gso bar brtson na yang / /thabs dang shes rab bral ba la/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bsngags
mi mdzad/ /nad pa nad pa rnams la ni/ /sman pas ji ltar sman byin pa/ /tshwa dang kha dang bska ba yang / /'jig rten smod par mi byed pa/ /de bzhin 'dul ba'i
bye brag gis/ /ci rigs pa ni gso bar bya/ /sdang ba'i sems can rnams la ni/ /'phyas te sangs rgyas rnams mi smod/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /
shin tu rmad byung rgyal ba byung / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ /'gro ba'i chos ni 'di 'dra ste/ /shin tu sdang sems drag po yi/ /sems can thams
cad de tshe byung / /shin tu drag po mthong nas ni/ /'jam po nyid du mi sbyor te/ /shes rab thabs kyi snying stobs can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /
rdo rje'i snying stobs khros gyur pa/ /sems can rnams la phan byed pa/ /de nas pha rol gnon pa yis/ /sems can khams ni du ma gnon/ /sdig med nan gyis
stobs gyis su/ /thams cad dbang du dgod par bya/ /pha rol gnon pa'i rigs tshul gyis/ /ji ltar byang chub 'dod byas nas/ /sems can khams ni du ma dag/
thams cad dbang du dgod par byas/ /rdo rje slob dpon chen po yis/ /log 'dren bgegs rnams de ltar dgod/ /byang chub sems dran bsgrim byas nas/ /skyon
gyis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir sngags pa che khros la/ /bskal pa'i me yi mthu lta bus/ /rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gcad par
bya| |rkang pa'i tshul ni de nyid kyis/ /rdo rje'i gar gyis gar byas la/ /rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang zhes 'dor/ /rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas brten te/ /rked pa'i gnas
kyi ral gri de/ /shugs nas phyung nas gdab par bya/ /rno ba med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /shugs kyis lag pa sar bsdams la/ /rkang pa spo
ba'i tshul gyis su/ /ral gri 'phyar ba 'dra bar bzung / /ral gri tshul du gzhug pa ni/ /mdzub mo gung mgo gshibs par bya/ /de nas lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /
ral gri shubs su bya ba ni/ /mthe'u chung dang ni srin lag dang / /mthe bos ral gri shubs su bya/ /de nas rkang pa g.yas pa yis/ /sa la bgegs kyi gzugs
bris te/ /so yis mchu mnan khros byas la/ /bdag ni rdo rje nyi 'bar bas/ /rkang pas mgo ni mnan byas nas/ /lag pas ral gri phyung nas su/ /rdo rje 'gro ba'i
gom stabs kyis/ /gar gyi tshul du kun bskyod de/ /rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gcad par bya/ /rdo rje ldan des gang bcom pa/ /de
ni srog la mi sems so/ /de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur/ /yang na 'chi 'gyur the tshom med/ /brgya byin mtshungs pa'i bgegs zhig na'ang / /de yang mod la brlag
par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon che/ /snying rje snying brtse'i sems ldan pas/ /ji ltar de yang skye 'gyur ba/ /de ltar de la snying brtser bya/ /rdo rje ral gri'i stang
stabs so/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon ches/ /rdo rje gtub par bya ba byas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis/ /gnod par sems pa thams cad gtub/ /rdo rje 'byung
bar 'dug nas su/ /rdo rje mthu rtsal brtsam byas la/ /rkang pa bteg cing bzhag tshul gyis/ /rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya/ /'khor los bsgyur bar bya rim gyi/ /pad+mo'i thal
mo sbyar byas la/ /rkang pa rnam par bzhag byas nas/ /sa la 'khor lo 'phang bar bya/ /rting sprad gnas su 'dug byas la/ /'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM brjod de/ /thal mo
brdab pa'i tshul gyis su/ /sa la 'khor los bsnun par bya/ /bzlog ste lan bur byas nas su/ /lag pa sbyar ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /'khor lo lta bur byas nas su/ /
gyen du 'phang la gzhig par bya/ /bkug ste rkyang pas mgo mnan nas/ /bgegs rnams la ni bsnun par bya/ /'on te rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /yang na zhi 'gyur the
tshom med/ /de ltar rim pa'i tshul 'di yis/ /bgegs rnams la ni gnod par bya/ /sdig pa'i gnod pa med par ni/ /bskul yang bde bar mi 'dong ngo / /gal te rdo
rje sems dpa' che/ /snying rje'i sems dang ldan gyur pas/ /bgegs la zhi bar bya 'dod na/ /cho ga 'di yis tshul du bya/ /ba lang gi ni lci ba las/ /de 'dra ba yi gzugs
byas la/ /sngags pas zhi ba'i sems kyis su/ /sngags pas 'o mam bkrus nas ni/ /mod la snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur/ /de ltar kun tu
bgegs rnams ni/ /kun la cho ga 'di bzhin bya/ /rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /gsang sngags rnams la'ang sbyar bya ste/ /gcad dang gnod pa byas pa dang / /
bkag pa dang ni bcing ba'ang rung / /gal te bsgrub par 'dod pa ni/ /de nas snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur/ /'on kyang gsang sngags rnams la ni/ /bye brag tu ni spos
kyis bya/ /ba ni ser mo'i 'o ma dang / /yang na mar gyi sbyin sreg bya/ /yang na brgya dang rtsa brgyad kyis/ /sbyin sreg gis ni kun zhi 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba
ste| |dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas pa'o/ /drag shul spyod lam gang yin pa/ /de ni khros pas brtsam par bya/ /de ltar las ni ci rigs pas/ /gsang sngags
rnams la sngags pas bya/ /rnam pa gzhan du mi bya ste/ /las kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i stang stabs so/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas kyang / /
rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas su/ /mtshog mar thal mo sbyar byas te/ /rdo rje'i gar ni rab tu byas/ /rting sprad rnams kyi tshul gyis su/ /smin bsgyur rkang pas reg par
bya| |lag pa gnyis kas sa la byug /de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang / /yid kyis bskor ba'i tshul gyis su/ /rkang pa 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /lag gnyis
rked pa'i gnas bzhag la/ /rdo rje'i bgad pa rab byed cing / /lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng bar bya/ /rdo rje'i mdzub mos rab tu bsdigs/ /hUM brjod bsgyings dang bcas
byas la/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i mig ldan pas/ /rdo rje'i mdzub mos bsdigs nas ni/ /bdud kyi dbang phyug bdag nyid kyang / /bltas pas de ni mod la 'bros/ /bya rog bong rdo
'phen mthong bzhin/ /rdo rje bgad pa'o/ /de nas rdo rje sngags pa ches/ /rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas su/ /mi mthun rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa bsnol te khu tshur
bcang / /mthe bo gyen du bsgreng byas la/ /gung mo gshibs te bsgreng bar bya/ /mdzub mo de gnyis zla la bsgreng / /rdo rje kha zhes brjod pa yin/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg
par bya/ /g.yon pa gzugs shing de bzhin bya/ /rdo rje lce ni me ltar 'bar/ /rgod ma'i kha ltar mngon sum bya/ /'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM brjod de/ /kha yi thad kar gzhag
par bya/ /phyogs rnams dag ni thams cad kyi/ /rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu 'thungs na/ /mig sngar snang bar gyur pa yi/ /sdang ba kun lta smos ci dgos/ /de ltar byas na phyogs
bzhi po/ /kun nas 'byung ba thams cad skems/ /'tshub ma kun dang lce 'bab dang / /sprin rnams kun nas 'du ba dang / /rdo rje'i kha ni glal
ba dang / /gtor bas rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten du ni ltas byung ba/ /kun nas gnas grub gang yin pa/ /sngags pas rdo rje me lce yi/ /me ltar bsgyur na
de kun zhi/ /rdo rje kha yi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bca' bar bya/ /rdo
rje kha glal ba'i gar stabs so/ /de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor che/ /rdo rje ye shes bsgyur nas su/ /bgegs la gso ba byas na ni/ /nyes pa yod pa ma yin no/ /rgyal
ba'i ye shes las byung ba'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon gso byed pas/ /bdag 'drar sngags pa de 'dra ste/ /sngags ba ci 'drar rgyal de bzhin/ /sems can kun la
snying rje dang / /byang chub sems ni brtan bya ste/ /thabs kyi dam pa thob 'gyur pas/ /rnam par gso ba thams cad bya/ /gzhan du na ni phyogs rnams na/ /bzhugs
pa'i sangs rgyas bsngags mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dang bral ba ni/ /lha yi mchod 'os ma yin no/ /thabs dang shes rab bral gyur pas/ /rgyal ba'i
sras po nyan thos dang / /gang yang rang sangs rgyas dag ni/ /dka' thub gnas la gnas pa ste/ /bdag don phan pa'i sems ldan pas/ /de dag la ni bya ba med/ /thabs
dang ye shes las byung ba/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can/ /byang chub sems kyi shing rta dang / /byams dang snying rje'i kha bsgyur dang / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang / /
bsdu ba bzhi yi rdo rje dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sa dang / /byang chub phyogs kyi rtsa lag la/ /brten nas sangs rgyas sras po rnams/ /sems can don
dga'i rtse bas brtse/ /de ltar slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /thabs dang ye shes mkhas pa yis/ /sdang ba rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /sems ni rab tu gso bar
bya| |rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang / /rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas ni/ /rkang pa mthun pa'i gnas bzhag ste/ /rdo rje thal mo gzhum byas la/ /rdo rje'i gar ni
byas nas su/ /lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng / /g.yon pa kos kor brten nas su/ /gung mo dang ni mdzub mo gshib/ /mthe chung mthe bo sprad par bya/ /
g.yas pa lha yi ba dan gsum/ /g.yas brkyang rkang par gnas nas su/ /rdo rje bgad pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /kye ma bdag nyid rdo rje can/ /bdag nyid du ni bdag
gnas so/ /hUM brjod bsnyems dang khros pa yis/ /rdo rje gar gyis gtang bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rjes bsdigs/ /rdo rje bgad pas
bsdigs pas na/ /lha dang lha min gsang bar bcas/ /dkyil 'khor tshe 'am bsgrub pa'i tshe/ /bgegs byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mar
bcing / /gtsug nas byung ba nyid kyang ni/ /bgegs byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum zhes/ /bgegs rnams phan tshun smra byed cing / /
bsrung ba'i phyir ni de dag kun/ /lhan cig dkyil 'khor drung du 'dong / /rdo rje stangs kyis bskul bas na/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che/ /bsod nams tshogs ni
bsags pa la/ /gzhan rnams thams cad phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis de na yang / /rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/ /pad+mo'i thal mo sbyar nas su/ /phyogs
rnams kun tu rgyas par bya/ /g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul byas te/ /bskal pa'i me yi 'od 'dra bas/ /thal mo brdabs pa'i tshul gyis su/ /khros te lag pa
gdab par bya/ /lag gnyis rdo rje'i tshul gyis su/ /mthe'u chung mthe bong sbrad byas la/ /g.yon pas kos kor brten nas su/ /g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng
byas la/ /A hUM hUM hUM brjod de bskul ba yis/ /sngags pas kun tu sgra yang brjod/ /rdo rje'i sgra ni byung ba na/ /sdang ba thams cad phung bar 'gyur/ /brgya byin tshangs
dang zla ba sogs/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gza' gzhan yang / /thos pa tsam gyis sa g.yos te/ /kun tu sgra yi sems kyang nyams/ /de tshe thal mo sbyar te 'dud/ /rdo rje
sgra chen gang na bar/ /thams cad lhan cig lhags nas su/ /rdo rje sgra yis gzir gyur te/ /stan las sems ni nyams pas na/ /mnga' bdag sug las ci 'tshal
ba| |bdag cag myur du bka' stsol ces/ /sngags pa la ni lung yang nod/ /sngags pas bsams te gar byas na/ /lha rnams myur du grol bar 'gyur/ /de nas
byams pa'i sems bskyed la/ /brtul zhugs can gyis phyag rgya dgrol/ /rdo rje kun tu sgra'o/ /rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su/ /rdo rje gar ni 'bar byas la/ /rdo rje thal
mo sbyar nas su/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas byas te/ /mi mthun rkang stabs byas nas su/ /bsnol te khu tshur bcangs byas la/ /mthe bong gnyis ni gshibs te
bsgreng | |gung mo gnyis ni gshibs byas la/ /mdzub mo dbu ma'i tshig bkug ste/ /gung mo gnyis la sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje kha ni byas pas na/ /sdang ba thams cad
zhi bar 'gyur/ /kha yi thad kar bzhag na ni/ /rdo rje sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bdag ni rdo rje chen po can/ /rdo rje ye shes stobs dang
ldan| |hri ha hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ /rdo rje'i gom stabs tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje gnon po'i gom pa yis/ /bzhag dang 'degs pas 'gro byed cing / /phyogs
rnams bzhi por brjod par bya/ /rdo rje sgra byung bskul bas na/ /bgegs chen rnams dang grags rnams dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha rnams kyang / /de yi
mdun du 'gro bar byed/ /rdo rje sgra yis bdag cag tshig /rdo rje sgra yis bskul bas na/ /bdag cag rang gi gnas nas g.yos/ /rdo rje dbang po bka' myur stsol/ /
gal te dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam/ /rgyal srid dngul chu mig bsku dang / /kun nas gter rnams gzigs bzhed dam/ /bka' stsol cig ces de skad smra/ /dga' bar
byin nas sgrub po la/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa byas nas dong / /rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang / /rdo rje'i slob dpon mthu chen gyis/ /rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la/ /
rdo rje can gyis phyag rgya bcing / /rkang ba bus mor btsugs nas su/ /lag pa gnyis ni khu tshur bcang / /gung mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas su/ /mdzub mo gnyis ni
ngos la sbyar/ /g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas nas su/ /myur du rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis/ /'khrul 'khor kun la bsnun byas la/ /sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya/ /
lha min gnod sbyin rgyal po dang / /srin po rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyang / /thams cad rang gi gnas nas g.yos/ /bskal pa zad dam ji snyam sems/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas
bsnun pas na/ /sems ni blong zhes gyur nas su/ /ye shes rdo rje che ldan pa/ /gal ba der nye bar dong / /rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag tshig /sngags pas dpal gyi
sgo bzhed dam/ /'on te dngul chu bcud len bzhed/ /rdo rje dbang pos bka' myur stsol/ /smras nas kun gyis de mod la/ /yid la 'dod pa sbyin par byed/ /gal
te lha dang lha ma yin/ /gsang ba bkol bar 'dod na yang / /'dod pas de dag lhags nas su/ /'dod pa bzhin du las byed do/ /lung dang 'gal bar byed pa
dag |ci ste dam bcas mi 'ong na/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba po/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas yongs ldan pa/ /sos ni mchu mnan khros pa dang / /me 'bar lta bur 'jigs
rung bas/ /myur du rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis/ /sa rnams kun la pa bsnun par bya/ /g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas nas su/ /ci ste dam bcas mi 'ong na/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas
bsnun par bya/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na/ /a la la zhes de skad smra/ /stan las lus kyang rab tu nyams/ /lus ni me yis rab tu 'bar//
rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po pa/ /ga la ba der nye bar dong / /bskal ba chen pos yongs su skyobs/ /bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol/ /lha dang gsang ba lha min rnams/ /
'phral du bsgo ba'i lung bzhin byed/ /bsgo ba'i lung ni bsgrubs nas su/ /rang rang gi ni gnas su dong / /de lta na ni lha dbang song / /de lta ma yin mi gtong ngo / /de nas
bsgo lung bzhin byas nas/ /de dag myur du gnas su dong / /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos/ /de nas phyag rgya btang byas te/ /rdo rje'i gar gyi tshul gyis ni/ /rked pa'i
gnas su gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang / /rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la/ /rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /sdang ba thams cad bcing bar bya/ /dus bzhin
rab tu bskul byas la/ /gal te bsgo lung 'gal byed na/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyus dgug bya zhing / /rdo rje'i zhags pas bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje rnam pa'i sgra'o/ /rdo rje thal
mo btsum nas su/ /mthun pa'i stabs su gnas bya ste/ /lag pa rgyab tu bsnun byas la/ /rdo rje gyen du 'phang bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje la bltas la/ /'brug sgra dal
'dra'i hUM brjod de/ /rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pas so/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo dang / /mthe bo rtse sprad zhags par bya/ /lag pa
g.yas pa'i mdzub mo yis/ /rtse bkug lcags kyus brtan por bya/ /rdo rje rgyas pa'i mig ldan pa/ /so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis/ /gang la bgegs ni yod pa
der| |rdo rje thabs kyis myur song la/ /rkang pa g.yas brkyang stabs byas te/ /rdo rje'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bkug bya zhing / /
rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya/ /gal te 'khor lo can dang ni/ /dbang bcas drag po tshangs bcas pa/ /gal te rdo rje 'chang srung yang / /sngags pa gzhi nas
drangs te dgug /bkug nas rdo rjes bcings pa yis/ /rdo rje'i gzeb tu gzhug par bya/ /ji srid 'dod pa rdzogs 'gyur ba/ /de srid bar du gzhag par bya/ /
bsgo ba'i lung ni mi nyan te/ /gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs na/ /bdag gi 'byor ba 'byor 'dod pas/ /de la chad pas gcad par bya/ /de yi gzugs ni byas
nas su/ /rdo rje'i rkang bas gzir byas na/ /ha ha ha zhes sgra 'byin cing / /lha yi dbang po'ang 'ong bar 'gyur/ /de la bsgo ba'i lung yang 'bog /rdo rje gar gyi/
de nas yang / /thal mo shin tu sbyar byas la/ /dbang chen stabs kyis 'dug nas su/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas bar bya/ /rkang pa
spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spo/ /lag pa gnyis ni sbyar nas su/ /phan tshun bsnol te khu tshur bcang / /gung mo gnyis ni bshibs
nas su/ /mdzub mo de la gzugs par bya/ /nga yi rdo rje phyag rgya de/ /bgegs rnams kun gyi dam tshig yin/ /snga ma bzhin du stabs tshul gyi/ /phyag rgyas
bgegs rnams bkug nas su/ /khro bo yi ni rdo rje 'dis/ /de la dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje stabs kyis phyag rgya bcing / /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la/ /bdag
nyid rdo rje bsgyur nas su/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /lan ni smra bar mi byed na/ /de ni gtang bar mi bya 'o/ /gal te cung zad mi smra na/ /de la
chad pas gcad bya ste/ /shing gi dug dang star bu dang / /yungs kar dag ni bsregs pa las/ /de yi gzugs ni byas nas su/ /me yi nang du bor byas na/ /
gal te tshangs pas bsrungs na yang / /bgegs de de yi mod la 'gro/ /sngags pas de la bsro bar bya/ /de nas de la rgyas par bya/ /byams pa'i sems
ni bskyed nas su/ /phyag rgya btang bar bsam byas na/ /gzir dang bcing dang dgug pa rnams/ /thar nas bde bar gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang //
ye shes che la rab gzhol zhing / /sems can don la snying rje bas/ /rdo rje nyid du yang bsgyur te/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/ /rdo
rje thal mo legs sbyar te/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya/ /gom pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spo/ /lag pa gar byed tshul gyis ni/ /
de nas thal mo yang sbyar ro/ /gom pa bskyod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /mkhas pas phyogs bzhi rnams su bskor/ /rdo rje rengs byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams
thams cad rengs par bya/ /myur du rdo rje gom pa yis/ /phyogs rnams rdo rje rengs par bya/ /rtse mo brgyad pa'i lhun po che/ /rdo rje mtshan can bsam par bya/ /'og
tu lag pa rdo rje can/ /steng du g.yas pa'ing rdo rje can/ /rdo rje rengs byed rab byed cing / /phyogs rnams kun tu bskor byas na/ /gang dag sdang ba'i sems ldan pa//
bgegs rnams thams cad rengs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje rengs byed byas pas na/ /bgegs byed phyir ni 'tsho mi byed/ /de yi spyi bor rdo rje ni/ /legs par 'dug
par bsam byas na/ /tshangs pa'i gnas la thug pa nas/ /sa 'og bdun la thug pa'i bar/ /rdo rje rengs pas rengs 'gyur te/ /rmongs
shing sems kyang med par 'gyur/ /sngags pa mkhas pas 'dod bar du/ /de srid du ni rengs par byed/ /rdo rje tshul gyis de nas kyang / /rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas
la| |mtshog mar thal mo sbyar byas te/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas byas na/ /kun nas 'byung ba'i chu rnams kyang / /sngags pas skam par byed par nus/ /mthun
pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /rdo rje'i thal mo gzhum byas la/ /lag pa g.yas pa gyen du ni/ /zhags pa bcas pas brkyang bar bya/ /de bzhin rkang pa
g.yon pa ni/ /g.yon dang lhan cig gdeg par bya/ /de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang / /gom pa 'dor ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /mngon du bskal pa'i me lta
bu| |so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis/ /'og logs su ni mig bltas te/ /rdo rje'i gom pas myur song la/ /rkang pa g.yon pa bskum byas te/ /lhun po'i rtse
mor gzhag par bya/ /'og ma shugs nas 'byin pa'i lag /g.yas pa steng nas de bzhin te/ /mchong ba'i rkang stabs sbyar ba yis/ /kha yi tshul du 'dug par
bya| |rgod ma rta yi kha tshul gyis/ /rgya mtsho'i chu rnams btung bar bya/ /rdo rje ldan pas bshad pa yis/ /bsam gtan sngags pa ldan gyur nas/ /chu ni a la la zhes
su| |sgra 'byin nas ni 'du 'gyur na/ /'bab chu dang ni chu klung dang / /sprin las byung ba smos ci dgos/ /bskyod na gal te 'o ma yi/ /chu las byung ba'ang skam par 'gyur/
rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang / /rdo rje'i thal mo mtshog mar sbyar/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas byas te/ /sprin bzhin yongs su rgyas par bya/ /dbang chen gom stabs
byas nas su/ /rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pa gyen bteg ste/ /de nas sa la gzhag par bya/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/ /g.yas phyogs su ni
bskor bar bya/ /lag gnyis khu tshur tshul gyis su/ /rdo rje ldan pa g.yas pa bsgreng / /g.yon pa mkhur bar brten nas su/ /'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor/ /
de bzhin g.yas pa gzhag nas su/ /lag pa g.yon pas yongs su bskor/ /g.yas pa mkhur bar brten nas su/ /rdo rje ldan pa g.yon pa bsgreng / /rdo rje gom pas
myur song la/ /g.yas pa brkyang ba'i gom stabs kyis/ /ti se'i rtse mor rkang bzhag ste/ /rkang stabs sbyar ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /lus ni 'dud pa byas nas su/ /
rengs byed rtsa bar sbyor ldan pas/ /so yis chu mnan khros gyur cing / /bdag nyid me dang 'dra 'gyur ba/ /stobs chen sgra yang che ldan pa/ /
gtum po chen po pha rol gnon/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis steng bskor la/ /nges par gnon pa blang bar bya/ /sngags pa sngags la 'jigs med pa/ /des ni gang du khros
pa 'dor/ /rdo rje des gnon tshul gyis ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pa btsugs nas su/ /rdo rje gnon pas bsnun byas na/ /dbang po chen po'ang phye mar rlog /rdo rje gnon
pas bsnun byas na/ /sa rnams thams cad rab tu g.yos/ /lhun po man dAr ti se dang / /khor yug ri rnams g.yo 'gyur na/ /lha mi sgo lta smos ci dgos/ /rdo rje
ldan pas bshad na'o/ /bsnun pas rnam pa brgyar 'gyur te/ /phub ma sbar gang rlung gtor bzhin/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos/ /sa sbyang brtsam par bya ba
ni| |rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su/ /snying gar bzhag ste rgyas par bya/ /rkang pa rting pa sprad nas su/ /lag pa gar byed sbyong ba dang / /rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis
su| |g.yas dang g.yon pa gzhag par bya/ /rkang pa bskyod pa byas nas su/ /de nas rting pa yang sprad de/ /gar gyi tshul ni de nyid kyis/ /phyogs bzhir yongs
su bskor bar bya/ /khros pas dbus kyi gnas su ni/ /rdo rje gom pas myur song la/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su/ /gung mos srin lag 'khyud byas la/ /gnyi ga khu
tshur bcang byas te/ /rting pa sprad pa'i rkang stabs kyis/ /sa la bzhag dang bteg byas te/ /g.yas su yongs su brkyang byas la/ /bar bur thams cad bsal bar
bya| |me me zhes ni brjod byas la/ /nang na gang dag ci yod pa/ /sngags pas thams cad bsal bar bya/ /hUM dang bcas shing phaT bcas pa'i/ /gsang sngags
mkhas pas brjod par bya/ /'og dang sa yi steng na ni/ /bar bur thams cad zhi 'gyur te/ /kun tu bgegs ni med gyur nas/ /sngags pas mnyam gzhag las rnams
bya| |de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje bzhag pa legs bslabs pas/ /rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/ /tshangs pa'i rkeng stabs byas nas su/ /pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar
byas te/ /snying ga'i thad kar bskor bar bya/ /gar byed tshul gyis lag pa gnyis/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcang bar bya/ /g.yon pa g.yon du brkyang bar bya/ /g.yas pa
g.yas su brkyang bar bya/ /mthun pa'i rkang thabs byas nas su/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod la/ /sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /rdo rje gom pas myur song
la| |g.yas brkyang gom stabs tshul gyis ni/ /rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su/ /de nyid kyis ni yang bskor ro/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra
phyung la/ /de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang / /rdo rje khu tshur bskor bas na/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'dar bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje blo dang ldan pa yis/ /sa
bsdus 'dor bar 'dod na ni/ /gom pa bzhag pa'i 'gros kyis su/ /myur du g.yas pa brkyang byas la/ /gcig ni ri rab rtse la bzhag /gcig shos ti se'i rtse
mor bzhag /de ltar rkang stabs bzhag pa ni/ /kun tu 'dor bar rab byed cing / /sa 'og na ni lag pa g.yon/ /g.yas pa sa yi steng na ste/ /ha ha zhes ni
sgra 'byin cing / /'jig rten khams su 'phen byed pa/ /bgegs rnams gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /log 'dren sdang ba drag po rnams/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'di nas
ni| |gzhan du 'phen pa smos ci dgos/ /ci ste 'jig rten khams rnams kyang / /kun nas tshig par byed 'dod na'ang / /rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid kyis/ /phyogs
bzhi dag tu 'jug par bya/ /rdo rje'i gom pas myur song la/ /g.yas pa brkyang ba'i stabs tshul gyis/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis lta bur ni/ /me lce'i phreng ldan bzod
dka' ba/ /rkang pa g.yon pa brtan byas la/ /rdo rje 'dzin de lag pa bsgreng / /lus ni btud par byas nas su/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg byas la/ /sngags pas 'khor
lo bzhin du bskor/ /rlung rnams kun kyang sdud byed cing / /nam mkha' ma 'drar bsgyur nas su/ /bsreg pa'i bskal pa lta bur 'jug /lag na 'dzin pa'i
rdo rje ni/ /kun tu ri rab 'drar bsams la/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgras gnon zhing / /rdo rje 'og tu 'phang byas na/ /ri dang nags su bcas pa yi/ /sa rnams thams cad
'khrug par 'gyur/ /de nas thal ba nyid 'gyur te/ /mer ni shing bal bcug pa bzhin/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos/ /de nas bsdu ba brtsam byas te/ /rkang stabs
tshul ni de nyid de/ /bye brag tu ni lag pa bsgreng / /rdo rje gom pas myur song la/ /mchongs ba bskor ba byas nas su/ /phyag rgya yi ni stang stabs bya/ /rgyab nas rkang
stabs tshul gyis ni/ /dbus kyi gnas su phyin par bya/ /de bzhin phyogs bcu rnams su yang / /rdo rje bsnun pas brdeg par bya/ /rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid dang / /
sngags pa blo ldan lag tshul gyis/ /sa rnams thams cad blangs byas la/ /de nyid du ni gzhag par bya/ /kun nas bsdu bar rab byed cing / /mkhas pas gsang sngags
brjod byas la/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad pa bzhin/ /sa rnams kun tu gzhag par bya/ /rim ba'i tshul ni 'di nyid kyis/ /mkhas pas thams
cad kun tu bzhag /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje zhags pa legs bslabs pas/ /sdang ba lha dang lha min dang / /mi rnams gzhag bya gdul bar bya/ /bsam
dbang bzhin du 'byung ba yi/ /rdo rje'i ye shes legs bslabs pas/ /'dul ba'i tshogs ni tha dad pa/ /thams cad rnam par gdul bar bya/ /gdung pas
'dul ba'i 'jig rten na/ /gdung ba nyid kyis grub par 'gyur/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni/ /dpa' bo'i lnga po kun tu bya/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs
byas nas su/ /g.yas brkyang stabs kyis gnon par bya/ /rkang stabs bzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /'ben la lta zhing lag pas gtad/ /srin lag mthe'u
chung sprad byas la/ /lag gnyis lu gu rgyud du bya/ /g.yon pa'i gung mo mtheb mtshungs sbyar/ /g.yas pa yi ni mdzub mo de/ /brkyang pa'i tshul du byas
pa ni| |gzhu dang mda' zhes brjod pa yin/ /gung mo yi ni rgyab logs su/ /mdzub mo mda' yi tshul du bzhag /g.yas brkyang rkang stabs tshul gyis ni/ /
hUM bcas brjod de phog par bsnun/ /gal te sa yi 'og gnas sam/ /tshangs pa rab tu gnas gyur tam/ /drag pas bsrungs par gyur kyang rung / /rdo rje 'phang bar
byas nas su/ /rdo rje mda' yis phog gyur na/ /de ni gson par mi bsam mo/ /'phang ba'i stang stabs so/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /thabs shes pa la
mkhas gyur cing / /'phang ba'i tshul du legs bslabs pa/ /sdang ba'i sems can 'dul bar bya/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje zhags pa legs
bslabs pas/ /srid pa gsum la khyab lus kyis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'dul bar bya/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /rkang pa bzhag pa'i
tshul gyis ni/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa yis/ /thal mo khong stong sbyar bar bya/ /de yi phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /phyogs rnams kun la bskor byas na/ /
srid pa gsum yang 'gugs 'gyur na/ /log 'dren bgegs rnams smos ci dgos/ /dgug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /mthun
pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar byas la/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rgyas par bya/ /rkang stabs bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su/ /gnas ni myur du bzung
byas la/ /rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag /khros pas hUM gi sgra brjod de/ /rgya mtsho bzhi po'i gnas rnams la/ /rdo rje'i lag pas bsnun par
bya| |klu skrag thal mo sbyar ba dag /rgya mtsho nas ni 'thon par 'gyur/ /gang dag sa yi 'og gnas pa/ /lha min gsang ba srin po rnams/ /bsgo ba'i lung la
brtson yid kyis/ /ci 'tshol cig ces 'khod par byed/ /rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag gzir/ /gnod sbyin mo'am srin mo'am/ /lha min mo'am klu mo 'am//
bcud kyis len nam dngul chu'am/ /rin chen rnams sam nor bu rgyan/ /dpal dang phun sum 'dod ldan nam/ /thugs la ci dang ci bzhed pa/ /bdag cag
rnams la bka' stsol cig /sngags pas gang yang rung blangs te/ /gsang ba pa kun gtang bar bya/ /bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal byed pa/ /ci ste bsgo yang mi 'ong
na| |rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid kyis/ /g.yon brkyang stabs kyis mnan par bya/ /lhun po la ni rkang bzhag ste/ /lag pas dbyug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgra sgrog
cing ni thams cad nas/ /sa 'og thams cad mnan par bya/ /ha ha zhes ni sgra 'don cing / /bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal byed pa/ /thams cad kyis ni gzung
nas su/ /shin tu myur bar 'bul bar byed/ /sngags pas de gcig tshar bcad de/ /lhag ma thams cad gtang bar bya/ /bsgo ba'i lung la de bzhag la/ /mkhas
pas legs par bslabs par bya/ /gsang ba srin po thams cad la/ /byams pa'i sems ni yang bskyed de/ /de dag dam tshig byin nas ni/ /de rnams kun tu gtang
bar bya// //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las// //bam po bcu gcig pa/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /snying brtse snying rje'i sems ldan pas//
mi dang mi min la sogs pa/ /shin tu gnod byed lha rnams dang / /lha min gsang bar bcas pa rnams/ /gzhan yang sdang ba'i gdon la sogs/ /nad sprul dug la
sogs rnams kyis/ /sems can rnams la gnod byed cing / /dam tshig la ni mi gnas te/ /rgyags pa'i yid dang ldan pa dag /nad dang mu ge la sogs pas/ /
sems can rnams la gnod byed de/ /pha rol la gnod mngon dga' ba/ /de dag snying rje med pa dang / /bstan pa las ni 'gal byed cing / /shin tu rgyags pa'i
shas che ba/ /mthong nas de dag tshar gcad phyir/ /sngags pa mkhas pas sbyar bar bya/ /bdag la sdig par 'gyur snyam du/ /bdag nyid las ni mi sems
shing / /bdag nyid la min zhugs gyur la/ /gzhan dang gzhan yang phung byed pa/ /gzhan la gnod byed de dag la/ /sngags pas bzod
par mi bya ste/ /skrag par bya zhing bcing bar bya/ /btub par bya zhing gsad par bya/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje zhags pa legs bslabs pas/ /nam
mkha' go skabs med byas te/ /rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgyur nas su/ /gus pas bsgrims bcas 'jo tshul dang / /bzhin 'dzum rgyags dang ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje'i
gar ni rab byas la/ /lag pa bskyod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu gar bya zhing / /dngos dang mthun par bzung byas la/ /bsgo ba la ni sems
bzhag cing / /rdo rje'i rang bzhin lus sra bas/ /mi mthun rkang stabs tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje 'chang bas lag bsgreng ste/ /rdo rje mig gis kun bltas la/ /srid pa
gsum po thams cad mnan/ /dpa' bo gnas su gnas nas su/ /rkang pa gdengs pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /hUM brjod 'jigs pa 'jigs rung ba/ /mig gnyis nyi ma
zla ba ste/ /kha ni rgod ma rta yi kha/ /lte ba dga' bo nye dga' bo/ /lto ba rgya mtshor bsam par bya/ /lhun po de yi mgo bo bya/ /de bzhin lag pa khor yug ri/ /
sa ni rkang pa gnyis yin te/ /nor rgyas bu sprul gsang bsrel yin/ /rlung ni de yi rna ba gnyis/ /de yi sgra rnams me yin te/ /lce ni 'jigs pa chen po'i glog/ /ha ha ha
zhes sgra chen ldan/ /'brug sgra hUM zhes sgra phyung la/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su bskor/ /rab tu bskul bas de nas ni/ /rdo rje'i sgra yis brgyal gyur nas/ /klu dang
dri za chen po dang / /lha dang lha min sogs kun dong / /hUM brjod pa ni 'jigs 'gyur zhing / /'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med/ /rdo rje sgra yis tshig gyur cing / /blong
bar gyur te dman par blta/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor che ldan pa/ /ga la ba der nye bar dong / /rdo rje chen po bka' stsol la/ /slan chad de ltar ma mdzad cig /de nas dam tshig
bzhag byas la/ /lha rnams thams cad gtang bar bya/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa gtum po che/ /'jigs pa chen po 'jigs byed pa/ /'jigs bya rnams la 'jigs
bskyed pa/ /chen pos mchod 'os rmad byung bas/ /mi dang mi ma yin rnams la/ /'jigs chen ltas 'byung che 'byung dang / /lha dang klu dang sha za dang / /gza'
dang ma mo brtse med rnams/ /nad dang mu ge la sogs dang / /yul 'khrugs pa dang 'chi byed dang / /bdud rnams dang ni log 'dren dang / /srul po srin po la
sogs pa/ /bdag yul gzhan yul las byung ba'i/ /gnod pa gzhan yang du ma rnams/ /de dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ rdo rje
'jigs byed sbyar bar bya/ /rkang pa rgyas par bya tshul gyis/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod na/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa rab bskul bas/ /thams cad myur du 'jigs
par 'gyur/ /'di ni don yod thogs pa med/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa mi bzad pa/ /sngags pas kun tu sbyor byas nas/ /srid pa gsum yang dbang 'gyur na/ /mi
yi 'jig rten mngag gzhug pa/ /byed par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/ /tshig gis cung zad bskul bas na/ /gang dag shin tu dregs ldan pa/ /srin po lha min
gsang ba dang / /de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas/ /dbang phyug kun dang yon tan 'thob/ /lha rnams kun gyi rgyal
por 'gyur/ /mkhas pas dbang la 'god par byed/ /klu yi gnas su klu rnams dang / /gnod sbyin rgyal dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za rnams kyi bdag por
'gyur/ /lha min gnas su lha min dang / /mkha' lding gnas su mkha' lding dang / /mi ci rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/ /bsgo
ba'i lung bzhin gus sems kyis/ /rdo rje 'jigs sgra che ldan pa/ /de yi dbang du thams cad 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /kun la rdo
rje rnam 'phrul pa/ /de yi 'og tu brjod par bya/ /dpal ldan mchod pa byed pa pos/ /phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs rnams kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnam pa kun tu mchod/ /srid
par bdag nyin chen rnams kyi/ /bsam yas mchod min gang yang med/ /'dzum dang bcas shing mig rgyas pas/ /g.yas pa dang ni g.yon tshul gyis/ /rdo rje'i thal
mo bcum byas la/ /phyogs bcu rnam pa kun tu 'dud/ /dpral bar thal mo sbyar byas la/ /phyogs rnams kun tu yongs bskor zhing / /dus gsum rnam par bzhugs
pa yi/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag bya'o/ /bde gshegs kun la phyag bya mchod/ /sems can gdul ba'i mchod pa ni/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'dug pa ste/ /bsam
pa tha dad sems can khams/ /bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phel/ /bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par rtog /bsam pa chags med de dang des/ /sngags pas rnam pa
thams cad du/ /sems can khams mang gdul bar bya/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /kun la shes pas cher byung ba'i/ /sgeg dang dpa' dang snying rje dang / /rgod
dang khros dang 'jigs byed dang / /'jigs rung rmad byung zhi ba rnams/ /bsam pa chags pas rnam dgur dgongs/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje
'chang / /kun la ye shes 'byung byed pa'i/ /rkang pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni/ /gom pa mdzes dang ldan pa yis/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni/ /gar byed pa yi
tshul gyis su/ /mdzub mo mthe bong rtse sprad la/ /g.yon phyogs su ni blta bar bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa sbyar tshul gyis/ /'dzum byas rgyas pa gus bsgrims shing //
lag na rdo rje gsor ldan pas/ /rjes su chags pas gar bya'o/ /lha rnams kun dang gsang ba dang / /lha ma yin dang mi rnams dang / /'dod khams dbang phyug
bdag po dang / /sa gsum gnas rnams chags byed cing / /mig zur bgrad dang lta ba yis/ /de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /sa gsum thams cad 'gugs
byed na/ /sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos/ /lha yi rgyal po sogs bkug nas/ /sdom pa can gyi dbang 'jog ste/ /thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed cing / /mngag
gzhug par ni rab tu dgod/ /rdo rje che ldan kun shes pas/ /rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya/ /rdo rje'i glu yis bskul bas na/ /rjes su chags shing chags chen 'gyur/ /
rdo rje sems dpar smos pa yis/ /glu dang gar ni rab tu bya/ /bsam pa chags pas brgyal 'gyur nas/ /sems can khams ni rjes chags bya/ /rdo rje'i glu ni 'byung ba ste//
sa gsum dag na 'bar ba'i sku mnga' rjes su chags mdzad 'dul ldan pas/ /nyi ma stong phrag bcu bas rno ba'i 'od zer stong dang ldan pa po/ /rnam mang cha byad gzugs
kyis sems can 'gro ba rjes su chags mdzad pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa mdzes pa'i stobs ldan gar mdzad gsol/ /Sha Ta ba la sogs pa'i glu/ /
rdo rje gar gyis rab byas pas/ /sa gsum thams cad 'gug byed na/ /sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos/ /rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo
rje nyid du yang bsgyur zhing / /rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad la ni gar mkhan bya/ /gom stabs thams cad mdzes ldan par/ /g.yas pa dgug pa'i phyag
rgya dang / /g.yon pas btang ba'i phyag rgya bya/ /mig zur bgrad dang lta ba yis/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa yis/ /'khyud par byed pa'i sbyor ldan pas/ /tshangs
pa la sogs lha rnams ni/ /rnam pa kun tu dbang 'gyur te/ /mngag gzhug pa ni rab byed cing / /rdo rje can gyi lung la brtson/ /rdo rje chags pas chags byas pas/ /
shin tu chags pas dregs myos pa'i/ /lha dang mi dang gsang ba pas/ /bsgrub dka' rnams kyang sngags pas bsgrub/ /rdo rje lus la
yongs chags pas/ /'dod chags thams cad yongs su dor/ /rdo rje'i glu snyan ldan pa yis/ /sems can khams rnams chags par bya/ /rjes su
chags pas chags pa'i phyir/ /lha rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i glu yi snyan pa'i sgra rnams thams cad dang / /gzod nas rang bzhin dag
pas rdo rje sems dpa' bskul/ /sgyu ma'i dngos po rnam mang dang / /snyan pa'i sgra ni de nyid dang / /sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad kyis/ /dbang bsgyur
de nas sangs rgyas snang / /'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'dren/ /bdud rnams thams cad yongs su 'dul/ /shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyong / /
sems can thams cad yongs smin byed/ /glu 'di rab tu len byed cing / /rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas na/ /lha dang gang dag gnod sbyin dang / /lha min klur
bcas thams cad 'grub/ /rdo rje'i glu ni 'dren pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje sems dpar yang bsgyur te/ /dpa' chen bsam pas kun chags
pas| |dpa' bos lnga po brten par bya/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /g.yas pa brkyang pa pha rol mnan/ /g.yon pa brkyang pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /seng ge bzhin du
bsgyings par bya/ /tshangs pa'i gnas la yang gnas te/ /rdo rje se gol sbyor ba dang / /rdo rje bsnun stabs tshul gyis ni/ /tshangs pa la sogs bsdu bar bya/ /rdo rje'i glu ni
len byed cing / /sa gsum 'bar ba'i sku ldan pa/ /nyi ma bye ba 'bar mtshungs pa/ /nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam med pa/ /chos dang rgyal mchog rnams kyi
gtso| |sangs rgyas sku mchog de la 'dud/ /so yis mchu ni rab mnan cing / /kun nas mig can khro gnyer bzhin/ /rked par rdo rje brten nas su/ /phyogs bcu
kun tu blta bar bya/ /g.yas pa rdo rje'i tshul gyis ni/ /phyogs rnams kun tu rab bsgrags pas/ /lta 'jigs 'od zer 'bar ldan zhing / /bsreg pa'i bskal pa
gzhan lta bu/ /grub 'gyur rdo rje me 'bar ba/ /'jigs pa che ltar bzod dka' bas/ /bgegs rnams la ni sbyor bar bya/ /'jig rten gsum po thal bar rlog /
nyes pa chen po ma yin la/ /phyag rgya 'di ni sbyar mi bya/ /thun mong ma yin dgos pa ni/ /tha ma'i tshe na sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje 'chang bas bsrungs gyur kyang / /hUM brjod
pas ni thal bar rlog /'jig pa'i me ltar bzod dka' bas/ /rdo rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje'i ye
shes legs bslabs pas/ /snying gar rdo rje khu tshur gnyis/ /bzhag nas 'di snyam bsam byas te/ /sems dmyal yi dwags dud 'gro dang / /gang gzhan
sdug bsngal sdug bsngal rnams/ /lag pas drang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bde ba kun gyis bstabs par bya/ /bza' btung la sogs char pa dang / /gos dang rin
chen rgyan gyi char/ /de dag rnams la kun tu dbab/ /ci bder yang dag bstabs pas na/ /snying rje spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhin/ /kun tu yongs su rgyas par
bya| |sems can kun gyi bla med bde/ /thob par shog cig bsam par bya/ /snying rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje ye shes legs
bslabs pas/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bya zhing / /mtshog mar thal mo sbyar bar bya/ /bteg dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de nas myur du smad par bya/ /rdo rje bgad
chen phyag rgya 'di/ /rdo rje 'chang nyid bzhin du dgod/ /bgad pa chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas lag g.yas bteg byas te/ /g.yon pa rked pa'i phyogs su bzhag
g.yon brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su/ /de nas thal mo yang sbyar te/ /'jigs rung sgra ni grag byed cing / /thal mo sbyar ba btud par bya/ /'jigs su rung ba chen po'i sgra'i
phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas brkyang rkang pa'i stabs byas te/ /lag pa gnyis ni rgyab rol du/ /khu tshur gnyis ni bcang bar bya/ /bgegs kun 'dar bar bya ba'i phyir/ /mgul
pa nges par smad bya zhing / /sgra chen rab tu brjod byas na/ /phyag rgya 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'dar bar 'gyur/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas
nas su/ /mtshog mar thal mo sbyar byas la/ /lag pa gnyis ka lto bar gzhag /g.yas brkyang rkang stabs sbyor ba yis/ /sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /ha
ha zhes pas rab brgyan pa/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rgya che ste/ /ri rnams phye mar rlog byed na/ /sdang ba'i sems can ci smos te/ /sngags pa'i 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur/ /mthun
pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa gyen du bsgreng byas la/ /gdu bu'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /de bzhin so yis mchu mnan cing / /g.yon pa brkyang ba legs
sbyar bas/ /bgegs rnams kun la bsnun par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni sgra chen te/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa yin/ /phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar bas/ /
thams cad bzlog par gyur pa yin/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag gnyis brang la sbyar ba las/ /lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng
byas te/ /rkang pa g.yon brkyang legs sbyar bas/ /tho ba yi ni phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje 'chang nyid yin na'ang bsnun/ /rdo rje tho bas bsnun pas na/ /de yi mod la phye mar
'gyur| |tho ba'i stang stabs so/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yang / /lag pa mchan khung gzhug par bya/ /nyi ma 'bar 'dra'i lta 'dra bas/ /hUM brjod bsnyems
pas thur du blta/ /lag na rdo rje nyid bsgyur te/ /'jigs su rung ba'i sgra byung la/ /rgya mtsho man dA ra bcas pa yis/ /sa rnams thams cad g.yo bar bya/ /so
yis mchu ni mnan bya zhing / /rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar byas/ /de dag thams cad 'dar bar 'gyur/ /g.yas brkyang rkang
stabs byas nas su/ /lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs tshul gyis/ /g.yon pa brang la sbyar bar bya/ /g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng byas la/ /mdzub mo myur du bsgreng
byas shing / /rdo rje'i sgra ni dbyung byas na/ /gal te sangs rgyas nyid gyur kyang / /bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad yin na/ /
sdang ba'i sems can smos ci dgos/ /phyag rgya 'dis ni bskyod pas na/ /de dag thams cad dul bar 'gyur/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /g.yas pa gyen du
bsgred byas la/ /lag pa thal mo brkyang bar bya/ /g.yon pa brang du sbyar bar bya/ /lag pas myur du bsnun stabs kyis/ /hUM dang bcas pas sa la bsnun/ /nam
mkha' me 'bar 'dra ba yi/ /ral gri'i phyag rgya bcings byas la/ /bgegs rnams thams cad btub par bya/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad yin no/ /mthun pa'i rkang
stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa 'og tu btang nas ni/ /rkang pa'i dbus nas gzung byas la/ /de ni gyen du bteg par bya/ /rdo rje hUM brjod sgra dang ni/ /khros shing khro gnyer
bcas pa yis/ /rkang pa de yis yang bsnun la/ /der ni bgegs ni bsam par bya/ /rdo rje'i rkang pas bsnun byas na/ /ri rab rnams kyang phye mar rlog /rdo rje rkang
pa'i stad stabs so/ /g.yas brkyang rkang stabs sbyor ba yis/ /lag gnyis 'khor lo'i tshul du brkyang / /so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis/ /kun tu 'khor lo
'phang bar bya/ /phyogs rnams kun na gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams gzhig par 'gyur/ /zhig par gyur pa'i zhing rnams nas/ /rgyal ba dam pa rnams
kyang 'byon/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /gang gzhan dbang ni thob 'gyur rnams/ /blong zhes gyur nas blo ldan pa/ /lag na rdo rje'i
gan du dong / /srog zad na ni mi rung gi /bu gcig nged kyis ci zhig bya/ /khyod ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /nged kyis myur du sgrub po zhes/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' blo ldan pas/ /lung ni yongs su nod par mdzad/ /bskal pa'i me ltar gyur pa yis/ /g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su/ /'bar ba'i
phyag rgya legs sbyar bas/ /sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar bya/ /sa gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas/ /sngags pa rnams la rtag 'tshe ba/ /
gegs byed ma rungs chen po pa/ /srin po sdang ba rnams skrag go /phyag rgya 'di 'dra mthong gyur nas/ /de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur/ /mthun pa'i
rkang stabs byas nas su/ /de tshe nges par bsnun blangs la/ /sngags pas gyen du 'phang bar bya/ /de tshe so yis mchu mnan la/ /myur du gom pa
gcig bor te/ /nges par bsnun pas bsnun de tshe/ /srin po sdang ba gegs byed pa/ /de dag thams cad phye mar 'gyur/ /rdo rje nges bsnun phyag rgya
yis/ /de dag thams cad bzlog par bya/ /dbang chen gnas la gnas nas su/ /lag pa gnyis ni bsgreng byas la/ /lhun po'i rgyal bo blangs nas su//
lag pa gnyis su de bzhag nas/ /sngags pa la ni bgegs byed pa/ /sdang ba'i sems can rnams la bsnun/ /bsnun pas rnam par phung 'gyur zhing / /
'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor gzhol ba'i sngags pa la/ /gang tshe bgegs shig bgegs byed pa/ /de tshe sngags pa stobs chen gyis/ /
phyag rgya 'di la sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di la sbyar ba na/ /mthong nas de dag 'dar bar 'gyur/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje ye shes legs
bslabs pas/ /rgyal ba kun la phyag byas nas/ /cod pan stabs kyis thabs bshad do/ /sngags pas shar phyogs kha bltas la/ /lag pa g.yas pa mtshog
mar bzhag /g.yon pa rked pa'i phyogs su bzhag /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la/ /'brug sgra dal 'dra'i phyag rgya yis/ /phyogs rnams kun tu bskor bar
bya| |g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis kyang / /ngang pa'i rtsal gyi sbyor ba yis/ /lag pa g.yas pa gdengs byas na/ /rgya mtsho rnams kyang bteg par
'gyur/ /ngang pa'i rtsal gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/ /lag pa gnyis ni sar btsugs la/ /ha ha
zhes pas rnam brgyan pas/ /sa gsum thams cad bteg byas na/ /rgya mtshor bcas pa'i ri rab kyang / /thams cad shin tu bteg par 'gyur//
man dA ra dang ti sa dang / /gzhan yang gang dag ri rnams kyang / /ha la ha la'i phyag rgya yis/ /bsnun pa de dag slar mi 'chags/ /g.yas dang
g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yang / /lag pa gnyis ni mchan khung bzhag /hUM brjod bsnyems pas mar bltas te/ /so yis mchu ni mnan byas la/ /rdo rje'i
cod pan phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /g.yon pa brkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /de yi tshe na g.yon bteg ste/ /khros
dang bcas pas rkang bzhag pas/ /sa gsum thams cad drang bar bya/ /drang ba'i cod pan phyag rgya'o/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /
lag pa gnyis ni bteg byas la/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'ching byed cing / /'khor lo bzhin du phyogs su bskor/ /phyag rgya 'di la legs
sbyar bas/ /de dag 'ching dang gzir bar 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams thams cad sel byed pa/ /rdo rje can ni nyid kyis bshad/ /bgegs rnams skrag par
byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor stan la 'dug nas su/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas ni/ /lag gnyis 'khor lo'i tshul du bya/ /rkang pa gcig
gis yongs su bskor/ /'khor lo cod pan phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /me
tog thal mo sbyar tshul gyis/ /de yi tshe na sa la bzhag /de nas myur du yang bteg go /'dis mchod pas na sngags pa la/ /thams cad bgegs
byed mi 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i cod pan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje
la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po/ skrag pa zhes bya ba'i stang stabs yod de/ nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ bskal pa dpag tu med par
gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs las ngas thos kyi de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs
shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /de yis skrag par byas nas bgegs/ /log 'dren thams cad gdungs par 'gyur/ /phyogs
rnams kun tu 'bros byed cing / /'chi bar gyur te the tshom med/ /lag gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas su/ /g.yon pa brkyang bar rab sbyar te/ /phyogs rnams
kun tu bskor bar bya/ /de nas rkang pas yang mnan no/ /skrag byed 'di ni skrag pa che/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa ste/ /skrag pas rnam par phung 'gyur
zhing | |'chi bar gyur te the tshom med/ /de nas rkang pa'i tshul gyis kyang / /mig ni thur du bltas byas la/ /lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng nas ni/ /g.yon pa brang la
bcar byas te/ /lag pa sa la brdabs nas ni/ /rdo rje'i thal mos bsnun par bya/ /rdo rje thal mo'i stang stabs so/ /rnal 'byor stan la yang 'dug ste/ /
mtshog mar thal mo sbyar byas la/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/ /'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor/ /'di ni rlung 'ching chen po ste/ /sngon gyi rgyal
ba rnams kyis gsungs/ /gal te rnam 'thor rlung byung yang / /de yang mi g.yo 'dug par 'gyur/ /rlung 'ching ba'i stang stabs so/ /gar gyi tshul gyis
legs bslabs pas/ /rkang pa spo bar byas pas yang / /lag pa thur du smad byas la/ /lag gnyis mthe bong srin lag sprad/ /g.yon pa brkyang ba legs sbyar
te| |lag pa g.yas pas gar bya'o/ /gar gyis bgegs rnams thams cad ni/ /shin tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ /dga' bas sngags pa de la ni/ /de dag phyin
chad bgegs mi byed/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng byas te/ /g.yon pa ral gri'i tshul byas la/ /gnyi ga gcig tu sbyar bar bya/ /
gal te rdo rje 'chang gyur kyang / /bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya/ /kun nas shin tu drangs nas kyang / /de nas phyag rgya gtang bar bya/ /rdo rje'i zhags pas
bcings byas na/ /gnod par gyur pas kun tu yang / /ha ha zhes pa'i sgra 'byin cing / /sems ni blong zhes gyur pa yis/ /blo ldan lag na rdo rje la/ /lung ni yongs
su nod par byed/ /phyin chad bgegs ni ma byed ces/ /lag na rdo rjes lung bsgo'o/ /rdo rjes gzir ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /de nas
snying rje yang bskyed de/ /sngags pas mnyam par gzhag pa la/ /me tog thal mo sbyar nas su/ /de yi tshe na de dag la/ /gang tshe sngags pas mnyam gzhag
tshe| |khyed cag bgegs ni ma byed par/ /gnas su dengs shig brjod par bya/ /g.yas brkyang stang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa gyen
du bsgreng bar bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis kyang / /khu tshur mchan khung gnyis su gzhag /hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra ldan pa/ /sngags pa drag po'i las
byed pas/ /phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas kyang / /rdo rje gzir bas gzir bar bya/ /gzhan yang gang dag log 'dren bgegs/ /srin po gang dag grags
pa dang / /rgod ma rta yi kha gdangs par/ /de dag thams cad gzir gyur cig /rdo rje gzir ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /gzir nas de dag lhags 'gyur te/ /shin tu
mi bzad 'dar byed cing / /srog zad gyur na mi rung gi/ /ci 'tshal bka' ni myur stsol ces/ /bsgo ba'i lung ni nod par byed/ /sngags pas ci 'dod lung
bzhin du/ /gal te lung ni nod byed na/ /de lta na ni thar bar 'gyur/ /gzhan du na ni nam yang min/ /shin tu mi zad gzir bas na/ /khyod ni ci bzhed
de bzhin du/ /bgyid kyi bka' lung stsol cig ces/ /de tshe de dag de skad smra/ /mtshog mar rdo rje thal bzhag nas/ /de nas de dag dam tshig sbyin/ /sa la
bgegs kyi gzugs bris te/ /g.yas pa brkyang bas gnas nas su/ /rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad btub par bya/ /btub par
byas pas de dag kun/ /de la skyabs su 'gro bar byed/ /snying rjer ldan pa'i sems kyis su/ /de nas phyag rgya btang bar bya/ /snying rje'i sems kyis de dag la//
ma 'jigs shig ces smra bar bya/ /sngags pas de yi 'dod pa bzhin/ /de nas de dag rang gnas 'dod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/
thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag phyag rgya gsum yod de/ gang ngas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i
spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po las phyag rgya gsum thob ste/ bskal pa du mar de bstan pa tsam gyis
bgegs rnams kyis nga la ma gtses kyi/ sems rtse gcig tu bsgrims la de nyon cig /g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa g.yon pa snying
gar bzhag /g.yas pa gar dang bcas pa yis/ /mtshog mar legs par gzhag par bya/ /bgegs rnams rtag tu gzhig pa yis/ /dam tshig 'di ni
brjod pa yin/ /'di ni bstan pa tsam gyis kyang / /'bros par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /phyir bzlog pa ni yang byas la/ /
sa la lag pa brdab par bya/ /lag pa gnyis ni bteg nas su/ /de tshe mkhur ba bud par bya/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bas na/ /de tshe bgegs rnams bcom
par 'gyur/ /rdo rje can ni nyid gyur kyang / /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcom 'gyur na/ /mthong ba tsam gyis bgegs rnams kun/ /phung bar gyur pa smos ci dgos//
sngags pas shar phyogs bltas 'dug la/ /lag pa g.yas pa dkur brten te/ /g.yon pa brkyang ba legs byas la/ /g.yon pas thams cad dgug par bya//
sa bcur gnas pa kun kyang dgug /thams cad nas ni bkug nas su/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun pas na/ /de yi mod la phye mar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ nga'i slob ma rnams ma gtogs par khyod kyis su
la yang bsnyad par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can ma dad pa de dag ni tshul 'di la yid mi ches shing / de dag 'di skad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis
gsungs pa ma yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur bas de dag gi rna lam du yang bsgrags par mi bya na phyag rgya lta ci smos/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ de la slob dpon gyis slob
ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid shes nas sbyin par bya yi/ gzhan du ni ma yin no/ /de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang slob dpon la brnyas par bgyid pa de rang gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skrag par 'gyur gyi de skad ma smra zhig gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'on kyang 'ga' zhig brjod par bya yi/ dpa' bo
bsgrims te nyon cig /mtshams med la sogs mi bzad pa/ /dmyal ba gang dag ngas bshad pa/ /de dag rnams kyi gnas su brjod/ /der ni bskal pa mtha' yas
so| |de lta bas na rnam kun du/ /de la nam yang brnyas mi bya/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ slob dpon la slob mas ji lta bar bya zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du'o/ /de yi sems ni de lta na/ /rtag tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni 'jig rten thams cad la/ /phan par byed pa'i
sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stang stabs kyi rim pa phye ba rdzogs so// //
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes shin tu rgyas pa chen pos bdag nyid rgyas
pa de dag gi tshig gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings yangs pa la dmigs nas 'jug cing / bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad du bdag byin gyis brlabs nas sangs rgyas 'byung ba mngon du byed cing / /sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas
kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed dag gis ye shes shin tu rgyas pa dpag tu med pa'i don thugs su chud nas de dag nyid na bzhugs bzhin du
phyag brkyang ste/ lag na rdo rje'i spyi bor bzhag go /bzhag nas lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems can chen po legs so legs/ /ye
shes rdo rje rdzogs byed pa/ /khyod ni sangs rgyas byas pa gzo/ /sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog /dam pa gsang
ba khyod kyis shod/ /gzungs sngags tshul du dgongs byos la/ /gang du zhugs ma thag tu ni/ /sdig pa thams cad med 'gyur pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir
ni bshad par gyis/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed de dag thams cad phyag slar bskums so/ /de nas lag
na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed ma/ /sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed ma/ /nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed ma/ /
bgegs thams cad 'jigs par byed ma/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed ma/ /gzungs sngags chen po'i mchog 'di smras so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te

b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA he bud+d+ha ma ti ri/ sarba bA pa ni Sha Ni/ gardza gardza/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ marda marda/ gam+b+hI ri gam+b+hI ri/ ha sa ha sa/ da ma da ma/ ma tha ma tha/ bid+h+wAn
sa ya bid+h+wAn sa ya/ sarba sha trun ta ra ma ti/ bim le/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ pra ti dz+nyA na/ sarba b+hu ta/ rU pa si te/ b+ha ga ba te/ ga na ga na/ dza hi dza hi/ bi ma la si ni/ kra
ma Ni/ ha da pa ni/ ra ma Ni/ ma taM gi ke swAhA/ lag na rdo rjes gzungs sngags gsang ba 'di smras ma thag tu de nas de yi mod
la sa chen po 'di 'gul to/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg go /shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'o/ /nub phyogs mtho
na shar phyogs dma'o/ /nyi ma dang / zla ba yang sa la lhung ngo / /rig sngags 'chang rnams kyang lhung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gzungs
thams cad la dbang thob pa de dag kyang mog mog por gyur to/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de blong blong por gyur to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur
gyur pha la yid kyis phyag 'tshal zhing gnas par gyur te/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de blong blong por gyur pa mthong nas de dag la
'di skad ces smras so/ /kye grogs po dag /khyed kyis ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzung sngags chen mo dran par gyis shig /de nas 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje/ gzungs 'di ni mthu chen po ni yin na/ sgrub
pa bo gang la la zhig 'di 'dzin pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa de'i mthu ji lta bur rig par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ gzungs sngags 'di'i mthu 'am/ nus mthu 'am/ mthu bsgyings
pa ci 'dra ba ni/ 'jam dpal/ shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas bcom ldan 'das des thams cad
'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje tog la 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir byin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' de
la byin ma thag tu de'i mod la gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs rnams 'byung zhing zhugs te mtha' rtogs par
mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ma gtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thams cad la dbang thob pa
gang dag gis kyang 'di ci 'dra ba yin zhes bstan par mi nus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor
til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar gyur nas gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chen po de la 'od zer gyis dbang bskur
nas sku de nyid du zhugs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs sngags chen po 'di nyid kyi mthus so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems
dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyi dbang por dbang
bskur ba yin na/ khyod kyis kyang gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor shod cig /de skad
ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ don yod par grub
par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes gang dag gzungs sngags kyi tshul du gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin

gyis brlabs pa dag nyon cig /de dag gang zhe na/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ a ma ri a ma ri/ Ta ta/ b+hany+dza/ dz+ha dz+ha/ mi tsiM mi tsi/ s+pho Ta s+phoT/ ma ta ma ta

du rdAn+ta da ma ka swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ he he/ ka Ni Ti ka ni ti/ sarba ta thA ga ta ba na ke /bo da ni da de/ tra Ta Ta tra Ta Ta/ hUM phaT hUM phaT/ gardza

gardza/ pa ra ma ti/ bi hUM ri ka swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ b+ha ga ba te/ pra dz+nyA par mi tA A/ sarba pA pak+Sha yaM ka ri/ dz+nyA na a pa s+pha ra Ni/

b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma/ A na ya A na ya/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba b+ha te dza na tri ye swAhA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA/ gardza gardza/ ma tha
ma tha/ hA ma hA ma/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ dun+du b+hi swa ra nir g+ho She/ ha na ha na/ bi d+h+wA na sa ya bi d+h+wA na sa ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ da ha da ha/ bi pu la ni rma la nir dzA te/ A ha ra
A ha ra/ A gats+tsha a gats+tsha/ sarba bud+d+ha sa rU pa pi te mA bi lam+ba swAhA/ 'jam dpal/ gzungs chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings
dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed ma/ byang chub kyi snying po ston par byed ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ma nor ba'o//
de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mig mi 'dzums par/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs
kyi bu/ khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su blta bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes chen po sngon ma mthong ba rnams
dang / dam tshig la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs
sngags 'di yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas de'i mod la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dbang chen po bskur ba'i gzungs sngags la sogs pa ye shes bye ba phrag
dgu bcu rtsa dgu las nges par byung ba'i ye shes chen po'i rdo rje rtogs par gyur to/ /ye shes chen po'i rdo rje de rtogs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i sprin chen po dag byung bar gyur ro/ /kye ma'o ye shes chen por dbang bskur bas/ 'jam dpal 'di dbang bskur to/ /zhes stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgra 'ur zhes grag go /de'i mthus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag ut+pal chen po'i nang du zhugs par mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnams zhugs ma thag tu de nas chos kyi
sku rtogs pa'i mthus de'i mod la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spu'i khung bu'i mtshams rnams dang / cod pan dang / rgyan dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad
nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnams byung zhing zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa/ sems kyi dbang thams cad thob pa de
dag gis kyang spu'i khung bu gcig gi tshad kyang rtogs par ma nus na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / gzhan 'jig rten pa rnams kyis lta ci smos/ de nas 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yid la byed pa de btang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la mig mi 'dzum par ring du bltas nas/ zhing rnams 'di dag yongs su sbyang
bar bya/ /rgyal sras kun gyi smon lam mthun rdzogs bya/ /sems can phan dang snying brtses nad med cing / /zhi ba bdud rtsi rnyed dka' ye shes bstan/ /ye shes dam pa
gces pa 'di thob nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing nas sems can khrag khrig phrag /grangs med khyod kyis brjod pa dgrol bar bya/ /khyod kyi ting 'dzin bstan pa mchog tu bya/ /zhes
ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam
dpal khyod kyis tshig smras pa ni shin tu gtsigs te khyod yang legs so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod 'di lta bu'i gzungs sngags chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams yid la
byed pa ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o/ /'jam dpal/ yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang dag ye shes chen po 'di lta bu dag yid la byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang /
bsgrub pa dang / glegs bam du byas nas nyin gcig bzhin du phyag 'tshal ba de dag ni/ shin tu dka' ba byed pa ste/ de ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro/ /de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe nye bar gnas na yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i phra rab kye rdul snyed sbyin pa mthong bar
'gyur te/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la
'di skad ces smras so/ /gang gi tshe 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi tshul 'di rtogs nas thams cad mkhyen ba nyid kyi go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir
mngon par brtson par byed pa dag go 'phang de thob par gyur pa ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba sngon ma byung ba de
sems can chen po shod cig de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ gang
du zhugs pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga po dag yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba dang / don thams cad kyang 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / dpal thams cad skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
sdig pa thams cad las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ba dang / ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dgod pa de nyon cig /'jam dpal/
dkyil 'khor brjod par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ de la lus can thams cad la gsang chen dang bcas pa/ slob dpon rnams kyi gsang chen mchog gsang ba bas kyang ches
gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzungs sngags 'di dag gi ming du gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor brjod par bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi tshad la/ /tshad
ni khru brgyad tham pa ste/ /slob dpon nyid kyi khru yis bya/ /ye shes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor der/ /cha ni rnam pa gsum du bya/ /blo dang ldan pas cha gsum du/ /der ni sgo khyud rnams
bya ste| |der ni sgo yang bzhi gtod do/ /gru bzhi lham pa kha khyer bcas/ /sngon gyi bzhir du cha gsum la/ /cha ni rnam pa brgyad bya/ mkhas
pas cha brgyad nas su/ /dbus kyi char ni 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par/ /thang cig thang cig bsam byas la/ /phun sum tshogs pa kun byed pa/ /
dkyil 'khor rgyal po bri bar bya/ /sngags pas de yi dbus su ni/ /pad+ma mchog tu mdzes pa bri/ /kun kyang margad 'dra ba ste/ /'dab ma brgyad par brjod pa yin/ /de yi steng
du bum pa ste/ /bum pa'i steng du ut+pal lo/ /ut+pal steng du dung bri ste/ /me lce phreng ba 'khrigs pas mdzes/ /shes rab pha rol phyin de ni/ /ye shes chen por dbang bskur
ldan| |cha brgyad gang dag brjod pa yang / /dbus kyi cha las byung ba ste/ /gzungs kyi tshul du bri ba yang / /cho ga'i rim bzhin mthun par bya/ /de la shar phyogs su ni bcom
ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo/ dbang po chen po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ ut+pa la'i phyag rgyar bri bar bya ste/ mtha' rnams su ut+pa la bkra zhing me lce
'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/

sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA rA oM b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba ta thA ga te dza ni ke/ su rA ya pra ti dz+nyA na/ ta Ta Ta Ta/ marda marda/ A ha ra A ha ra/ hUM hUM dza hi dza hi swAhA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bcom
ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi pham pa me lce zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /pad+ma shin tu mdzes pa bri/ /de yi steng du 'khor lo ste/ /me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs

pa mdzes/ /de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA hUM hrIH/ sarba pad ma/ ta hrIHb+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ma tha ma tha/ dam ma ni da ma ma ni/
gar+g+ha ri gar+g+ha ri hrIHswAhA/ me'i phyogs su brten nas bcom ldan 'das ma sdig pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ chu dang dbang chen ldan pa yi/ /phyag rgya
gzugs bzang bri bar bya/ /pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje ste/ /me lce'i nang du shin tu mdzes/ /de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA tra
Ta tra Ta/ mu hU mu hU/ sarba pA paM sho d+ha ne swAhA/ lho phyogs su ni gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ me dang rlung dang ldan pa yis/ /ut+pal ni der bri'o/ /de yi
steng du rin po che/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs skong ba/ /me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs zhi ba/ /pad+ma rnams kyi yongs su bskor/ /de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba
ta thA ga ta b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA /d+ha ka d+ha ka /mo Ta mo Ta/ da ha da ha/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na nir dzA te swAhA/ bden bral phyogs su ni bdud
thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ de yi me yi dkyil 'khor te/ /pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa yin/ /de yi steng du sngags pa yis/ /lcags kyu
shin tu mdzes pa bris/ /phan tshun 'brel pa'i rdo rje dag /blo dang ldan pas der dgod do/ /de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/
sarba thA ha ha/ mi hu mi hu/ da ma da ma/ khA hi khA hi/ d+hu na d+hu na/ mi tsi mi ci/ durdAn+ta da ma ni swAhA/ byang gi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa zhes
bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ de yi dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba yin/ /de yi steng du pad+ma ste/ /'od ni dus mtha'i me lta bu/ /de yi steng du ral gri
ste| |'od zer rnams kyis yongs su bskor/ /me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs ldan pa'i/ /ut+pal rnams kyis kun khebs bya/ /de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maH
sarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ mi tsi mi tsi/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma swAhA/ rlung gi phyogs su ni dkon mchog 'byung
gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ de yi rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /cha gsum la ni gtsug tor gnas/ /lcags kyus thams cad dgab par bya/ /me lce 'bar ba'i phreng
bar ldan/ /nub phyogs su ni bcom ldan 'das ma skul byed ma bri bar bya ste/ de la dbang chen dkyil 'khor te/ /de la rdo rje legs par gnas/ /de yi steng du pad+ma che/ /pad+ma'i
steng du bgrang nor phreng / /de dag me lce'i phreng ba 'khrigs/ /steng du pad+ma rnams kyis dgab/ /de nas cha gsum pa la ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /sngags pas
ci rigs bri bar bya/ /brgyad rnams su yang snga ma bzhin/ /de la shar du rnal 'byor pas/ /'jig rten dbang po 'od chen bri/ /pad+ma shin tu mdzes pa ni/ /de yi phyag rgyar brjod
pa yin/ /me'i phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu bri bar bya'o/ /dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur
gyur pa'i phyag rgya ut+pal bri bar bya'o/ /lho phyogs su ni lag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya rdo rje dri bar bya'o/ /byang phyogs su ni byams pa'i phyag rgya ril ba spyi blugs bri bar bya'o/ /rlung
gi phyogs su ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya pad+ma bri bar bya'o/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su ni nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya ral gri bri bar bya'o/ /nub phyogs
su ni sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya pad+ma bri bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpal lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
lag na rdo rje/ legs so/ /legs so/ /lag na rdo rje/ khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir ye shes chen po dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen
po'i dkyil 'khor brjod pa khyod yang legs so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ ye
shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di su'i lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa dang / dgra dang bral bar 'gyur/ gal te
chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ srin po'i nang na 'dug gam/ dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par
'gyur| chom rkun gyis 'joms par mi 'gyur/ srin po la sogs pas gtses par mi 'gyur/ de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / rtag tu dpal dang
ldan par 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de la nyin gcig bzhin
mngon du 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su zin par 'gyur/ shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na/ gang 'dzin pa
dang | klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / ming tsam yang 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de'i sgrib pa thams cad 'byang par 'gyur ro/ /des ngan song gi sgo thams cad gcad par 'gyur
ro| |des ngan song dang / ngan 'gro rnams rgyang bsring bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas su/ /lan gcig klog par byed pa'i mi/ /srin pa nyam ngar gang byas pa'i/ /
sdig las grol bar de 'gyur ro// //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ bam po bcu gnyis pa ste tham/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ sus dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di bris
nas der zhugs par gyur na de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ kho bos ni de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad bstan par
mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang / 'jam dpal/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni sa'i rdul ji snyed yod pa de de snyed du rig par bya'o/ /'jam
dpal| ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can sdig can gang tshul 'di la yid mi ches pa dag yod de/ 'jam dpal/ the tshom med pa dang / rnam par rtog
pa sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin can dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rab tu zin pa dang / pha lam gus pa dang / ma la ma gus pa dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma la smod pa
dang | bla ma'i skyon 'bru ba'i sems can de dag la ni ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lag tu yang 'chang du mi gzhug go /rna lam
du yang grag par mi bya'o/ /'jam dpal/ de dag gi mdun du ni gtam yang mi bya'o/ /glegs bam du bris pa yang de dag gi mdun du dbye bar yang mi bya ste/ sems can
sdig pa can de dag gis spong ba cung zad byas pas kyang / ngan song sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo / /'di skad du/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa
ma yin no/ /zhes zer te de dag ni bdag kyang phung la/ gzhan dag kyang phung bar byed do/ /de ltar byed pa'i sems can de dag la ni gsang sngags gyi dngos grub med do
zhes kho bos smra na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rtag tu rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur te/ de dag rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur na nges par 'byin
pa dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub gtan med do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di la dad pa gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shin tu bka' ba byed pa yin no/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis ji skad smras
pa bzhin te/ de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges pa yin te/ de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs
sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / 'jin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam yod par rig par bya/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/
'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang de tsam du
rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzungs sngags 'di'i rang bzhin du bzhugs te/ tshul 'di ma rtogs pa blun po de dag gis ni mi shes so/ /
'jam dpal/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa dang / sems can thams cad la dbang thob pa ji snyed pa rnams rdzu 'phrul dang / cho
'phrul sna tshogs byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa de dag thams cad kyang gzungs sngags
'di dag gi mthu yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang bdud pham par byed pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
de dag kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no/ /'jam dpal/ su gsang ba'i ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur ba de ni dam tshig thams
cad la zhugs pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de lta bu'i rang bzhin nam/ gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin nam/ dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du
gnas pa'i phyir te/ de bas na gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di ma gtogs pa de las gzhan med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni de bzhin
gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/ /su 'dir dbang bskur ba de ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba yin no/ /'jam dpal/ phyogs gang du
ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa 'am/ gang gi lag na 'chang ba'am/ gang gi phyir 'dri ba 'am/ gang zhig nyin gcig tu nang par
langs nas lan re klog pa de la 'jigs pa rnams mi 'byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de la nyin gcig bzhin du gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /'chi khar yang de la
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku ston par mdzad do/ /'jam dpal/ ltos dang / sa la gnas pa'i shing dang / nags tshal thams cad ni sa med na de dag kyang med do/ /'jam
dpal/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems la dbang thob pa rnams kyang / gzungs sngags 'di dag la gnas te/ 'di dag
gi byin gyis brlabs pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang rnyed do/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya 'o/ /de nas sems can gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byad de/ 'di ltar thams cad gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no/ /'jam dpal/ de lta bas na khyod
kyis kyang chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ yid la gyis shig/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston cig dang de sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur
ro| |'jam dpal/ sa phyogs gang na ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten
lta bur 'gyur ro/ /gang gi lag na 'chang ba'i sngags pa de la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ sngags pa de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad rtag tu byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /sngags pa des kyang gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rin po che za ma tog bzhin du rtag tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ 'jam dpal/ sems can gang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams lam gus pa'i rang bzhin can dang / slob dpon gyi skyon 'dru ba dag yod pa'i phyir
te| 'jam dpal/ de dag la ni chung ngu na gtam du yang bzlas par mi bya/ glegs bam yang bstan par mi bya na dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba dang / klog tu gzhug pa dang
bltar gzhug pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal/ 'di lta bu dag bltar gzhug pa dang / tshig tu dbyung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'khrul pa yin te/ 'jam dpal/ byang
chub sems dpa'i bag med pa chen por rig par bya'o/ /de ni 'khrul pa chen po dang / shin tu kha na ma tho ba chen po yin no/ /'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
sems dpa' chen po la bslu ba ni sla yi/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag spong ba de ni de lta ma yin no/ /'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni dkon te/ dper na/ u dum wa
ra'i me tog bzhin no/ /de bas kyang gzungs sngags 'di 'dra ba dag ston pa ni dkon no/ /de bas kyang nan tan gyis sgrub pa ni dkon no/ /de bas kyang 'di gang gi lag na 'chang ba
