pa'i ltas su rdzu 'phrul 'di bstan pa yin no/ /bdag cag so so'i gnas su log la rang rang gi nus tshad la dpag pa'i zhal zas bzang po'i bye brag mang po bshams te/
sang nyin de bzhin gshegs pa de la gdugs tshod 'bul zhing mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /de nas skye bo de dag thams cad rings pa rings par rang rang gi khyim du song
nas mtshan mo'i ring de la dri zhim la ro bda' ba'i zhal zas bza' btung sna tshogs sbyar zhing dri zhim po'i me tog dang / dri'i byug pa dang / bdug spos dang / phye ma phur ma
dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa dang / rol mo pheg rdob pa'i bye brag mang po bshams nas lam rnams su nye bar ltags te de bzhin gshegs
pa bsgugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan des lnga len gyi ljongs su 'khor mang po la chos ston cing bzhugs pa'i skabs shig glo bur du rin
po che sna bdun gyis spud pa'i bum pa so shing dang bcas pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis
bum pa so shing dang bcas pa gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas kyang rtsibs stong 'khor los mtshan pa'i phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang ste bum
pa so shing dang bcas pa phyag tu bzhes la cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyis ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ e ma/ bkra shis pa'i mtshan ma
'di lta bu phyogs gang nas byung / yul phyogs gang zhig tu bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dren pa'i mtshan ma zhig yin snyam zer to/ /de'i tshe 'khor gyi nang na byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam dag dam pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing g.yas skor du lan gsum bskor ba byas thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bkra shis pa'i mtshan ma 'di phyogs gang nas byung / bum pa so shing dang bcas pa'i rgyu mtshan ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du
gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bum pa so shing dang bcas pa 'di ba tha ri'i grong khyer chen po nas 'ongs pa ste sa phyogs der nga spyan 'dren
pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam dag dam pa'i blo gros/ khyod 'khor rnams la 'di skad du/ nga'i phyag phyir bsod snyoms la 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams tshul shing longs shig ces 'grems
shig /sang snga bar ba tha ri'i grong khyer chen por rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro'o zhes gsungs so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
dag dam pa'i blo gros kyis tshul shing bzung nas 'dus pa'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad la brim zhing / rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pas
rdzu 'phrul gyi yul la 'jug nus pa rnams tshul shing longs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis sang snga bar pa tha ri'i grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la cha'o/ /byang chub sems
dpa' rnam dag dam pa'i blo gros kyis de ltar tshul shing brims tshar nas slar bcom ldan 'das la gsol zhing bcom ldan 'das gdan 'dren par bskul to/ /de nas de'i sang
zhogs snga bar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis chos gos gsum legs par gsol nas dpal dang / gzi brjid kyi rgyan mchog tu 'bar zhing / 'dus
pa'i 'khor mang po dang bcas rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par rol pa'i stobs kyis bar snang la 'phags te lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor gyi tshogs mang pos rol mo dang / sil snyan sna tshogs dkrol zhing bdug spos dang / me tog dang / byug pa dang / phye ma phur
ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag sna tshogs kyis mchod pas yongs su bskor ba zhin par nam mkha'i lam nas yud tsam gcig la pa tha ri'i
grong khyer chen por phebs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su pad+ma'i snying po seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs so/ /'khor thams cad kyang rang rang
gi sprul pa'i pad+ma'i khyim gyi theg pa dang bcas 'dus te 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad rab tu dga' zhing mgu nas/ rang rang gi legs par
bshams pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das dang / 'khor byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang / lha klu sde brgyad
kyi tshogs thams cad la mchod pa byed do/ /gdugs tshod kyi dus la babs pa na/ kha dog dri ro phun sum tshogs pa'i zhal zas sna tshogs 'bul zhing brim ste/ ci bde bar tshim par
byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pas gdugs tshod legs par bzhes nas bkru bshal mdzad de/ spyod lam dag par mdzad la 'khor rnams kyis bcom
ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas nas gral stan la go rim 'tsham par 'khod do/ /de nas pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi skye bo de dag thams cad slar yang bcom ldan
'das la phyag dang bskor ba byas nas don gyi rgyu las brtsams te/ sba ma'i gnas tshul 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gsan du gsol/ grong khyer 'di'i
shar sgo'i phyi rol na a su ri zhes bya ba'i skyed tshal zhig yod do/ /grong khyer de'i nang na srin po'i bu mo lha min mdzes ma zhes bya ba/ rang bzhin ngan pa/ gdug rtsub che ba/ khro
zhing gtum pa gcig gnas te/ rgyun par khye'u bu mo rnams kyi mdangs dang / gzi brjid 'phrog cing srog kyang 'phrog par byed pas bdag cag rnams nyin mtshan med par
'jigs pas nyen te sdug bsngal zhing bde ba'i go skabs cung zad kyang mi thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen pos dgongs la sdug bsngal 'di bsal ba'i
thabs bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol zhes gsol ba btab bo/ /de ltar gsol ba btab pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal
mtshan des skye bo'i tshogs de dag la brtse ba'i dgongs pas zhal gyis bzhes te cang mi gsung bar gnang nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'dzum pa mdzad pas zhal gyi
sgo nas 'od zer kha dog brgya stong du 'phros/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su khebs pas sems can thams cad dbugs phyung bar
mdzad cing khyad par a su ri'i skyed mos tshal de rdzu 'phrul gyi 'od zer me'i phung pos bsreg/ kun tu rab tu sreg go /der gnas pa'i srin po'i bu mo 'khor khri khrag mang po
dang bcas tshom bu tshom bur phral nas phyogs bzhir 'thor zhing rgyug go /skad chen pos du zhing cho de 'debs/ kye ma kyi hud bdag cag rnams su la skyabs su 'gro/ su zhig
gis sdug bsngal 'di las skyob nus zer zhing 'o dod 'bod de du bar gyur to/ /de nas par snang na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod rnams/ de
bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung du song la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su song na sdug bsngal 'di las thar bar gyur te bde
pa dang / yid bde ba 'tho ba par 'gyur ro zhes smras so/ /de nas lha min mdzes ma 'khor khri phrag mang po dang bcas rings pa rings par pa tha ri'i grong khyer gyi sprul pa'i dkyil
'khor ga la ba der phyin nas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams bskyab tu
gsol/ /'jig rten mgon po/ bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bskyab tu gsol/ deng phyin chad bdag cag gis sems can la gnod pa mi bgyid do/ /sems
can la 'tshe bar mi bgyid do zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar dgongs pas zhal gyis bzhes nas/ byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum rnam par
rol pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi byin rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de las langs te byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs gsungs so/ /de'i tshe
ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / gzungs sngags kyi mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad lham me lham
mer mngon sum du snang bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi 'khor rnams la chos ston pa yang lhang lhang thos par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas so so'i zhing na bzhugs
bzhin mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig gis legs so/ /legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan khyed kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi
gzungs gsungs pa legs so/ /legs so/ /legs par gsungs so zhes gsungs so/ /de nas srin mo lha min mdzes ma 'khor dang bcas pa btul zhing dge ba bcu'i lam la 'god/
skye bo'i tshogs grangs med pa mang po yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'god do/ /de nas grong khyer de nyid rin po che sna bdun las grub par gyur te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi char yang babs
so| |dzam+bu gling gi skye rgu thams cad kyang sdug bsngal med pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa la longs spyod par gyur to/ /bram ze chen po/ nga de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u lo bdun lon
pa zhig ste/ gzungs sngags 'di thos pas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i bstan pa la rnam par dag pa'i dad pa thob cing da lta bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes pa
yin no/ /bram ze chen po/ khyod kyis the tshom dang / yid gnyis ma byed cig /bram ze chen po/ khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na srin mo lha min mdzes ma zhes
bya bar gyur to/ /de'i dus dge ba'i sems ma bzung zhing sems can mang po la gnod pa byas pa'i 'bras bu bskal pa grangs med du mar ngan song myul sdug bsngal
dpag tu med pa myongs so/ /mthar de bzhin gshegs pa de la skyabs su song zhing bslab pa bzung bas da lta bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bur skyes shing shes rab che la
longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur/ 'on kyang las kyi lhag mas bu tsha med par gyur pa'o/ /bram ze chen po/ de'i dus kyi pa tha ri'i grong khyer na gnas pa
skye bo de dag ni/ da lta nga'i 'khor du byung ba'i lha klu gnod sbyin dri za lha min mkha' lding mi'am ci la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i tshoms chen po 'di dag go /bram ze chen
po| khyod de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha min mdzes ma'i 'khor khri phrag mang po de dag da lta gzhan su dag yin nam snyam pa'i yid gnyis dang / nem nur skyed na/ bram ze
chen po/ de ltar ma byed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha min mdzes ma'i 'khor khri phrag mang po ni/ da lta nga'i 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i nang du byung ba'i
bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rig byed smra ba rnams dang / gcer bu pa dang / rtog ge pa gzhan dag sgyu rtsal shes rigs dang / dur khrod na gnas pa'i brtul zhugs can dang /
tshem bu pa dang / glang ru'i brtul zhugs can dang / ri su lan gnas pa'i brtul zhugs can 'di dag go /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de dag gi sngon gyi sbyor ba rnams
de ltar bshad nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas 'khor 'dus pa chen po de dag gis sngon gyi sbyor ba'i rgyu rkyen de lta bu thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar bar gyur te dga'
zhing mgu nas/ bdug spos dang / me tog dang / byug pa dang / phye ma phur ma dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i
bye brag sna tshogs bsnams nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing g.yas skor du bskor ba lan gsum byas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
zhing thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshig gcig gis mthun par gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/
rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bshad du gsol/ rig
pa'i rgyal po de ni sems can thams cad kyi dmigs bu dang / sgron mer gyur pa ste/ khyad par du yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la babs
pa'i tshe sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang nas/
zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'phros/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad gsal bar byas te/ de dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du lham me lham mer snang bar gyur to/ /de dag gi chos bshad pa yang
lhang nge lhang nger thos par gyur to/ /gnas de nyid rin po che'i ljon shing rtsa ba sdong po yal ga lo 'dab me tog 'bras bu rnams rin po che sna bdun las grub pa yid du
'ong ba'i lha'i shing sha stag gi tshal chen pos phyogs mtshams brgyan par gyur to/ /dzam+bu gling gi sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba la longs spyod par gyur pa la
sogs pa'i rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rol pa'i byin rlabs kyi snang ba 'jig rten 'di na mngon sum du gyur to/ /de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pas tshul de dag mthong nas dga' bas 'dzum pa mdzad cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis te phyag 'tshal zhing lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba rgya chen po rgyun mi
'chad pa 'byung ba'i phyir rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol zhes gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar zhal gyis bzhes nas sangs rgyas thams cad la nye bar blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /
snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams ma lus par mngon sum du snang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas bye ba
khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa thams cad mda' 'ben gcig gis tsam du nye bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig
gis 'di skad du/ legs so/ /legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa khyed kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di gsung bar brtsams pa shin tu legs so//
legs par gsungs shig /rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /da ltar de bzhin
gshegs pa shAkya thub pa khyed kyis gsungs pa'i dus la bab bo/ /bdag cag thams cad kyang rjes su yi rang ngo zhes gsungs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lhung bzed gcig bsnams nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad der bsdus te bcom ldan 'das la
phul to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas phyag tu bzhes la mdun gyi nam mkhar bor to/ /de nas lhung bzed des nam mkha'i dbyings kyi khyon
gang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su gang bar gyur nas de dag thams cad
kyang mgrin gcig dbyangs gcig gis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ legs so/ /legs so zhes gsungs shing / de dag thams cad re re'i spyan sngar bcom
ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang / shAkya thub pa so so'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal lhung bzed 'bul bzhin pa re re
snang bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam
dpal/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ubs kyis 'dus shing rnam par spros pa 'di su'i don du yin/ 'di'i rgyu gang / rkyen
gang / ci'i phyir 'od zer 'gyed la rnam par 'phrul pa 'di bstan/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci phyag na rdo rje khyed kyis 'od kyi snang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyu rkyen mi shes
sam/ phyag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ mi shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa dang / rnam par spros pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di 'dra bdag gis sngon chad
ma mthong ma thos shing de ring bdag la thog mar ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje gsor zhing bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan
gsum byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /chos gang zhig bstan par brtsams pas deng 'dir sngon chad mthong ma myong thos ma myong ba'i rdzu 'phrul ngo
mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di lta bu zhig ston/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ re zhig sgug cig /skad cig yud tsam na mngon sum du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs
ma thag rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i mchod rten dpangs su dpag tshad bdun stong dang / rgyar dpag tshad lnga stong yod pa zhig sa brtol te byung bar
gyur to/ /mchod rten de ni lha'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis spud pa 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyi dar dpyangs 'phyang ba/ nor bu rin po che mu tig gi dra bas khebs
shing rin po che'i phyang 'phrul dang / gser gyi dril bu dang / dril bu'i g.yer kha las snyan pa'i sgra skad sna tshogs byung ba'o/ /de'i tshe bar snang nas lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya
stong du mas lag na mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs thogs pa babs te/ rin po che'i mchod rten de la mchod pa dang / phyag dang / skor ba byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la mchod rten de'i sgo phyed par bsgos so/ /sgo phyed par bsgos pa dang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje sku las ye shes kyi
me'i phung po rab tu 'bar ba/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ lag na rdo rje gsor zhing zhal khro gnyer bsdus pa'i nyams can/ 'jigs su rung ba'i dpa'
byad dang ldan pa des rin po che'i mchod rten de'i drung du song nas phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste mchod rten de'i sgo 'phar rab tu phye'o/ /phyes pa dang de'i nang na dzam+bu chu bo'i
gser las grub pa'i seng ge'i khri rin po che sna bdun gyis spa ba lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs kyi khengs dang ldan pa'i stan la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shin tu rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi tog ces bya ba bsam gtan la snyoms par
zhugs bzhin pa snang bar gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas shin tu rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi tog des 'di skad ces bsngags pa mdzad
do| |bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ khyed kyis 'di lta bu'i ngo mtshar che ba'i rdzu 'phrul bstan cing de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa dang / spros par mdzad cing / don dam par chos thams cad 'du 'bral yong ye mi mnga' bzhin 'jig rten 'di na rdzu 'phrul ngo mtshar
'di lta bu bstan pa 'di ni/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la yang ma byung ngo / /da lta bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa khyed kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan
'bum gyi gzungs bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rjes su brtse bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku mngon sum du snang ba'i rnam par rol ba'i rdzu 'phrul bstan pa dang / nga'i mchod rten sa steng du byung ba'i rgyu rkyen 'di nyid kyang byang chub
snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs kyi mthu dang / byin rlabs las byung ba lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'chad pa'i dus la
bab bo/ /de skad ces gsungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi
tog gis bskul ba dang du bzhes nas/ rtog pa'i rgyal bo byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gsungs so/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bi pu la bad na kAny+tsa no ta k+Shi p+ta/

pra b+hA sa ke tu mUr+d+ha ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na mo b+ha ga bA te/ shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+hi ni bo d+hi ni/ sarba

ta thA ga ta go tsa re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ mahA bo d+hi tsit+ta d+ha re/ tsu lu tsu lu/ Sha Ta ra smi sa ny+tso di te/ sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi Shik+te/ gu Ne gu Na ba te/ sarba bud+d+ha

gu NA ba d+hA se/ mi li mi li/ ga ga na ta le/ pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ na b+ha sta le/ sha me sha me/ pra sha me pra sha me/ sarba pA paM pra sha ma Na/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha

ne| hu lu hu lu/ mahA bo d+hi mA na saM pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ su pra tiSh+Thi te shud+d+he swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po byang chub snying
po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legs so/ /legs so/ /legs par gsungs so zhes sngags
pa mdzad do/ /sprul pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis kyang legs so/ /legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ khyed kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa
dang / bde ba'i phyir gzungs kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs pa legs so/ /legs par gsungs so zhes mthun par bsngags pa mdzad ma thag tus chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos
so| |lhas me tog sna tshogs kyi char phabs so/ /de bzhin du byug pa dang / phye ma phur ma dang / na bza' dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / dbu rgyan dang / phyag gdub
dang / do shal dang / ska rags la sogs pa bsnams nas mchod cing snyan cing 'jebs pa'i glu len/ rol mo sna tshogs dkrol/ me tog gi char de yang / 'di lta ste/ ut+pa la

dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / pad+ma le brgan rtsi dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po dang / me tog ro tsa dang / many+dzu ka dang / many+dzu ka chen po dang / su ma nA dang /
wAR+shi ka dang / tsam+ba ka dang / sau gan+d+hi ka la sogs pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char babs shing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / bstod bsngags
byas so/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs chen po'i nang / gzungs kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs pas la la ni dang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par
gyur to/ /la la ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /la las phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ la las lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ la las rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /'ga' zhig ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /'ga' zhig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/ /'ga' zhig bla na med pa'i byang
chub tu lung bstan thob bo/ /sems can la las lhar skye ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /sems can dmyal bar skyes pa rnams ni sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar gyur to//
gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ltung ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba thams cad kyang so so'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal las grol te mi'i lus thob nas
byang chub kyi lam la zhugs par gyur to/ /de ltar dzam+bu gling 'dir ngo mtshar ba'i rdzu 'phrul byung zhing sems can thams cad phan pa dang / bde ba phun sum tshogs pa
thob par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang bdag phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas thal mo sbyar te
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'o/ /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge
bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan
dag la yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis don 'di 'dri ba ni shin tu legs so/ /dri ba ni mchog go /dam pa'o/ /'on kyang khyod
song nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la dris shig dang des khyod la legs par ston par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces gsungs pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes byang chub sems
dpa' 'jam dpal gyi thad du phyin nas g.yas skor du bskor ba byas te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /skyes bu gang la la zhig gis/ byang
chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag
par rab tu ston par byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig lags/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ phyag na rdo rje/ legs par
nyon cig /dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed yod pa'i sa gzhi ri dang / thang dang / la dang / sgang che chung thams cad brgya cha stong
cha than spu tsam gyi bar gshag cing phye yang rdul phra rab kyis ma khyab pa'i gnas shig mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ngas lha'i mig gis bltas pas/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sku'i cha thams cad kyang ring bsrel gyis khyab pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i cha thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi ring bsrel dang / rus
pa'i ring bsrel dang / sha'i ring bsrel dang / yungs 'bru lta bu'i ring bsrel gyis stongs pa'i gnas shig ngas ma mthong ngo / /phyag na rdo rje/ mngon par shes pa dang /
rdzu 'phrul gyi rtsal dang ldan pa'i skye bo zhig gis de'i grangs ji tsam bgrang bar nus na/ phyag na rdo rje/ skye bo de blo gros dang / shes rtsal phun sum tshogs pa zhig lags
sam/ phyag na rdo rjes smras pa/ de de bzhin no/ /'jam dpal/ de de bzhin te/ skye bo de ni blo gros dang / shes rtsal phun sum tshogs pa ngo mtshar du gyur pa zhig go/ /
'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ phyag na rdo rje nyon cig /rdul phra rab de dag dang / ring bsrel de lta bu'i grangs dang / tshad ni bgrang ba dang / dpag par rung gi/ phyag na rdo
rje| rdul phra rab dang / ring bsrel de dag gi grangs rnams de ltar bgrang ba dang / dpag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa'am/ bskal pa
las lhag gam/ bskal pa stong du bzhugs te gsungs kyang rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs kyi phan yon bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad ni
dpe'i sgo nas kyang rdzogs par bstan par mi nus so/ /phyag na rdo rje/ rtog pa'i rgyal po byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di ni de lta bu'i yon tan phun sum
tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o/ /gang zhig gzungs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin
yid la byed pa lta zhog /glegs bam la bris te mchod pa bkur sti tsam byed pa'i skye bos kyang tshad med grangs med dpag gis mi langs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po zad mi
shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor der 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshig de thos nas ma lus par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/ /la las ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas
thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu a la la legs par bshad do zhes bsngags nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul la dbang bsgyur ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag
'tshal lo/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mdzad pa dang / 'phrin las kyi bdag nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyabs su
mchi'o zhes ched du brjod do/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ ji lta bur byang
chub rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di la brten nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskrun pa dang / bskyed par mdzad/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ phyag na rdo rje/ tshul 'di ni
bcom ldan 'das la gsol bar rigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul 'di ma lus par mkhyen to/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan
'das kyi gan du phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshul ji lta bur byang chub rgyan 'bum
gyi gzungs 'di la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskrun par mdzad/ bskyed par mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ khyod legs
par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig /lag na rdo rje/ gzungs 'di la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskrun pa dang / skyed par byed pa'i thabs pas khyod
la bshad do/ /'di lta ste/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
gis lus dang / yan lag bkrus shing gos gsar gtsang ma gon te/ ba lci dang / dri bzang bsres pa'i sa gtsang gis maN+Dal gru bzhi pa byas la/ ba byung lnga dang / dri bzang
gi chus legs par chag chag gdab/ me tog legs par bkram zhing mchod pa yang bsham/ gzungs 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa'i chus
sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la khrus bya/ de bzhin du gzungs 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa'i tsan+dan dkar po'i phye ma sbyar ba'i gur gum gyis byung / /de nas ci 'byor ba'i
mchod pa 'bul zhing bskor ba dang / phyag byas nas sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar bdug la gzung sa sngags lan cig brjod cing mar me gcig bud par bya'o/ /
lag na rdo rje/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / bskyed pa'i ngas dpe gcig ston gyi nyon cig /dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na
gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po chen po thams cad kyis so so nas char gyi thigs pa rdul phra rab tsam pa'i char chen po 'bebs par byas te/ de la mi rdzu 'phrul gyi
stobs chen po dang ldan pa zhig yod la/ mi des char de'i thigs pa re re nas bgrangs pas de'i grangs dang / tshad rtogs nus kyi/ dge slong dam/ dge slong
ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sngar bstan pa ltar mchod pa dang / phyag
byas pa la sogs pa'i phan yon gyi grangs dang / tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag gam/ bskal pa brgya stong gi bar bzhugs te char gyi tshigs
pa bgrangs pa ji lta bur gsungs kyang rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ gong du bstan pa'i sku gzugs la khrus gsol ba tsam gyi bsod nams kyi tshad ni de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis mi mkhyen to/ /lag na rdo rje/ gzhan yang dge pa'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / bskyed par bya ba dang / bsam pa'i don 'grub par byed pa'i las
tshogs kyi rten 'brel grub pa'i tshul mdo tsam zhig bshad kyis nyon cig /lag na rdo rje/ gang la la zhig gis byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di gro ga la bris
te phyag mtshan gyi rdo rje'i nang du bcug pa'am/ sku gzugs kyi nang bcug pa'am/ khog par bris pa'am/ lha khang gi gan+d+ho la'i nang bcug pa'am/ mchod rten gyi nang bcug
na des mchod rten gcig byas bas 'bum byas par 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten de snyed bzhengs pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong ngam/ /dge slong ma'am/ dge
bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di bris te lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/ de mthon po'i spo'am/
chu chen po'i 'gram mam/ grong khyer gyi sgo'am/ theg lam chen por mchod rten chen po gcig byas la char khebs sam/ gdugs kyi nang du gzungs
'di bcug na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des ngas sngar dpe drangs te bstan pa ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang
mnyam pa'i chos kyi sku'i ring bsrel dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ring bsrel dang / rus pa'i ring bsrel dang / sha'i ring bsrel de dag thams cad la mchod rten byas pa'i
bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas dkyil 'khor yin no/ /mchod rten zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku'i sku gdung gi bang so yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i gsung dang ldan pas de ltar gsungs so/ /lag na rdo rje/ gzhan yang /
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de lta bu'i mchod rten de dag la me tog dang / bdug spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad ci 'byor pas mchod
pa byed pa'am/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal ba'am/ lan gcig tsam bskor ba byas kyang / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma
'am/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig kyang rung ste de'i bskrun pa dang / bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi bu lon gzhal du med cing bgrangs su ma mchis
pa'o/ /sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas ni rgyun 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten 'ga' zhig mchod par gyur pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon
mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la yang lha rdzas kyi mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags dang / mtshan ma'i
rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du lus rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba ni nam yang chud mi za bar 'gyur ro/ /
slar yang mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ gzungs sngags 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba yin no/ /lag na rdo rje/ skye bo gang la la zhig gis lder bzo'am/
thad kar bris pa'am/ shing dam/ rin po che'i rigs kyi rdo la brkos sam/ dri bzang gi sman 'dam las byas pa'am/ zangs btul ma'am/ gser dngul zangs te lcags
gsum bsres pa'am/ lcags sam/ dngul 'ba' zhig gam/ gser rkyang ngam/ de dag gang yang rung bas mchod rten nam/ sku gzungs
byas la/ rgya shog gam/ dar dkar po la gzungs sngags 'di bris nas mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs kyi nang du bcug ste/ phyag dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti rim gro
byed na/ lag na rdo rje/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi
tshad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis gzhal/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pas dpag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pas
sngar bstan pa'i ring bsrel gyi grangs ji snyed pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i chu thigs ji tsam grangs dang mnyam pa'i mchod rten dang / sku gzungs byas pa dang / dge slong
ngam| dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des mchod rten na/ sku gzugs gzungs 'dis
snying po can gcig la phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa byas par mi 'gyur la/ mchod rten de snyed dang / sku gzugs de snyed pa phyag dang / mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams kyi
'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rtog pa'i
rgyal po chen po 'di ni dpal dang / gzi brjid chen po dang ldan pa lags so/ /bkra shis dang / phan yon chen po dang ldan pa lags so/ /rdzu 'phrul dang / nus stobs chen po
dang ldan pa lags so/ /gzungs sngags 'di'i ming tsam 'dzin pas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bskyed cing bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob pa lags so/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ lag na rdo rje/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
gang la la zhig gis bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po yongs su rdzogs par kun nas bslangs pas/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs
rgyas thams cad la phyag dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'dod par gyur tshe/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo des rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di yi ger bris nas
za ma tog tu bcug la nyin re bzhin dri bzang gi chus khrus 'bul ba dang / mchod pa dang / phyag dang / bskor ba byed na/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen
nam/ dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / de ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas
sngar bstan pa'i dpes bsdus pa thams cad la spyod lam rnam pa bzhi yis bar ma chad par bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
de la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis lung ston par 'gyur/ de dag
thams cad kyis dbugs dbyung bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bo de myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par 'gyur ro//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po sde bzhi rnams
la bka' stsal pa/ de ring ngas rgyal ba'i sras po khyed cag la gzugs sngags rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di yongs su gtad do/ /rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di ma 'ongs pa'i
dus lnga brgya'i tha mar 'jig rten du bsnubs par ma byed cig /legs par bsrung ba dang / sba bar byos shig /gzungs sngags 'di 'chang ba'i skye bo rnams legs
par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba par mdzod cig /phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin dang / cho ga tshul bzhin du nyams su len pa rnams la byin gyis rlobs shig /'dod pa
rnams bsgrub par byos shig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang /
rgyal po chen po sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' yang dag par nos so/ /rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di 'chang ba'i skyes bu chen po de bdag cag gis
bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed cing / de'i 'byor pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par byed do/ /mgon med pa skyabs med par gyur pa rnams kyang dbugs dbyung
zhing mgo 'dren par bgyid cing / byang chub snying po la bzhugs shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur ba'i bar rnam par thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab par bgyid do/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po sde bzhi la legs so zhes bya ba
byin nas legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod cag gis dam bcas pa de bzhin du byos shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa chen po la
thun mong du bka' stsal pa/ gzungs sngags 'di ni las thams cad grub par byed pa/ dngos grub thams cad ster ba/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad zhi bar mdzad
pa| don thams cad thogs pa med par 'grub par mdzad pa ste/ lus dag par bkrus la gos gsar gtsang ma gon nas nyin re bzhin brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad ring du spangs bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i sa la
gnas pa thams cad kyis skyob par 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas rtag tu bsrung zhing skyob ba dang /
sba bar yang byed do/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /skye zhing skye bar rin po che'i pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / mngal
gyi skye gnas yongs su spang ba yin no/ /skye ba thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na dmyal bar lhung nges kyi sdig pa'i las thams cad
yongs su byung bar 'gyur ro/ /nam yang ngan song du lhung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lan bdun bzlas na rtsod pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /dkar
po'i phyogs kyi tshes bco lnga la nyin mtshan thog thag gcig tu smyung bar gnas shing / khrus byas la gos gsar gtsang ma gyon nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du skyil mo klung
bcas te 'dug la/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me la sogs pas mchod nas/ byang chub snying pe'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs 'di las stong du bzlas brjod byas
tshe| bzlas pa zin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pas phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas sgrub pa po'i
spyi bor bzhag ste dbugs dbyung bar mdzad cing legs so/ /legs so/ /rig pa 'dzin pa chen po/ skyes bu chen po/ khyod kyis bsgrub pa'i byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum
gyi gzungs legs par grub bo/ /rig pa 'dzin pa chen po/ khyod snying stobs chen po'o/ /'bad rtsol chen pos dka' thub byas te dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa thob bo//
gang 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bgrod par gyis shig ces gsungs bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar gsungs ma thag tu rig pa 'dzin pa de'i lus la 'od zer gyi phung po chen po
'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sngags kyi rgyud thams cad las ji snyed gsungs pa'i dngos grub thams cad ma lus par grub par 'gyur ro/ /bsam
pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rig pa 'dzin pa des sngon mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa yin kyang de'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad nyin
mtshan thog thag gcig la smyung ba byas shing bzlas brjod byed pa des yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba'i
dmar phyogs kyi tshes bcu bzhi la lus legs par bkrus la gos gsar gtsang ma gon nas nyin mtshan thog thag gcig smyung ba byas shing sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod
rten gyi drung du zangs kyi snod gcig yungs kar gyis gang bar byas te gzungs sngags 'di lan stong bzlas brjod byas pas byin gyis brlabs nas las sbyor gyi dus su
klu gnas pa'i rdzing bur yungs kar de sbar gang blugs nas/ klu de dag dga' zhing rig pa 'dzin pa de'i dbang du 'gyur/ klu'i pho brang du gdan 'dren nas zhabs la phyag
bgyid nas 'dod pa thams cad ster bar 'gyur/ gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogs su phyi bzhin 'brangs la bka' nod par 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar de phyogs bzhir gtor na rdzi
char drag po bzlog go/ sha sbrang dang / ne tso dang / khu byug dang / cha ga la sogs pa'i srog chags ma rungs pa thams cad kyi kha bcing bar 'gyur ro/ /yungs kar me la btab
na me mi sbar ro/ /chu klung la btab na chu rgyun chad do/ /tshong pa'i nor rdzas la btab na chom rkun gyis mi khyer/ sgrib shing du yang 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo la gtor na
rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / blon po 'khor dang bcas pa dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /nya ma pho mo'i tshogs la gtor na thams cad bdag la mchod pa dang / bkur sti byed par
'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs la gtor na dgra thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /lam du zhugs tshe 'phrang sgor gtor na srung mis mi mthong ngo / /zhing la gtor na srog
chags ma rungs pa'i kha bcings par 'gyur ro/ /than pa byung tshe klu gnas pa'i chur blugs na gru char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /ser ba dang / rdzi char drag po babs tshe bar snang
la gtor na mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra'i khyim la gtor na 'khon yongs su zhi bar 'gyur te phyin chad mdza' bshes su 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgo la gtor na de'i nang gnas
kyi sems can gang dag gnod pas gtses pa thams cad gnod pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams ni phyogs phyogs su byer bar 'gyur ro/ /
g.yul sprad pa'i tshe pha rol po'i phyogs su gtor na dgra bo pham zhing rang phyogs brgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /gshags 'gyed pa'am/ rtsod pa byed
tshe khar bcug na ngag btsan zhing chos phyogs thob par 'gyur ro/ /chu la blugs nas nad kyis zin pa dag la 'thung du bcug na nad de zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gdon gyis zin
pa rnams la yungs kar dang / ka ra bsres pas bdugs na gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /ba lang la sogs pa phyugs kyi rims dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i
rims ngan thams cad la yungs kar sa dang bsres nas lam gyi bzhi mdor bsregs na rims nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gtsug phud kyi nang du bcug na gang du
phyin sar skye bo thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas bdag la mchod pa dang / bkur sti byed par 'gyur ro/ /ci zer ba mnyan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / rig pa 'dzin
pas tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo'i cha nas brtsams te lag pa gnyis kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i sku gzugs kyi zhabs la 'jus
shing phyi nyin tshes bco lnga'i tho rangs kyi bar du bar mi chad par bzlas brjod byas na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'ongs nas 'dod
pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la 'jus shing gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te byin gyis brlabs pa'i gu gul dang /
zhun mar sbyar bas bdug pa phul na/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje de'i mdun du lus snang bar byas te/ 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar byed/ las thams cad grub
par byed/ bu bzhin du skyong zhing gsang sngags kyi rgyud yongs su gtad par byed do/ /gnod sbyin nor bu bzang po la 'jus shing bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na nor gyi
phung po rgya chen po dang bcas lus snang bar byas te nor chen po ster bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam thos kyi bu'i mgo la bzhag ste a ka ru nag po'i dud pas bdug cing lan stong rtsa
brgyad bzlas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /dpal gyi lha mo'i gdong la blta zhing stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na yang gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / tshon sna
lngas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bris la lan stong dang nyi shu bzla zhing sa rdzar dza'i spos kyis bdugs na gnod sbyin mo mdun du byung nas mngags gzhug tu khas blangs te/ ci
bcol ba'i las rnam pa brgya'am stong yang rung ste ma lus par grub par byed do/ /da ni ras bris kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ ras bris la brten nas las thams cad sgrub
pa'i thabs la/ kha tshar ma nyams shing longs ma spyad pa'i ras gtsang ma srid du gru bzhi yod pa zhig lpags pa las byung ba min pa'i sbyin
gtsong mas btul zhing legs par brdar ba la bzo bo gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la gnas shing gtsang spra dang ldan pas bri bar bya ste/ dbus su shAkya thub pa rin
po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i byang chub ljon shing gi drung na seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i steng na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dam pa'i rgyal mtshan
chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya can bri bar bya'o/ /g.yas su 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la pus mo btsugs
te lag pa gnyis kyis lhung bzed bzung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'bul ba'i rnam pa can bri bar bya'o/ /g.yon na 'phags pa gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khro 'dzum
brjid bag can rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag na rdo rje gsor ba'i tshul gyis bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la pus mo gnyis btsugs nas bcom ldan
'das la blta ba bri bar bya'o/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rgyab tu rin po che'i mchod rten mtho zhing yangs pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu
rgyas pa'i gser zhal mchog tu dpa' ba'i 'od zer rgyal mtshan gyi tog seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs shing dbugs dbyung mdzad pa'i rnam pa can bri bar bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje'i
rgyab tu byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi glegs bam rin po che sna tshogs kyis spa ba'i rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang du bcug pa mtha' 'jags su sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs
bris pa seng+ge'i khri la bzhag pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu rdo rje pho nya khro bo'i gzugs can bri bar bya'o/ /mchod rten gyi 'og tu dpal gyi lha mo bri bar bya'o/ /shAkya thub pa'i
'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi rin po che'i go cha gyon pa dpa' zhing brjid pa'i nyams can bri bar bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag pa g.yon pa na spos snod thogs pa g.yas
pas bgrang phreng bsnams pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal la blta ba bri bar bya'o/ /de ltar bris sku bsgrub pa tsam gyis dam pa'i chos spangs pa dang / 'phags pa la skur
pa btab pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa la sogs pa ngan song gsum du ltung bar gyur pa'i las thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /ras bris bsgrub pa tsam gyi phan yon de ltar na de'i mdun du sgrub pa byed pa'i phan yon smos kyang ci dgos
te| de bzhin gshegs pa dang skal ba mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi
cho ga 'di bshad do/ /'di'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs par 'dod pas gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i khang pa'am/ ri sul la sogs dben zhing gtsang la yid du 'ong ba'i
gnas su rgyud nas gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin sa blangs la/ gzungs sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa gtsang dang / ba lci bsres pas khor yug tu khru bcu drug yod
pa'i stegs bu byas la/ der gtsang sbra dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o/ /de'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sku gzugs dang / grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya'o/ /sgo bzhi'i nang rin po che'i ljon shing bris la de dag gi drung na lha mo bzhi bri bar bya ste/ shar sgor ni lha
mo dpal mo'o/ /lho sgor dbyangs can ma'o/ /nub sgor dung can ma'o/ /byang sgor me tog so ma 'o/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ngos la 'bras ma grugs pa dang /
yungs kar dang / dus kyi me tog bkram par bya'o/ /dri bzang gi byug pa dang / phye ma phur ma yang bsham mo/ /zur bzhir dri bzang gi chus gang ba'i bum pa bzhi gzhag
par bya'o/ /zhal zas bza' btung bzang po sder ma bzhi yang bkod par bya'o/ /sgo bzhir bdug spos kyi phog phor bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /me tog sna tshogs kyi chun po dang /
dkar gsum gyi gtor ma yang bsham par bya'o/ /yang zur bzhir mar me bzhi bud par bya'o/ /rig pa 'dzin pa/ kha shar du bltas te bzlas brjod bya bar bya zhing / mtshan
gyi thun tha ma la lus bsrung ba dang mtshams bcing ba sogs byas nas dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya la/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams
cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad bde blag thob pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rtag tu dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po thams cad kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang /
sba bar byed cing sgrub pa'i stong grogs byed par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta byA ba lo ki
te/ dza ya dza ya swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM hu ru hu ru dza ya mu khye swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM dza le ni dza ye swAhA/ nye regs kyi sngags so/ /oM sa man+ta pU ra Na dza ye swAhA/ mtshams
bcing ba'i sngags so/ /oM maN+Da la dza ye swAhA/ dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bcing ba'i skabs kyi sngags so/ /oM si rI mi rI dza ye swAhA/ gtor
ma'i sngags so/ /oM sa wa san+d+ha ri mi ri dza ye swAhA/ spyan 'dren pa'i sngags so/ /oM bud+d+ha ku su maM swAhA/ me tog 'bul ba'i sngags so/ /oM dza ya yan+ti swAhA/ bdug
spos 'bul ba'i sngags so/ /o bi dza ya ga pI swAhA/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/ /oM ta thA ga ta dza ya swAhA/ gtsug tor bcing ba'i sngags so/ /oM dza ya u ri ti
swAhA/ gos byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so/ /oM gu ru d+ha ri swAhA/ slob ma bsrung zhing rjes su 'dzin pa'i sngags so/ /oM d+ha ra d+ha ra mi ri dza ye swAhA/ slar gshegs
su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /oM su sam+b+ha wa dza ye swAhA/ phreng ba byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so/ /oM su na ri dza ya ye swAhA/ gdan 'bul ba'i sngags so/ /oM
su ri dza ye swAhA/ bgegs bcing ba'i sngags so/ /oM pra wa rA dza ye sid+d+hi swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i sngags so/ /oM rak+Sha ni dza ye
swAhA/ lus bsrung ba'i sngags so/ /oM dza ya di bi ni swAhA/ mar me 'bul ba'i sngags so/ /oM ma le bi ma la dza ye swAhA/ sbyin sreg gi sngags so/ /oM sa ra sa ra ja
ye sid+d+hi swAhA/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i sngags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /da ni snying po dang / nye ba'i
snying po'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste/ snying po 'bum bzlas na rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /ldong ros zangs kyi snod du bzhag pa snying po
stong bzlas pas brlabs nas dpral bar thig le byas na nam mkha' la 'gro zhing lha srin sde brgyad thams cad kyi khyim sgo rang gis bye bar 'gyur te sgrub pa bos ci
dgar 'jug pa dang / bgrod par 'gyur ro/ /sau bI ra mig sman la 'bum bzlas nas mig la byugs na an+ta na 'thob par gyur la 'byung po thams cad kyi khyim du rang
dbang gis 'jug nus par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang khri bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten gyi srog shing gi rtse mo'i
gdugs la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bteg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel ma lus par bzhugs pa'i mchod rten chen po'i rang bzhin
du 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyi phyag mtshan lhung bzed blangs nas de la sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la 'o thug gis gang bar byas/ /slar 'jam dpal gyi phyag la
'jog ste gdugs tshad 'bul na bsod snyoms pa stong yang tshim bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / rgyud gzhan dag nas gsungs pa'i las
tshogs thams cad kyang gzungs sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs na 'dod pa thams cad 'bad med du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /da ni phyag rgya'i rim pa bshad par
bya ste/ lag pa gnyis thal mo gan rkyal du byas la snying ga'i thad du thal mo g.yas pa'i mthil na g.yon pa yang gan rkyal du bzed de bzhag pa ni byang chub
snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /phyag rgya 'di bcing ba tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyis dbugs dbyung bar mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskul bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyis rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g.yas pa bteg ste phyag rgya gzhan gang dgos su bsgyur bas phyag rgya thams cad byung bar gyur
te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa g.yas pa bsgyur nas lte bar bzhag pa'i mtheb chen dang
mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun du sbyar ba ni phyag rgya las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing las kyi sgrib pa thams
cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzungs 'di bsrung zhing mtshams sbyor pa'i gzungs sngags 'di
smras so/ /na mo many+dzu shrI ya ye/ ku mA ra b+hU ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ dza ye/ bi dza ye/ dza ya shrI/ dzuSh+Ti/ hUM swAhA/ sgrub pa pos thog mar 'jug pa'i skabs dang / las la sbyor ba'i
skabs rnams su sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas na sgrib pa dang / bgegs med par 'gyur zhing myur du grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes
rig pa chen po'i gzungs 'di smras so/ /tad+ya thA/ badzra muSh+TaM/ ha na da ha pa tsa badzra hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ sngags 'di yungs kar la lan bdun btab nas phyogs bzhir gtor na
na mtshams bcing gi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis sngags 'di smras so/ /tad+ya thA/ d+h+ri ti hri mri sa ra pra sa ra bi ri bi ri swAhA/ sngags 'di yungs
kar dang bcas pa'i chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la spyi bo nas blugs na gnod byed 'byung po thams cad dbang du gyur nas sgrub pa po'i rkang par mgo pos phyag 'tshal
nas rang gnas su gdongs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ ngas
mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang / ma dang / pha dang / lta ba log pa dang / the tshom za pa dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / sems can
dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mtshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do/ /kun dga' bo/
phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas pa dang / dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug
bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di la brten pas mchod rten
gcig byas na chos kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /sdong
pos brgyan pa bklags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis mdo sde 'di bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / gsang ba'i bdag po chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po
bzhi dang / bram ze bi tu dat+ta dang / lha dang / klu la sogs pa'i sde brgyad mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa
la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //thang gur gyi dus the tsin zhi hung lu khing gos can
rgya gar byang phyogs kyi mkhan po sde snod gsum pa rig 'dzin don yod rdo rjes bka' yis bskul ba dang du blangs te rgya gar gyi dpe las rgya nag tu bsgyur bar mdzad pa
las da lta chen po ching gur gyi l+tsho tsAr sgro btags pa bod yig gi slob gra'i mi bzang jing gir rigs las rim pa dang po'i tha'i ji mgon po skyabs kyis thob chin wang
gis gzungs bsdus gsar ba bzhengs skabs 'phros don las brtsams te bskul ba ltar/ rang gnas nyi dga'i skyed tshal du bsgyur ba lags shing / legs sbyar gyi
sgra la ma byang bas sngags tshig gi lci yang sogs la rtog dpyod byed pa'i ngal ba spangs te snga rabs pa dag gi mdo gzhan gyi yi ge ji ltar ngo sprod gnang ba sor bzhag/
kun dga' bo'i tshig lhu gcig ni rgya nag mar mi snang yang bod mar yod pas chad dam snyam pas bod ma nas tshur bsabs/ de yang gzhung
gi bka' 'gyur par mar dga' bo zhes pa 'dug kyang / bris ma 'ga' zhig na kun dga' bo snang ba 'thad dam snyam du sems pa ltar bris pa la/ badzra A yu She'i
sngags ni rgya nag gi dpe chan med cing / bod dper yod kyang snying po dang / nye snying gi rjes la byung mod/ rang tshugs kyi ming mi gsal bas re zhig gzhag te/ khi'an lung
gnam lo brgyad pa zla ba bdun pa'i tshes bdun la rdzogs par bsgrubs so/ /dge ba 'di yis skye bo kun/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags shing / /bsod nams ye shes las byung
ba'i/ /dam pa sku gnyis thob par shog /'og gi byang chub snying po'i rgyan 'bum 'di yang 'di las zur phyung zhig yin 'dug pas logs su bri ma dgos kyang /
sngar gyi rnams su gong ma ma rnyed pa'i skabs su bris 'dug pa ltar bzhag go/ //rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi gar+b+hA lang+kA ra lak+Sha d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/
byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te ba pu la ba da na kany+tsa

no ta k+Ship+ta/ pra b+hA sa ke tu mUr+d+ha ne/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+ha

ni bo d+ha ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta go tsa re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ mahA bo d+hi tsit+ta d+hA re/ tsu lu tsu lu/ sha ta rasmi sany+tso di te/ sarba ta thA ga tA b+hi Shi ka te/ gu Ne gu Na

ba te/ sarba bud+d+hA shu NA ba b+hA se/ mi li mi li/ ga ga na ta le/ pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi Sh+Thi te/ na b+hasta le/ sha me sha me/ pra sha me pra sha me/ sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne/

sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ hu lu hu lu hUM/ mahA bo d+hi mArga saM pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta su pra tiSh+Thi te shud+d+he swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bya ba lo ki te/ dza
ya dza ya swAhA/ snying po'o/ /oM hu ru hu ru/ dza ya mu khe swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM badzra A yu She swAhA/ dge slong dam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
bsnyen ma'am/ gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs 'di bris te mchod rten byas la/ mchod rten de'i nang du gzungs 'di bcug
na des mchod rten gcig byas na 'bum byas bar 'gyur ro/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas kyang mchod par 'gyur te/ mchod rten 'ba' zhig mchod pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos
dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la yang mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /dga' bo/ ngas mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams
zhan pa dang / ma dad pa dang / lta ba log pa dang / the tshom za ba dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / gshin rje'i
'jig rten dang / mtshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do/ /dga' bo/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas pa
dang / dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab
tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di la nyan pas mchod rten gcig byas na chos kyis brgyan pa brgyad
khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang / bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /sdong pos brgyan pa bklags shing kha ton du
byas par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum las btus pa 'bum
gyi gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA Da hri da ya gu h+ya d+hA tu ka raN+Da nA ma d+hA ra Ni mahA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/
'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsral gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na dri ma med pa'i
kun dga' ra ba dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / ma'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba mang po rnams dang / yul gyi mi 'bum phrag
du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing / mdun du byas nas thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas 'khor gyi nang de nas bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu mkhas pa/ mdzangs
pa| gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ mthong na dga' ba/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su bzung ba/ dri med legs snang zhes bya ba zhig yod
de| de yang gcig tu dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus la phyag byed pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ zhib mo brtags pa/ sems can thams cad dang dge
ba'i don la brtson pa/ nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ phyug pa/ rdzas mang ba/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pas mngon par
mchod do/ /na bza' rin 'bum ri ba yang gsol/ bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal 'bum ri ba yang gsol nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal
te| bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyan sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sras kyi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag
gi sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan 'dren na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad pa ci gnang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri
med legs snang gis spyan drangs par thugs su chud nas/ ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo / /de nas bram ze chen po legs snang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga
nas cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/ des rings pa rings par rang gi khyim du song ste/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / zhal zas dang / yo byad dang / zhal zas
ro brgya pa mang po bshams nas bkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi gzhal med khang dang / gzhal med khang chen po sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / bdug pa khyer te
'khor mang po dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la dus la bab par gsol to/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das la bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dus lags te/ bcom ldan
'das gshegs pa'i dus tshod la bab na/ bdag la gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang dbugs phyung
nas/ nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ji ltar lhags pa thams cad/ deng don chen por mdzad par 'gyur gyi tshur shog /de nas bcom ldan
'das gdan de las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer tha dad
pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang dag
par bskul te gzigs nas gshegs par shes so/ /de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen pos mchod cing / bcom ldan 'das
kyi gshegs shul mdzes pa cher byas so/ /'khor mang po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci
dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis
kyang gshegs shul mdzes par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang mi ring ba'i lam gyi bar gyi nang zhig na skyed mos tshal bde byed ces bya ba zhig yod de/
skyed mos tshal de'i nang na/ mchod rten rnying pa chen po zhig yod de/ zhig pa/ tsher mas gang ba/ rtswa dang / shing dang / gyo mos kun tu gang ba/ phyag dar gyi phung po
lta bu zhig yod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang / mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de yang kun nas 'bar zhing 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog
sna tshogs pa dag byung ngo / /phyag dar dang / gyo mo'i phung po de las kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ legs so/ /legs so/ /
deng ni gshegs pa'i ltas bzang po'o/ /bram ze chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs pa na yang khyed legs so/ /deng khyed la don chen po mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la/ yan lag lngas phyag mdzad nas lan gsum bskor ba nas/
nyid kyi sku las na bza' gsil nas mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis mchi ma byung ba chen po phyung bas bshums
pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan te/ 'dzum pa bstan pa des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lag mthil na
bzhugs ba bzhin du mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang spyan mchims gang zhing bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang
'od zer bkye ste/ mchod rten rnying pa'i phung po der bzhugs so/ /de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de ya mtshan chen por gyur te/ yi chad de 'khod
par gyur to/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rje lus ni 'dar/ snying ni 'gul/ rdo rje ni gsor zhing / rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste
phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bshum pa'i snga ltas
chen po gda' ba gang gis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mchi mas gang par bstan pa'i snga ltas gda' ba/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan
'das kyi 'khor 'di'i nang du zhu ba 'di skabs dbye bar ci gnang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje/ ring bsrel gyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs
kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod de/ lag na rdo rje/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi
gang bu ji snyed gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa khar yas khar yas zhes bya ba snyed kyi sku gdung ring bsrel rnams gnas so/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong
gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang / spyi bo yang de bzhin du gnas so/ /lag na rdo rje/ gang na chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du lung bstan to/ /lag na rdo rje/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di ltar phan yon che zhing mthu che ba yin no/ /lag
na rdo rje/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phan yon che ba yin no/ /lag na rdo rje/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bkra shis thams cad rdzogs par byed pa yin no/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das las 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral la/ de nas nye ba'i nyon
mongs pa dang bral lo/ /kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo/ /kha cig gis ni rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o//
kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /kha cig gis ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas so/ /kha cig gis ni
byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo/ /kha cig gis ni sa dang po'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa gnyis pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa gsum pa'o/ /kha
cig gis ni sa bzhi pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa lnga pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa drug pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa bdun pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa brgyad pa'o/ /kha cig
gis ni sa dgu pa'o/ /kha cig gis ni sa bcu pa la gnas par gyur to/ /kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs so/ /bram ze chen po/ de yang
mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing dri ma dang bral ba dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar gyur to/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes cho 'phrul
chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi
rnam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang phan yon gyis brgyan pa 'di lta bu thob na/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi slad du phu dud dang / bkur sti shin tu mang po
bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu yang mthong bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig /rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di 'dri bar byed na/ lag na rdo rje/ des de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bsod nams kyi phung po
dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rjes su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i mdo snga rnams bcang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag phyogs bcu'i de
bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur zhing / nyin gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang / khong du
chud par byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog phreng rgyud dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs
kyi pu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des phyogs bcu dang / phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs
pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu la/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog phreng rgyud dang / byug pa dang / na
bza' dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan gyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rin po che sna
bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsam gyi phung po'i yon tan byung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de rnams dang / sems can gyi tshogs chen po de rnams kyang ya mtshan du
gyur nas gcig la gcig /'di skad du/ mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar dang / gyo mo'i phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/
'di ni rdzu 'phrul chen po ston pas mthu che ba yin no zhes zer ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di sus phyag dar gyi phung por bgyis pa las rin po che'i mchod rten du gda' bar bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
lag na rdo rje/ 'di phyag dar gyi phung po ma yin gyi/ /'di ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rin po che'i mchod rten chen po yin no/ /lag na rdo rje/ 'on kyang sems
can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ston pas nub par gyur gyi/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten rnams
ni 'jig pa'am/ dgyes par mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po'i sku ji ltar 'gyes par 'gyur/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu
rnam par smin par snang ba las kyang nub par gyur te/ lag na rdo rje/ gzhan yang / phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sdig pa kun tu spyod pa dang / sdig pa can dang / dmyal
ba la gzhol ba shin tu tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ma yin/ chos ma yin/ dge 'dun 'tshol ba ma yin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang bskyed par
mi byed de/ rgyu de dang / rkyen des dam pa'i chos nub bo/ /lag na rdo rje/ de'i phyir nga'i mig gnyis mchi mas gang la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchi ma
byung ngo / /dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nub par gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/ de la de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te/ mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po'i ring bsrel
gyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs kyi snying po gsang bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa til gyi gang bu snyad dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang / spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs
par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan nam/ mchod rten thams cad kyi nang du 'jog par byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rin
po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bar sprel ba dang bcas pa dang / bkra shis pa dang /
char kab kyi gzugs dang / dril bur bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam
grangs 'di'i mthu dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / bden pa dang / dam tshig gis byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can
gang dag mchod rten de la phu dud dang / bsti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag 'tshal ba gcig dang / bskor ba gcig gis mnar med pa la thug gi bar la sogs pa rnams las yongs su thar par
'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gang na mchod rten nam/ gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu gnas pa'i
sa phyogs de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs der klu mi srun pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sad dang / ser bas
kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gnas der srog chags mi srun pa'am/ gdug pas kyang mi chugs par 'gyur/ gcan zan gyis kyang
mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bya mi srun pa dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / byi ba dang / sre mo dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / byi ba dang / sbrang ma mchu gsum pa
dang / mchu rings dang / rta bla'i 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs der yams kyi nad dang / nad
'go ba dang / 'khrug pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / 'dre dang / brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa yang
mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang / 'bras
dang | phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / rkang shu dang / g.yon pa dang / mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing / mchod rten de mthong
btsam gyis thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs der ba lang gi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad
dang | skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu me'i nad kyis kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi
'gyur| dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin zhing / me dang / chus kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pas ma yin/ lo nyes
kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po'i dmag gi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang rtag tu
rgyun mi chad par sa phyogs de srung bar byed/ yongs su skyong bar byed do/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par
srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / mjug ring chen po'ang nyin mtshan mthun par byed par
'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mdangs mi 'phrog cing / legs pa kho nar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad
kyang mchod rten chen po de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo / /yul du gnas pa thams
cad kyang mchod rten dang / gzugs brnyan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo / /bstod par byed/ skor ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi dbang
po brgya byin yang lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyun mi chad par mchod rten nam/ gzugs brnyan de'i drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum
du 'ong ste/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa la 'ong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob cing bzhugs so/ /
mchod rten dang / gzugs brnyan ji lta ji lta bu las byed pa'i sa'am/ rdo'i 'am/ shing gi'am/ dngul gyi'am/ gser gyi'am/ zangs kyis byed pa dang / chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bris te/ de'i nang du bzhag na/ bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs bar 'gyur ro/ /'phang
dang | them skas dang / kha ran dang / 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang / gdugs dang / dril bu 'phyang ba dang / ba dan dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba
thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhi kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten rin po che dang / sku gdung gi snying po'i mchod rten dang / mchod gnas su
'gyur ro/ /sku gzugs dang / mchod rten de 'og min gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongs su ba skyang ba dang / mchod pas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan gyi khyad par
'di lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi
phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te/ lag na rdo rje/ des na mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rin po che'i za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag
na rdo rje nyon cig /de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni gsum ste/ chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin du sprul
pa'i sku ste/ dus gsum pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// //na ma s+t+rai ya d+h+wi kA

nAn/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ oM b+hu bi b+ha bA na ba ra ba tsa Tau/ tsu lu tsu lu/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ d+hA tu d+ha re/ pad+ma gar+b+he/ dza ya ba re/ a tsu le/ sma ra ta thA ga ta/ d+harma

tsakra /pra brta na/ badzra bo d+hi maN+Da a laM kA ra/ a laM kr-i te/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha ni b+ho d+ha ni/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ saM bo d+ha ni saM bo d+ha ya/ tsa la
tsa la/ tsa lan+tu sarba A pa ra NA ni/ sarba pA paM bi ga te/ hu ru hu ru/ sarba sho ka bi ga te/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ badzri Ni/ saM b+ha ba saM b+ha ba/ sarba ta thA ga te guh+ye/ d+hA

ra Ni mu dre/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ d+hA tu gar+b+he swAhA/ sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Tha te swAhA/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ d+hA tu mu dre swAhA/ su pra tiSh+Thi ta stu

pe ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ hUM hUM swAhA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+Ni Sha d+ha tu mu drA Ni sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu bi b+hu Shi ta a d+hiSh+Thi ta hu ru hu ru/ hUM hUM swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis ring bsrel za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu phyogs bcu dang / phyogs re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khri ga
til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la/ shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang / ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten byin gyis brlabs pa legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /'di ni
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /gang na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di ston par byed dam/ mchod rten
gyi nang du 'jog gam/ gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gcig tu rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rjes su 'brang
zhing bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzungs bshad pa dang / ji tsam
na mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten du mngon par 'phags shing 'phang dang / legs par rnam par
'byes pa dang / 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang bcas par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas de skad ces bka' stsal
nas| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang /
lto 'phye chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //
rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+yA ka ra pra b+ha wa dang / zhus chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de gtsang de wen+d+ra rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
